GSP29nysvbh1u:3: pramāṇam antareṇa nārthapratipattiḥ, nārhtapratipattim antareṇa pravṛttisāmarthyam/ pramāṇena khalv ayaṃ jñātārtham abhīpsati jihāsati vā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4_0: tasyepsājihāsāprayuktasya samīhā pravṛttir ity ucyate / sāmrthyaṃ punar asyāḥ phalenābhisambandhaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4_1: samīhamānas tam artham abhīpsan jihāsan vā tam artham āpnoti jahāti vā / arthas tu
GSP29nysvbh1u:4_2: sukhaṃ sukhahetuś ca, duḥkhaṃ duḥkhahetuś ca /
GSP29nysvbh1u:6: arthavati ca pramāṇe pramātā prameyaṃ pramitir ity arthavanti bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:8_0: tatra yasyepsājihāsāprayuktasya pravṛttiḥ sa pramātā, sa yenārthaṃ pramiṇoti tat
GSP29nysvbh1u:8_1: pramāṇam, yo 'rthaḥ pramīyate tat prameyam, yad arthavijñānaṃ sā pramitiḥ, catasṛṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:10: kiṃ punas tattvam? sataś ca sadbhāvo 'sataśüEcāsadbhāvaḥ/ sat sad iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:13: asac cāsad iti gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtam aviparītaṃ tattvaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:14_0: katham uttarasya pramāṇenopalabdhir iti? saty upalabhyamāne tadanupalabdheḥ pradīpavat /
GSP29nysvbh1u:14_1: yathā darśakena dīpena dṛśye gṛhyamāṇe tad iva yan na gṛhyate, tan nāsti / yady abhaviṣyad
GSP29nysvbh1u:15: vijñānābhāvān nāstīti/ evaṃ pramāṇena sati gṛhyamāṇe tad iva yan na gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:16: tan nāsti/ yady abhaviṣyad idam iva vyajñāsyata, vijñānābhāvān nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:17: tad evaṃ sataḥ prakāśakaṃ pramāṇam asad api prakāśayatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:18: sac ca khalu ṣoḍaśadhā vyūḍham upadekṣyate/ tāsāṃ khalv āsāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:21: nirdeśe yathāvacanaṃ vigrahaḥ/ cārthe dvandvasamāsaḥ/ pramāṇādīnāṃ tattvam iti śaiṣikī
GSP29nysvbh1u:22: tattvasya jñānaṃ niḥśreyasasyādhigama iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhau/ ta etāvanto vidyamānārthāḥ, yeṣām aviparītajñānārtham ihopadeśaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:24: so 'yam anavayavena tantrārtha uddiṣṭo veditavyaḥ/ ātmādeḥ khalu prameyasya tattvajñānān
GSP29nysvbh1u:25: tac caitad uttarasūtreṇānūdyata iti/ heyam, tasya nirvartakaṃ hānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:26: ātyantikam, tasyopāyo 'dhigantavya ity etāni catvāry arthapadāni samyag buddhvā niḥśreyasam
GSP29nysvbh1u:27_0: tatra saṃśayādīnāṃ pṛthagvacanam anarthakam --- saṃśayādayo yathāsambhavaṃ pramāṇeṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:27_1: prameyeṣu cāntarbhavanto na vyatiricyanta iti? satyam etat, imās tu catasro vidyāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:27_2: pṛthakprasthānāḥ prāṇabhṛtām anugrahāyopadiśyante, yāsāṃ caturthīyam ānvīkṣikī nyāyavidyā /
GSP29nysvbh1u:29_0: tasyāḥ pṛthakprasthānāḥ saṃśayādayaḥ padārthāḥ / teṣāṃ pṛthagvacanam antareṇādhyātmavidyāmātram
GSP29nysvbh1u:29_1: iyaṃ syāt, yathopaniṣadaḥ / tasmāt saṃśayādibhiḥ padārthaiḥ pṛthak prasthāpyate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:33: nirṇayas tattvajñānam iti/ sa ca ``ayaṃ kiṃsvid'' iti vastuvimarśamātram anavadhāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ, prameye 'ntarbhavann evam arthaṃ pṛthag
GSP29nysvbh1u:35: atha prayojanam --- yena prayuktaḥ pravartate, tat prayojanam/ yam artham abhīpsan jihāsan vā karmārabhate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:37: tenānena sarve prāṇinaḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvāś ca vidyā vyāptāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:38: tadāśrayaś ca nyāyaḥ pravartate/ kaḥ punar ayaṃ nyāyaḥ? pramāṇair arthaparīkṣaṇaṃ nyāyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:39: pratyakṣāgamāśritam anumānam, sānvīkṣā/ pratyakṣāgamābhyām īkṣitasyānvīkṣaṇam anvīkṣā/ tayā pravarttata ity ānvīkṣikī --- nyāyavidyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:40: --- nyāyaśāstram/ yat punar anumānaṃ pratyakṣāgamaviruddhaṃ nyāyābhāsaḥ sa
GSP29nysvbh1u:42: tatra vādajalpau saprayojanau/ vitaṇḍā tu parīkṣyate/ vitaṇḍayā pravartamāno vaitaṇḍikaḥ/ sa prayojanam anuyukto yadi pratipadyate so 'sya
GSP29nysvbh1u:43: pakṣaḥ so 'sya siddhānta iti, vaitaṇḍikatvaṃ jahāti/ atha na pratipadyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:44_0: nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka ity āpadyate / athāpi parapakṣapratiṣedhajñāpanaṃ prayojanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:44_1: bravīti, etad api tādṛg eva / yo jñāpayati yo jānāti yena jñāpyate yac ca jñāpyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:45: yadi, tadā vaitaṇḍikatvaṃ jahāti/ atha na pratipadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:46: parapakṣapratiṣedhajñāpanaṃ prayojanam ity etad asya vākyam anarthakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:47: bhavati/ vākyasamūhaś ca sthāpanāhīno vitaṇḍā, tasya yady abhidheyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:48: pratipadyate, so 'sya pakṣaḥ sthāpanīyo bhavati/ atha na pratipadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:49: pralāpamātram anarthakaṃ bhavati, vitaṇḍātvaṃ nivartata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:50: atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayo 'rthaḥ, yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ darśanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:52: sa ca prameyam/ tasya pṛthagvacanaṃ ca tadāśrayāv anumānāgamau, tasmin sati syātām anumānāgamau asati ca na syātām/ tadāśrayā ca nyāyapravṛttiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:54: dṛṣṭāntasamādhinā ca svapakṣaḥ sādhanīyo bhavati/ nāstikaś ca dṛṣṭāntam
GSP29nysvbh1u:55: abhyupagacchann āstikatvaṃ jahāti/ anabhyupagacchan kiṃsādhanaḥ param
GSP29nysvbh1u:56: upālabheteti/ niruktena ca dṛṣṭāntena śakyam abhidhātuṃ ``sādhyasādharmyāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:58: asty ayam ity anujñāyamāno 'rthaḥ siddhāntaḥ/ sa ca prameyam/ tasya pṛthagvacanaṃ satsu siddhāntabhedeṣu vādajalpavitaṇḍāḥ pravartante, nāto
GSP29nysvbh1u:60: sādhanīyārthasya yāvati śabdasamūhe siddhiḥ parisamāpyate tasya pañcāvayavāḥ pratijñādayaḥ, samūham apekṣyāvayavā ucyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:61: teṣu pramāṇasamavāyaḥ, āgamaḥ pratijñā/ hetur anumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:63: sarveṣām ekārthasamavāye sāmarthyapradarśanaṃ nigamanam iti/ so 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:64: paramo nyāya iti/ etena vādajalpavitaṇḍāḥ pravartante nāto 'nyatheti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:65: tadāśrayā ca tattvavyavasthā/ te caite 'vayavāḥ śabdaviśeṣāḥ santaḥ prameye 'ntarbhūtā evamarthaṃ pṛthag ucyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:66_0: tarko na pramāṇasaṃgṛhīto, na pramāṇāntaram, pramāṇānām anugrāhakas tattvajñānāya
GSP29nysvbh1u:66_1: kalpate / tasyodāharaṇam --- kim idaṃ janma kṛtakena hetunā nirvartyate, āhosvid
GSP29nysvbh1u:68: evam avijñāte 'rthe kāraṇopapattyā ūhaḥ pravarttate --- yadi kṛtakena hetunā nirvartyate, hetūcchedād upapanno 'yaṃ janmocchedaḥ/ athākṛtakena
GSP29nysvbh1u:69: hetunā, tato hetūcchedasyāśakyatvād anupapanno janmocchedaḥ/ athākasmikam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:70: ato 'kasmān nirvartyamānaṃ na punar nivartsyatīti nivṛttikāraṇaṃ nopapadyate, tena janmānuccheda iti/ etasmiṃs tarkaviṣaye karmanimittaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:72: tattvajñānaviṣayasya vibhāgāt tattvajñānāya kalpate tarka iti/ so 'yam
GSP29nysvbh1u:73: itthambhūtas tarkaḥ pramāṇasahito vāde sādhanāyopālambhāya cārthasya bhavatīty evam arthaṃ pṛghag ucyate prameyāntarbhūto 'pīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:74: nirṇayas tattvajñānaṃ pramāṇānāṃ phalam, tadavasāno vādaḥ, tasya pālanārthaṃ jalpaviṭaṇḍe/ tāv etau tarkanirṇayau lokayātrāṃ vahata iti/ so
GSP29nysvbh1u:75: 'yaṃ nirṇayaḥ prameyāntarbhūta evamarthaṃ pṛthag uddīṣṭa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:79: pṛthag uddiṣṭa upalakṣaṇārtham/ upalakṣitena vyavahāras tattvajñānāya
GSP29nysvbh1u:82: nigrahasthānebhyaḥ pṛthag uddhiṣṭā hetvābhāsā vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyantīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:84: chalajātinigrahasthānānāṃ pṛthagupadeśa upalakṣaṇārtham iti/ upalakṣitānāṃ svavākye parivarjanam, chalajātinigrahasthānānāṃ paravākye paryanuyogaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:85: jāteś ca pareṇa prayujyamānāyāḥ sulabhaḥ samādhiḥ, svayaṃ ca sukaraḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:90: tad idaṃ tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasādhigamārthaṃ yathāvidyaṃ veditavyam/ iha tv adhyātmavidyāyām ātmādijñānaṃ tattvajñānam/ niḥśreyasādhigamo
GSP29nysvbh1u:91: tat khalu niḥśreyasaṃ kiṃ tattvajñānāntaram eva bhavati? nety ucyate/ kiṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:95: ātmani tāvan nāstīti, anātmani ātmeti duḥkhe sukham iti anitye nityam ity atrāṇe trāṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:97_0: sabhaye nirbhayam iti, jugupsite 'bhimatam iti, hātavye apratihātavyam iti, pravṛttau
GSP29nysvbh1u:97_1: nāsti karma, nāsti karmaphalam iti, doṣeṣu nāyaṃ doṣanimittaḥ saṃsāra iti, pretyabhāve
GSP29nysvbh1u:97_2: nāsti jantur jīvo vā sattva ātmā vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:98: yaḥ preyāt, pretya ca bhaved iti, animittaṃ janma, animitto janmoparama ity ādimān pretyabhāvaḥ, anantaś ceti, naimittikaḥ sann akarmanimittaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:99: pretyabhāva iti, dehendriyabuddhivedanāsantānocchedapratisandhānābhyāṃ nirātmakaḥ pretyabhāva iti/ apavarge bhīṣmaḥ khalv ayaṃ sarvakāyoparamaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:100: sarvaviprayoge 'pavarge bahu ca bhadrakaṃ lupyata iti kathaṃ buddhimān sarvasukhocchedam acaitanyam amum apavargaṃ rocayed iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:101: etasmān mithyājñānād anukūleṣu rāgaḥ, pratikūleṣu dveṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:102: rāgadveṣādhikārāc cāsatyerṣyamāyālobhādayo doṣā bhavanti/ doṣaiḥ prayuktaḥ śarīreṇa pravarttamāno hiṃsāsteyapratiṣiddhamaithunāny ācarati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:104: nāstikyaṃ ceti/ seyaṃ pāpātmikā pravṛttir adharmāya/
GSP29nysvbh1u:105: atha śubhā --- śarīreṇa dānaṃ paritrāṇaṃ paricaraṇaṃ ca, vācā satyaṃ hitaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:106: priyaṃ svādhyāyaṃ ceti, manasā dayām aspṛhāṃ śraddhāṃ ceti/ seyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:108: atra pravṛttisādhanau dharmādharmau pravṛttiśabdenoktau, yathānnasādhanāḥ prāṇāḥ ``annaṃ vai prāṇinaḥ prāṇā''iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:109: seyaṃ pravṛttiḥ kutsitasyābhipūjitasya ca janmanaḥ kāraṇam/ janma punaḥ śarīrendriyabuddhīnāṃ nikāyaviśiṣṭaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ, tasmin sati duḥkham/
GSP29nysvbh1u:110: tat punaḥ pratikūlavedanīyaṃ bādhanā pīḍā tāpa iti/ ta ime mithyājñānādayo
GSP29nysvbh1u:111: duḥkhāntā dharmā avicchedenaiva pravartamānāḥ saṃsāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:112: yadā tu tattvajñānān mithyājñānam apaiti, tadā mithyājñānāpāye doṣā
GSP29nysvbh1u:115: pravṛttyapāye janmāpaiti, janmāpāye duḥkham apaiti, duḥkhāpāye ca ātyantiko 'pavargo niḥśreyasam
GSP29nysvbh1u:116: tattvajñānaṃ tu khalu mithyājñānaviparyayeṇa vyākhyātam/ ātmani --- tāvad
GSP29nysvbh1u:117_0: astīti, anātmani --- anātmeti, evaṃ duḥkhe 'nitye 'trāṇe sabhaye jugupsite hātavye
GSP29nysvbh1u:117_1: ca yathāviṣayaṃ veditavyam, pravṛttau --- asti karma, asti karmaphalam iti, doṣeṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:117_2: --- doṣanimitto 'yaṃ saṃsāra iti, pretyabhāve khalu --- asti jantur jīvaḥ sattva
GSP29nysvbh1u:117_3: ātmā vā, yaḥ pretya bhaved iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:118: nimittavaj janma, nimittavān janmoparama ity anādiḥ pretyabhāvo 'pavargānta iti, naimittikaḥ san pretyabhāvaḥ pravṛttinimitta iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:119: sātmakaḥ san dehendriyabuddhivedanāsantānocchedapratisandhānābhyāṃ pravarttata iti, apavarge śāntaḥ khalv ayaṃ sarvaviprayogaḥ sarvoparamo
GSP29nysvbh1u:120: 'pavargaḥ, bahu ca kṛcchaṃ ghoraṃ pāpakaṃ lupyata iti kathaṃ buddhimān
GSP29nysvbh1u:121: sarvaduḥkhocchedaṃ sarvaduḥkhāsaṃvidam apavargaṃ na rocayed iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:123: tad yathā madhuviṣasampṛktānnam anādeyam iti, evaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhānuṣaktam
GSP29nysvbh1u:125: trividhā cāsya śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ, --- uddeśo lakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣā ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:128: tatroddiṣṭasya tattvavyavacchedako dharmao lakṣaṇam/ lakṣitasya yathālakṣaṇam upapadyate na veti pramāṇair avadhāraṇaṃ parīkṣā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:131: yathā --- pramāṇānāṃ prameyasya ca/ uddhiṣṭasya lakṣitasya ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:135: akṣasyākṣasya prativiṣayaṃ vṛttiḥ pratyakṣam/ vṛttis tu --- sannikarṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:137: yadā sannikarṣas tadā jñānaṃ pramitiḥ, yadā jñānam, tadā hānopādānopekṣābuddhayaḥ phalam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:138: anumānaṃ --- mitena liṅgena liṅgino 'rthasya paścān mānam anumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:139: upamānaṃ --- sāmīpyajñānaṃ --- yathā gaur evaṃ gavaya iti/ sāmīpyaṃ tu sāmānyayogaḥ/ śabdaḥ --- śabdyate 'nenārtha ity abhidhīyate jñāpyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:141: pramīyate 'neneti karaṇārthābhidhāno hi pramāṇaśabdaḥ/ tadviśeṣasamākhyāyā api tathaiva vyākhyānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:142: kiṃ punaḥ pramāṇāni prameyam abhisaṃplavante? atha pratiprameyaṃ vyavatiṣṭhanta iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:143: ubhayathā darśanam, ``asty ātmā'' ity āptopadeśāt pratīyate, tatrānumānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:145: --- yuñjānasya yogasamādhijam ``ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogaviśeṣād ātmā pratyakṣa'' iti/ agnir āptopadeśāt pratīyate ``atrāgniḥ''iti, pratyāsīdatā
GSP29nysvbh1u:147_0: vyavasthā punaḥ --- ``agnihotra juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ'' iti, laukikasya svarge na liṅgadarśanam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:147_1: na pratyakṣam / stanayitnuśabde śrūyamāṇe śabdahetor anumānam, tatra na pratyakṣam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:147_2: nāgamaḥ / pāṇau pratyakṣata upalabhyamāne nānumānam, nāgama iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:148: sā ceyaṃ pramitiḥ pratyakṣaparā/ jijñāsitam artham āptopadeśāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:151: liṅgadarśanānumitaṃ ca pratyakṣato didṛkṣate, upalabdhe 'rthe jijñāsā
GSP29nysvbh1u:152: nivarttate/ pūrvoktam udāharaṇam ``agniḥ'' iti/ pramātuḥ pramāṇānāṃ sambhavo 'bhisaṃplavaḥ, asambhavo vyavastheti//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:155: NyS_1,1.4: indriyārthasannikarṣottpannaṃ jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakaṃ pratyakṣam
GSP29nysvbh1u:156: indriyasyārthena sannikarṣād utpadyate yaj jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:157: na tarhīdānīm idaṃ bhavati, ātmā manasā saṃyujyate, mana indriyeṇa,
GSP29nysvbh1u:159: nedaṃ kāraṇāvadhāraṇam --- etāvat pratyakṣe kāraṇam iti, kiṃ tu viśiṣṭakāraṇavacanam iti/ yat pratyakṣajñānasya viśiṣṭakāraṇaṃ tad ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:160: yat tu samānam anumānādijñānasya, na tannivarttata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:162: bhidyamānasya pratyakṣajñānasya nāyaṃ bhidyata iti samānatvān nokta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:163: yāvad arthaṃ vai nāmadheyaśabdās tair arthasampratyayaḥ, arthasampratyayāc ca vyavahāraḥ/ tatredam indriyārthasannikarṣād utpannam arthajñānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:164_0: ``rūpam'' iti vā, ``rasaḥ'' ity evaṃ vā bhavati, rūparasaśabdāś ca viṣayanāmadheyam /
GSP29nysvbh1u:164_1: tena vyapadiśyate jñānaṃ --- rūpam iti jānīte, rasa iti jānīte / nāmadheyaśabdena
GSP29nysvbh1u:164_2: vyapadiśyamānaṃ sat śābdaṃ prasajyate, ata āha --- avyapadeśyam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:165_0: yad idam anupayukte śabdārthasanbandhe 'rthajñānam, na tat nāmadheyaśabdena vyapadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:165_1: gṛhīte 'pi ca śabdārthasambandhe 'syārthasyāyaṃ śabdo nāmadheyam iti / yadā tu so
GSP29nysvbh1u:167: tadā tat pūrvasmād arthajñānān na viśiṣyate, tad arthavijñānaṃ tādṛg eva
GSP29nysvbh1u:168_0: bhavati / tasya tv arthajñānasyānyaḥ samākhyāśabdo nāstīti, yena pratīyamānaṃ vyavahārāya
GSP29nysvbh1u:168_1: lakpeta / na cāpratīyamānena vyavahāraḥ / tasmāj jñeyasyārthasya saṃjñāśabdenetikaraṇayuktena
GSP29nysvbh1u:168_2: nirdiśyate --- rūpam iti jñānam, rasa iti jñānam iti / tad evam arthajñānakāle sa
GSP29nysvbh1u:169: vyāpriyate, vyavahārakāle tu vyāpriyate/ tasmād aśābdam arthajñānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:171: grīṣme marīcayo bhaumenoṣmaṇā saṃsṛṣṭāḥ spandamānā dūrasthasya cakṣuṣā
GSP29nysvbh1u:173: tatrendriyārthasannikarṣād udakam iti jñānam utpadyate, tac ca pratyakṣaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:174: prasajyata ity ata āha --- avyabhicārīti/ yad atasmiṃs tad iti tad vyabhicāri pratyakṣam
GSP29nysvbh1u:175: dūrāc cakṣuṣā hy ayam arthaṃ paśyan nāvadhārayati dhūma iti vā reṇur iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:176: vā/ tad etad indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam anavadhāraṇajñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasajyata ity ata āha --- vyavasāyātmakam iti/ na caitan mantavyam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:177: ātmamanaḥsannikarṣajam evānavadhāraṇajñānam iti/ cakṣuṣā hy ayam arthaṃ paśyan nāvadhārayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:178: % hy ayam arthaṃ paśyan nāvadhārayati,] p.122
GSP29nysvbh1u:179_0: yathā cendriyeṇopalabdham arthaṃ manasopalabhate, evam indriyeṇānavadhārayan manasā
GSP29nysvbh1u:179_1: nāvadhārayati / yac ca tadindriyānavadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ manasānavadhāraṇaṃ tad viśeṣāpekṣaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:179_2: vimarśamātraṃ saṃśayaḥ, na pūrvam iti / sarvatra pratyakṣaviṣaye jñātur
GSP29nysvbh1u:184: anindriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ hi tad iti/ indriyasya vai sato manasa indriyebhyaḥ pṛthagupadeśo dharmabhedāt, bhautikānīndriyāṇi
GSP29nysvbh1u:187: saguṇānāṃ caiṣām indriyabhāva iti, manas tv abhautikaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:188: nāsya saguṇasyendriyabhāva iti/ sati cendriyārthasannikarṣe sannidhim
GSP29nysvbh1u:191: manasaś cendriyabhāvān na vācyaṃ lakṣaṇāntaram iti/ tantrāntarasamācārāc caitat pratyetavyam iti/ paramatam apratiṣiddham anumatam iti hi tantrayuktiḥ/ vyākhyātaṃ pratyakṣam//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:192: NyS_1,1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavac cheṣavat sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ca ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:193: tatpūrvakam ity anena liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandhadarśanaṃ liṅgadarśanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:195: liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambaddhayor darśanena liṅgasmṛtir abhisambadhyate/ smṛtyā liṅgadarśanena cāpratyakṣo 'rtho 'numīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:196: pūrvavad iti --- yatra kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate, yathā meghonnatyā bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:197: śeṣavat tad --- yatra kāryeṇa kāraṇam anumīyate, pūrvodakaviparītam udakaṃ nadyāḥ pūrṇatvaṃ śīghratvañ ca dṛṣṭvā srotaso 'numīyate bhūtā vṛṣṭir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:198: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam --- vrajyāpūrvakam anyatra dṛṣṭasya ṇyatra darśanam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:200: tathā cādityasya, tasmād asty apratyakṣāpy ādityasya vrajyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:201: atha vā pūrvavad iti --- yatra yathāpūrvaṃ pratyakṣabhūtayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:203_0: 'pratyakṣasyānumānam, yathā dhūmenāgnir iti / śeṣavan nāma pariśeṣaḥ, sa ca prasaktapratiṣedhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:203_1: ṇyatrāprasaṅgāc chiṣyamāṇe sampratyayaḥ, yathā sad anityam evamādinā dravyaguṇakarmaṇām
GSP29nysvbh1u:203_2: aviśeṣeṇa sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyebhyo vibhaktasya śabdasya, tasmin dravyakarmaguṇasaṃśaye,
GSP29nysvbh1u:204: ekadravyatvāt, na karma, śabdāntarahetutvāt, yas tu śiṣyate so .yam iti śabdasya guṇatvapratipattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:206: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ nāma --- yatrāpratyakṣe liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandhe kenacid arthena liṅgasya sāmānyād apratyakṣo liṅgī gamyate, yathecchādibhir ātmā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:209: guṇāś ca dravyasaṃsthānāḥ, tad tad eṣāṃ sthānaṃ sa ātmeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:210_0: vibhāgavacanād eva trividham iti siddhe trividhavacanaṃ mahato mahāviṣayasya nyāyasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:210_1: laghīyasā sūtreṇopadeśāt paraṃ vākyalāghavaṃ manyamānasyānyasmin vākyalāghave 'nādaraḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:211: vākyavikalpena pravṛttaḥ siddhānte chale śabdādiṣu ca bahulaṃ samācāraḥ śāstra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:212: sadviṣayaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ sadasadviṣayaṃ cānumānam/ kasmāt?/
GSP29nysvbh1u:214: trikālayuktā arthā anumānena gṛhyante, bhaviṣyatīty anumīyate, bhavatīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:215: cābhūd iti ca, asac ca khalv attam anāgataṃ ceti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:218: prajñātena sāmānyāt prajñāpanīyasya prajñāpanam upamānam iti/ yathā gaur evaṃ gavaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:219: kiṃ punar atropamānena kriyate? yadā khalv ayaṃ gavā samānadharmaṃ pratipadyate tadā pratyakṣatas tam arthaṃ pratipadyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:220_0: samākhyāsambandhapratipattir upamānārtha ity āha / yathā gaur evaṃ gavaya ity upamāne
GSP29nysvbh1u:220_1: prayukte gavā samānadharmam artham indriyārthasannikarṣād upalabhamāno 'sya gavayaśabdaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:222: % gaur evaṃ gavaya ... pratipadyata iti] p.170
GSP29nysvbh1u:225: yathā māṣas tathā māṣaparṇīty upamāne prayukte upamānāt saṃjñāsaṃjñisanbandhaṃ pratipadyamānas tām oṣadhīṃ bhaiṣajyāyāharati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:226: evam anyo 'py upamānasya loke viṣayo bubhutsitavya iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:229: āptaḥ khalu sākṣātkṛtadharmā yathādṛṣṭasyārthasya cikhyāpayiṣayā prayukta
GSP29nysvbh1u:231: sākṣātkaraṇam arthasyāptiḥ, tayā pravartata ity āptaḥ/ ṛṣyāryamlecchānāṃ samānaṃ lakṣaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:233: tathā ca sarveṣāṃ vyavahārāḥ pravarttanta iti/ evam ebhiḥ pramāṇair
GSP29nysvbh1u:236: yasyeha dṛśyate 'rthaḥ sa dṛṣṭārthaḥ/ yasyāmutra pratīyate so 'dṛṣṭārthaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:237: evam ṛṣilaukikavākyānāṃ vibhāga iti/ kimarthaṃ punar idam ucyate? sa na manyeta dṛṣṭārtha evāptopadeśaḥ pramāṇam, arthasyāvadhāraṇād iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:239: kiṃ punar anena pramāṇenārthajātaṃ pramātavyam iti? ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:241: tatrātmā sarvasya draṣṭā sarvasya bhoktā sarvajñaḥ sarvānubhāvī/ tasya bhogāyatanaṃ śarīram/ bhogasādhanānīndriyāṇi/ bhoktavyā indriyārthāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:242_0: bhogo buddhiḥ / sarvārthopalabdhau nendriyāṇi prabhavantīti sarvaviṣayam antaḥkaraṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:242_1: manaḥ / śarīrendriyārthabuddhisukhavedanānāṃ nivṛttikāraṇaṃ pravṛttiḥ, doṣāś ca /
GSP29nysvbh1u:242_2: nāsyedaṃ śarīram apūrvam anuttaraṃ ca, pūrvaśarīrāṇām ādir nāsti, uttareṣām apavargo
GSP29nysvbh1u:243_0: sasādhanasukhaduḥkhopabhogaḥ phalam / duḥkham iti nedam anukūlavedanīyasya sukhasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:243_1: pratīteḥ pratyākhyānam / kiṃ tarhi? janmana evedaṃ sasukhasādhanasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:243_2: duḥkhenāviprayogād vividhabādhanāyogād duḥkham iti samādhibhāvanam upadiśyate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:245: samāhito bhāvayati, bhāvayan nirvidyate, nirviṇṇasya vairāgyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:246: viraktasyāpavarga iti/ janmamaraṇaprabandhocchedaḥ sarvaduḥkhaprahāṇam apavarga iti/ asty anyad api dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:247: prameyam, tadbhedena cāparisaṅkhyeyam; asya tu tattvajñānād apavargo mithyājñānāt saṃsāra ity ata etad upadiṣṭaṃ viśeṣeṇeti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:248: tatrātmā tāvat pratyakṣato na gṛhyate/ sa kim āptopadeśamātrād eva pratipadyata iti? nety ucyate/ anumānāc ca pratipattavya iti/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:250: yajjātīyasyārthasya sannikarṣāt sukham ātmopalabdhavān, tajjātīyam evārthaṃ paśyann upādātum icchati, seyam ādātum icchā
GSP29nysvbh1u:252: niyataviṣaye hi buddhibhedamātre na sambhavati, dehāntaravad iti/ evam ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisandhānāt duḥkhahetau dveṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:254: yajjātīyo 'syārthaḥ sukhahetuḥ prasiddhas tajjātīyam arthaṃ paśyann ādātuṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:255_0: prayatate / ekam anekārthadarśinaṃ darśanapratisandhātāram antareṇa na syāt / niyataviṣaye
GSP29nysvbh1u:255_1: buddhimātre na sambhavati, dehāntaravad iti / etena duḥkhahetau prayatno vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:256: ādadānaḥ sukham upalabhate duḥkham upalabhate, sukhaduḥkhe vedayate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:257: pūrvokta eva hetuḥ/ bubhutsamānaḥ khalv ayaṃ vimṛśati kiṃsvid iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:258_0: vimṛśaṃś ca jānīte idam iti, tad idaṃ jñānaṃ bubhutsāvimarśābhyām abhinnakartṛkaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:258_1: gṛhyamāṇam ātmaliṅgam / pūrvokta eva hetur iti / tatra dehāntaravad iti vibhajyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:258_2: yathānātmavādino dehāntareṣu niyataviṣayā buddhibhedā na pratisandhīyante tathaikadehaviṣayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:260: % tathaikadehaviṣayā api na pratisandhīyeran, aviśeṣāt/] p.188
GSP29nysvbh1u:261: so 'yam ekasattvasya samācāraḥ svayaṃdṛṣṭasya smaraṇam, nānyaddṛṣṭasya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:262: nādṛṣṭasyeti/ evaṃ khalu nānāsattvānāṃ samācāro 'nyadṛṣṭam anyo na smaratīti/ tad etad ubyayam aśakyam anātmavādinā vyavasthāpayitum ity evam upapannam asty ātmeti//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:266: adhikṛtyepsājihāsāprayuktasya tadupāyānuṣṭhānalakṣaṇā samīhā ceṣṭā, sā yatra varttate tac
GSP29nysvbh1u:269: svaviṣayeṣu sādhvasādhuṣu vartante sa eṣām āśrayaḥ tac charīram/ katham
GSP29nysvbh1u:271: % sa eṣām āśrayaḥ tac charīram/ katham arthāśrayaḥ/] p.195
GSP29nysvbh1u:272: yasminn āyatane indriyārthasannikarṣād utpannayoḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ pravartate sa eṣām āśrayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:273: % sukhaduḥkhayoḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ pravartate sa eṣām āśrayaḥ,] p.196
GSP29nysvbh1u:277: jighraty aneneti ghrāṇaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇātīti/ rasayaty aneneti rasanaṃ rasaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:278: gṛhṇātīti/ caṣṭe 'neneti cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyatīti/ tvaksthānam indriyaṃ tvak/
GSP29nysvbh1u:281: śṛṇoty aneneti śrotraṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇātīti/ evaṃ samākhyānirvacanasāmarthyād bodhyaṃ svaviṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇānīndriyāṇīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:282: bhūtebhya iti/ nānāprakṛtīnām eṣāṃ satāṃ viṣayaniyamaḥ, naikaprakṛtīnām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:285: NyS_1,1.13: pṛthivy āpas tejo vāyur ākāśam iti bhūtāni ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:286: saṃjñāśabdaiḥ pṛthagupadeśo bhūtānāṃ vibhaktānāṃ suvacaṃ kāryaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:289: pṛthivyādīnāṃ yathāviniyogaṃ guṇā indriyāṇāṃ yathākramam arthā viṣayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:290: acetanasya karaṇasya buddher jñānaṃ vṛttiḥ cetanasyākartur upalabdhir iti yuktiviruddham arthaṃ pratyācakṣāṇaka ivedam āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:291: NyS_1,1.15: buddhir upalabdhir jñānam ity anarthāntaram ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:292: nācetanasya karaṇasya buddher jñānaṃ bhavitum arhati, tad dhi cetanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:293: syāt, ekaś cāyaṃ cetano dehendriyasaṃghātavyatirikta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:296: smṛtyanumānāgamasaṃśayapratibhāsvapnajñānohāḥ sukhādipratyakṣam icchādayaś ca manaso liṅgāni/ teṣu satsv ayam api ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:299: yugapac ca khalu ghrāṇādīnāṃ gandhādīnāṃ ca sannikarṣeṣu satsu yugapaj jñānāni notpadyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:301: tenānumīyate, asti tat tad indriyasaṃyogi sahakāri nimittāntaram avyāpi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:302: yasyāsannidher notpadyate jñānaṃ sannidheś cotpadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:304: manaḥsaṃyogānapekṣasya hīndriyārthasannikarṣasya jñānahetutve yugapad uptadyeran jñānānīti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:307: mano 'tra buddhir ity abhipretam, budhyate 'neneti buddhiḥ/ so 'yam
GSP29nysvbh1u:308: ārambhaḥ śarīreṇa vācā manasā ca puṇyaḥ pāpaś ca daśavidhaḥ/ tad etat kṛtabhāṣyaṃ dvitīyasūtra
GSP29nysvbh1u:310_0: pravartanā pravṛttihetutvam, jñātāraṃ hi rāgādayaḥ pravartayanti puṇye pāpe vā /
GSP29nysvbh1u:310_1: yatra mithyājñānaṃ tatra rāgadveṣāv iti / pratyātmavedanīyā hīme doṣāḥ kasmāl lakṣaṇato
GSP29nysvbh1u:310_2: nirdiśyanta iti? karmalakṣaṇāḥ khalu raktadviṣṭamūḍhāḥ, rakto hi tat karma kurute
GSP29nysvbh1u:311: vā labhate, tathā dviṣṭas tathā mūḍha iti/ rāgadveṣamohā ity ucyamāne bahu noktaṃ bhavatīti//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:313: utpannasya kvacit sattvanikāye mṛtvā yā punarutpattiḥ sa pretyabhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:315: punarutpattiḥ --- punar dehādibhiḥ sambandhaḥ/ punar ity abhyāsābhidhānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:316: yatra kvacit prāṇabhṛnnikāye vartamānaḥ pūrvopāttān dehādīn jahāti tat praiti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:317: % pūrvopāttān dehādīn jahāti tat praiti/] p.222
GSP29nysvbh1u:318: yat tatrānyatra vā dehādīn anyān upādatte tad bhavati/ pretyabhāvaḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:319: mṛtvā punarjanma, so 'yaṃ janmamaraṇaprabandhābhyāso 'nādir apavargāntaḥ pretyabhāvo veditavya
GSP29nysvbh1u:321_0: sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ phalam / sukhavipākaṃ karma duḥkhavipākaṃ ca / tat punar dehendriyaviṣayabuddhiṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:321_1: satīṣu bhavatīti saha dehādibhiḥ phalam abhipretam / tathā hi pravṛttidoṣajanito
GSP29nysvbh1u:322: % pravṛttidoṣajanito 'rthaḥ phalam etat sarvaṃ bhavati/] p.223
GSP29nysvbh1u:323: tad etat phalam upātam upātaṃ heyam, tyaktaṃ tyaktam upādeyam iti nāsya hānopādānayor niṣṭhā paryavasānaṃ vāsti, sa khalv ayaṃ phalasya hānopādānasrotasohyate loka iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:326_0: bādhanā pīḍā tāpa iti / tayānuviddham anuṣaktam avinirbhāgena vartamānaṃ duḥkhayogād
GSP29nysvbh1u:326_1: duḥkham iti / so 'yaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhenānuviddham iti paśyan duḥkhaṃ jihāsur janmani
GSP29nysvbh1u:328: yatra tu niṣṭhā yatra tu paryavasānaṃ so .yam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:330_0: tena --- duḥkhena janmanā atyantaṃ vimuktir apavargaḥ / katham? upāttasya janmano
GSP29nysvbh1u:330_1: hānam, anyasya cānupādānam / etām avasthām aparyantam apavargaṃ vedayante 'pavargavidaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:330_2: tad abhayam ajaram amṛtyupadaṃ brahma kṣemaprāptir iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:331_0: nityaṃ sukham ātmano mahattvavan mokṣe vyajyate, yenābhivyaktenātyantaṃ vimuktaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:331_1: sukhī bhātīti kecin manyante / teṣāṃ pramāṇābhāvād anupapattiḥ / na pratyakṣaṃ nānumānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:331_2: nāgamo vā vidyate nityaṃ sukham ātmano mahattvavan mokṣe 'bhivyajyata iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:333: ---saṃvedanam --- jñānam iti, tasya hetur vācyo yatas tad utpadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:334: sukhavan nityam iti cet? saṃsārasthasya muktenāviśeṣaḥ/ yathā muktaḥ sukhena tatsaṃvedanena ca sannityenopapannas tathā saṃsārastho 'pi
GSP29nysvbh1u:336_0: abhyanujñāne ca dharmādharmaphalena sāhacaryaṃ yaugapadyaṃ gṛhyeta / yad idam utpattisthāneṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:336_1: dharmādharmaphalaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā saṃvedyate paryāyeṇa, tasya ca nityasaṃvedanasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:336_2: ca sahabhāvo yaugapadyaṃ gṛhyeta, na sukhābhāvo nānabhivyaktir asti, ubhayasya nityatvāt /
GSP29nysvbh1u:337: anityatve hetuvacanam/ atha mokṣe nityasya sukhasya saṃvedanam anityam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:339: ātmamanaḥsaṃyogasya nimittāntarasahitasya hetutvam/ ātmamanaḥsaṃyogo hetur iti cet? evam api tasya sahakāri nimittāntaraṃ vacanīyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:340: dharmasya kāraṇavacanam/ yadi dharmo nimittāntaram? tasya hetur vācyo
GSP29nysvbh1u:341: yataḥ utpadyata iti/ yogasamādhijasya kāryāvasāyavirodhāt prakṣaye
GSP29nysvbh1u:344: tasya kāryāvasāyavirodhāt prakṣaye saṃvedanam atyantaṃ nivartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:345: asaṃvedane cāvidyamānenāviśeṣaḥ/ yadi dharmakṣayāt saṃvedanoparamo nityaṃ sukhaṃ na saṃvedyata iti? kiṃ vidyamānaṃ na saṃvedyate, athāvidyamānam iti nānumānaṃ viśiṣṭe 'stīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:346: aprakṣayaś ca dharmasya niranumānam utpattidharmakatvāt/ yogasamādhijo dharmo na kṣīyata iti nāsty anumānam/ utpattidharmakam anityam iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:347: viparyayasya tv anumānam/ yasya tu saṃvedanoparamo nāsti tena saṃvedanahetur nitya ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:348: nitye ca muktasaṃsārasthayor aviśeṣa ity uktam/ yathā muktasya nityaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:349: sukhaṃ tatsaṃvedanahetuś ca, saṃvedanasya tūparamo nāsti, kāraṇasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:350: nityatvāt, tathā saṃsārasthasyāpīti/ evaṃ ca sati dharmādharmaphalena sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanena sāhacaryaṃ gṛhyeteti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:351: śarīrādisambandhaḥ pratibandhahetur iti cet? na, śarīrādīnām upabhogārthatvāt viparyayasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:354: pratibandhakaḥ, tenāviśeṣo nāstīti/ etac cāyuktam, śarīrādayaḥ upabhogārthās te bhogapratibandhaṃ kariṣyantīty anupapannam; na cāsty anumānam aśarīrasyātmano bhogaḥ kaścid astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:355_0: iṣṭādhigamārthā pravṛttir iti cet? na, aniṣṭoparamārthatvāt / idam anumānam --- iṣṭādhigamārtho
GSP29nysvbh1u:355_1: mokṣopadeśaḥ pravṛttiś ca mumukṣūṇām, nobhayam anarthakam iti / etac cāyuktam, aniṣṭoparamārtho
GSP29nysvbh1u:355_2: mokṣopadeśaḥ pravṛttiś ca mumukṣūṇām iti / neṣṭam aniṣṭenānanuviddhaṃ sambhavatīti
GSP29nysvbh1u:356: sampadyate, aniṣṭahānāya ghaṭamāna iṣṭam api jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:358_0: dṛṣṭātikramaś ca dehādiṣu tulyaḥ / yathā dṛṣṭam anityaṃ sukhaṃ parityajya nityaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:358_1: sukhaṃ kāmayate, evaṃ dehendriyabuddhīr anityā dṛṣṭā atikramya muktasya nityā dehendriyabuddhayaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:360: upapattiviruddham iti cet? samānam/ dehādīnāṃ nityatvaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:361: kalpayitum aśakyam iti? samānaṃ sukhasyāpi nityatvaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ kalpayitum aśakyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:362: ātyantike ca saṃsāraduḥkhābhāve sukhavacanād āgame 'pi saty avirodhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:363: yady api kaścid āgamaḥ syāt muktasyātyantikaṃ sukham iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:364: % kaścid āgamaḥ syāt muktasyātyantikaṃ sukham iti?] p.232
GSP29nysvbh1u:365: sukhaśabda ātyantike duḥkhābhāve prayukta ity evam upapadyate, dṛṣṭo hi duḥkhābhāve sukhaśabdaprayogo bahulaṃ loka iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:367_0: yady ayaṃ mokṣo nityaṃ sukham abhivyajyata iti, nityasukharāgeṇa mokṣāya ghaṭamāno
GSP29nysvbh1u:367_1: na mokṣam adhigacchet, nādhigantum arhatīti / bandhanasamājñāto hi rāgaḥ / na ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:367_2: bandhane saty api kaścin mukta ity upapadyata iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:369: tasmin prahīṇe nāsya nityasukharāgaḥ pratikūlo bhavati? yady evam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:370: muktasya nityaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati, athāpi na bhavati, nāsyobhayoḥ pakṣayor mokṣādhigamo vikalpyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:371: sthānavata eva tarhi saṃśayasya lakṣaṇaṃ vācyam iti tad ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:372: NyS_1,1.23: samānānekadharmopapatter vipratipatter upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaś ca viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:373: samānadharmopapatter viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśaya iti/ sthāṇupuruṣayoḥ samānaṃ dharmam ārohapariṇāhau paśyan pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ ca tayor viśeṣam
GSP29nysvbh1u:374: bubhutsamānaḥ kiṃsvid ity anyataraṃ nāvadhārayati, tadanavadhāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ/ samānam anayor dharmam upalabhe viśeṣam anyatarasya nopalabha ity eṣā buddhir apekṣā ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:375: % nopalabha ity eṣā buddhir apekṣā ---] p.240
GSP29nysvbh1u:376: saṃśayasya pravṛttikā vartate, tena viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:381: viśiṣyante, gandhavattvāt pṛthivy abādhibyo viśiṣyate guṇakarmabhyaś ca /
GSP29nysvbh1u:382: asti ca śabde vibhāgajanyatvaṃ viśeṣaḥ/ tasmin dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma veti sandehaḥ, viśeṣasyobayathā
GSP29nysvbh1u:384: kiṃ dravyasya sato guṇakarmabhyo viśeṣaḥ, āhosvid guṇasya sata iti, atha karmaṇaḥ sata iti? viśeṣāpekṣā --- anyatamasya vyavasthāpakaṃ dharma
GSP29nysvbh1u:386: vipratipatter iti/ vyāhatam ekārthadarśanaṃ vipratipattiḥ, vyāghātaḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:387: virodho 'sahabhāva iti/ asty ātmety ekaṃ darśanam, nāsty ātmety aparam, na ca sadbhāvāsadbhāvau sahaikatra sambhavataḥ, na cānyatarasādhako hetur
GSP29nysvbh1u:389: upalabdhyavayavasthātaḥ khalv api sac codakam upalabhyate taḍāgādiṣu,
GSP29nysvbh1u:390: marīciṣu cāvidyamānam udakam iti, ataḥ kvacid upalabhyamāne
GSP29nysvbh1u:393: anupalabdhyavyavasthātaḥ/ sac ca nopalabyate mūlakīlakodakādi, asac cānutpannaṃ niruddhaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:395: tataḥ kvacid anupalabhyamāne saṃśayaḥ, kiṃ san nopalabyate utāsad iti saṃśayo bhavati/ viśeṣāpekṣā pūrvavat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:396: pūrvaḥ samāno 'nekaś ca dharmo jñeyasthaḥ, upalabdhyanupalabdhī punar jñātṛsthe, etāvatā viśeṣeṇa punarvacanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:400: NyS_1,1.24: yam arhtam adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:401: yam artham āptavyaṃ hātavyaṃ vā vyavasāya tadāptihānopāyam anutiṣṭhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:402: prayojanaṃ tad veditavyam, pravṛttihetutvāt/ imam artham āpsyāmi hāsyāmi veti vyavasāyo 'rthasyādhikāraḥ, evaṃ vyavasīyamāno 'rtho 'dhikriyata
GSP29nysvbh1u:403: NyS_1,1.25: laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānataḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:404: lokasāmānyam anatītā laukikā naisargikaṃ vainayikaṃ buddhyatiśayam
GSP29nysvbh1u:405: aprāptāḥ/ tadviparītāḥ parīkṣakāḥ/ tarkeṇa pramāṇair arthaṃ parīkṣitum
GSP29nysvbh1u:406: arhantīti/ yathā yam arthaṃ laukikā budhyante tathā parīkṣakā api,
GSP29nysvbh1u:408: so 'rtho dṛṣṭāntaḥ/ dṛṣṭāntavirodhena hi pratipakṣāḥ pratiṣeddhavyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:409: bhavantīti, dṛṣṭāntasamādhinā ca svapakṣāḥ sthāpanīyā bhavantīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:411: atha siddhāntaḥ, idam itthambhūtañ cety abhyanujñāyamānam arthajātaṃ siddham, siddhasya saṃsthitiḥ siddhāntaḥ, saṃsthitir itthambhāvavyavasthā dharmaniyamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:424: yathā ghrāṇādīnīnindriyāṇi gandhādaya indriyārhāḥ pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni pramāṇair arthasya grahaṇam iti//28//
GSP29nysvbh1u:426: yathā nāsata ātmalābhaḥ, na sata ātmahānam, niratiśayāś cetanāḥ dehendriyamanaḥsu viṣayeṣu tattatkāraṇeṣu ca viśeṣa iti sāṅkhyānām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:427: puruṣakarmādinimitto bhūtasargaḥ, karmahetavo doṣāḥ pravṛttiś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:428: svaguṇaviśiṣṭāś cetanāḥ, asad utpadyate utpannaṃ nirudhyata iti yogānām//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:430: yasyārhtasya siddhāv anye 'rthā anuṣajyante, na tair vinā so 'rthaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:434_1: jñātur jñānasādhanāni, gandhādiguṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ guṇādhikaraṇam aniyataviṣayāś
GSP29nysvbh1u:434_2: cetanā iti pūrvārthasiddhāv ete 'rhāḥ sidhyanti na tair vinā so 'rthaḥ sambhavatīti //30 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:436_0: yatra kiñcid arthajātam aparīkṣitam abhyupagamyate, astu dravyaṃ śabdaḥ sa tu nityo
GSP29nysvbh1u:436_1: 'thānitya iti? dravyasya sato nityatānityatā vā tadviśeṣaḥ parīkṣyate, so 'bhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:439: daśāvayavān eke naiyāyikā vākye sañcakṣate, jijñāsā saṃśayaḥ śakyaprāptiḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:440: prayojanaṃ saṃśayavyudāsa iti, te kasmān nocyanta iti/ tatrāpratīyamāne
GSP29nysvbh1u:442: apratīyamānam arthaṃ kasmāj jijñāsate? taṃ tattvato jñātaṃ hāsyāmi vopādāsya upekṣiṣye veti/ tā etā hānopādānopekṣābuddhayas
GSP29nysvbh1u:444_0: jijñāsate / sā khalv ayam asādhanam arthasyeti / jijñāsādhiṣṭhānaṃ saṃśayaś ca vyāhatadharmopasaṅghātāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:444_1: tattvajñāne pratyāsannaḥ, vyāhatayor hi dharmayor anyataratattvaṃ bhavitum arhatīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:445: asādhanam arthasyeti/ pramātuḥ pramāṇāni prameyādhigamārthāni, sā śakyaprāptir na sādhakasya vākyasya bhāgena yujyate pratijñādivad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:446: prayojanaṃ tattvāvadhāraṇam arthasādhakasya vākyasya phalaṃ naikadeśa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:448: tattvajñānābhyanujñānārtham, na tv ayaṃ sādhakavākyaikadeśa iti/ prakaraṇe tu jijñāsādayaḥ samarthā avadhāraṇīyārthopakārāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:450: tattvārthasādhakabhāvāt tu pratijñādayaḥ sādhakavākyasya bhāgā ekadeśā avayavā iti// 32 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:453: prajñāpanīyena dharmeṇa dharmiṇo viśiṣṭasya parigrahavacanaṃ pratijñā sādhyanirdeśaḥ anityaḥ śabda iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:455: udāharaṇena sāmānyāt sādhyasya dharmasya sādhanaṃ prajñāpanaṃ hetuḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:456: sādhye pratisandhāya dharmam udāharaṇe ca pratisandhāya tasya sādhanatāvacanaṃ hetuḥ utpattidharmakatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:460: kim etāvad dhetulakṣaṇam iti? nety ucyate/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:462: udāharaṇavaidharmyāc ca sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ/ katham? anityaḥ śabda utpattidharmakatvāt, anutpattidharmakaṃ nityaṃ yathātmādidravyam iti//35//
GSP29nysvbh1u:464: sādhyena sādharmyaṃ samānadharmatā/ sādhyasādharmyāt kāraṇāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:466: tasya dharmas taddharmaḥ, tasya --- sādhyasya/ sādhyaṃ ca dvividhaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:467: dharmiviśiṣṭo vā dharmaḥ śabdasyānityatvam, dharmaviśiṣṭo vā dharmy
GSP29nysvbh1u:468: anityaḥ śabda iti/ ihottaraṃ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyata iti/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:469: pṛthagdharmavacanāt/ tasya dharmas taddharmas tasya bhāvas taddharmabhāvaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:470_0: sa yasmin dṛṣṭānte vartate sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyasādharmyād utpattidharmakatvat taddharmabhāvī
GSP29nysvbh1u:470_1: bhavati, sa codāharaṇam iṣyate / tatra yad utpadyate tad utpattidharmakam / tac ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:471: jahāti nirudhyata ity anityam/ evam utpattidharmakatvaṃ sādhanam
GSP29nysvbh1u:473: so 'yam ekasmin dvayor dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sādharmyād vyavasthita upalabhyate, taṃ dṛṣṭānta upalabhamānaḥ śabde 'py anuminoti
GSP29nysvbh1u:474: --- śabdo 'py utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ sthālyādivad iti, udāhriyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:477: dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam iti prakṛtam/ sādhyavaidharmyād ataddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam iti/ anityaḥ śabda utpattidharmakatvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:478: anutpattidharmakaṃ nityam ātmādi, so 'yam ātmādir dṛṭṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavaidharmyād anutpattidharmakatvād ataddharmabhāvī --- yo 'sau
GSP29nysvbh1u:479: sādhyasya dharmo 'nityatvaṃ sa tasmin na bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:481_0: atrātmādau dṛṣṭānta utpattidharmakatvasyābhāvād anityatvaṃ na bhavatīty upalabhamānaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:481_1: śabde viparyayam anuminoty utpattidharmakatvasya bhāvād anityaḥ śabda iti / sādharmyoktasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:481_2: hetoḥ sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam / vaidharmyoktasya hetoḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:483: pūrvasmin dṛṣṭānte yau tau dharmau sādhyasādhanabhūtau paśyati sādhye 'pi
GSP29nysvbh1u:484: tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvam anuminoti/ uttarasmin dṛṣṭānte tayor dharmayor ekasyābhāvād itarasyābhāvaṃ paśyati tayor ekasya bhāvād itarasya bhāvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:485: sādhye 'numinotīti/ tad etad dhetuvābhāseṣu na sambhavatīty ahetavo
GSP29nysvbh1u:488: tad idaṃ hetūdāharaṇayoḥ sāmarthyaṃ paramasūkṣmaṃ duḥkhabodhaṃ paṇḍitarūpavedanīyam iti//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:489: NyS_1,1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣas tathety upasaṃhāro na tatheti vā
GSP29nysvbh1u:492: sādhyasādharmyayukte udāharaṇe sthālyādi dravyam utpattidharmakam anityaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:493: dṛṣṭam, tathā śabda utpattidharmaka iti sādhyasya śabdasyotpattidharmakatvam upasaṃhriyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:495: sādhyavaidharmyayukte punar udāharaṇa ātmādi dravyam anutpattidharmakaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam, na ca tathā śabda iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:497: upasaṃhriyate/ tad idam upasaṃhāradvaitam udāharaṇadvaitād bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:499: dvividhasya punar hetor dvividhasya codāharaṇasyopasaṃhāradvaite ca samānam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:501: sādharmyokte vā vaidharmyokte vā yathodāharaṇam upasaṃhriyate, tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti nigamanam --- nigamyante 'neneti
GSP29nysvbh1u:503_0: --- sambadhyante / tatra sādharmokte tāvad dhetau vākyam anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñā /
GSP29nysvbh1u:503_1: utpattidharmakatvād iti hetuḥ / utpattidharmakaṃ sthālyādi dravyam anityam ity udāharaṇam /
GSP29nysvbh1u:504: upanayaḥ/ tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti nigamanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:507: anutpattidharmakam ātmādi dravyaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam, na ca tathānutpattidharmakaḥ śabdaḥ tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda
GSP29nysvbh1u:509: avayavasamudāye ca vākye sambhūyetaretarābhisambandhāt pramāṇāny arthān
GSP29nysvbh1u:510: sādhayantīti/ sambhavas tāvat śabdaviṣayā pratijñā, āptopadeśasya pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ pratisandhānād anṛṣeś ca svātantryānupapatteḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:511_0: anumānaṃ hetuḥ, udāharaṇe sādṛśyapratipatteḥ / tac codāharaṇabhāṣye vyākhyātam /
GSP29nysvbh1u:511_1: pratyakṣaviṣayam udāharaṇaṃ dṛṣṭenādṛṣṭasiddheḥ / upamānam upanayaḥ tathety upasaṃhārāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:513: itaretarābhisambandho 'pi --- asatyāṃ pratijñāyām anāśrayā hetvādayo na pravarteran/
GSP29nysvbh1u:514: asati hetau kasya sādhanabhāvaḥ pradarśyeta/ udāharaṇe sādhye ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:515: kasyopasaṃhāraḥ syāt kasya cāpadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanaṃ syād iti/ asaty udāharaṇe kena sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā sādhyasādhanam
GSP29nysvbh1u:516: upādīyeta, kasya vā sādharmyavaśād upasaṃhāraḥ pravarteta/ upanayaṃ cāntareṇa sādhye 'nupasaṃhṛtaḥ sādhako dharmo nārthaṃ sādhayet/
GSP29nysvbh1u:517: nigamanābhāve cānabhiyuktasambandhānāṃ pratijñādīnām ekārthena pravartanaṃ tatheti pratipādanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:519: pratijñārthaḥ/ udāharaṇena samānasya viparītasya vā sādhyasya dharmasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:520_1: sādhanabhūtasya dharmasya sādhyena dharmeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyopapādanam upanayārthaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:522: sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalyāj jātinigrahasthānabahutvaṃ prakramate/ avyavasthāpya khalu dharmayoḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:523: sādhyasādhanabhāvam udāharaṇe jātivādī pratyavatiṣṭhate/ vyavasthite tu khalu dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve dṛṣṭāntasthe gṛhyamāṇe sādhanabhūtasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:524: dharmasya hetutvenopādānaṃ na sādharmyamātrasya na vaidharmyamātrasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:527: ata ūrdhvaṃ tarko lakṣaṇīya ity athedam ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:530: avijñāyamānatattve 'rthe jijñāsā tāvaj jāyate jānīyemam artham iti/ atha jijñāsitasya vastuno vyāhatau dharmau vibhāgena vimṛśati ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:532: kiṃsvid ittham āhosvin nettham iti/ vimṛśyamānayor dharmayor ekaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:533: kāraṇopapattyānujānāti, sambhavaty asmin kāraṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ hetur iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:534: kāraṇopapattyā syād evam etan netarad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:535: tatra nidarśanam --- yo 'yaṃ jñātā jñātavyam arthaṃ jānīte taṃ tattvato
GSP29nysvbh1u:536: jānīyeti jijñāsā/ sa kim utpattidharmako 'thānutpattidharmaka iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:537_1: tam anujānāti / yady ayam anutpattidharmakaḥ, tataḥ svakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalam anubhavati
GSP29nysvbh1u:537_2: jñātā, duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttaram uttaraṃ pūrvasya pūrvasya kāraṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:537_3: uttarottarāpāye tadanantarāpāyād apavarga iti syātāṃ saṃsārāpavargau /
GSP29nysvbh1u:539: utpattidharmake jñātari punar na syātām/ utpannaḥ khalu jñātā
GSP29nysvbh1u:540_0: dehendriyabuddhivedanābhiḥ sambadhyata iti nāsyedaṃ svakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalam utpannaś
GSP29nysvbh1u:540_1: ca bhūtvā na bhavatīti tasyāvidyamānasya niruddhasya vā svakṛtakarmaṇaḥ phalopabhogo
GSP29nysvbh1u:541: śarīraviyogaś cātyantaṃ na syād iti yatra kāraṇam anupapadyamānaṃ paśyati tan nānujānāti/ so 'yam evaṃlakṣaṇa ūhas tarka ity ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:542: kathaṃ punar ayaṃ tattvajñānārtho na tattvajñānam eveti? anavadhāraṇāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:543: anujānāty ayam ekataraṃ dharmaṃ kāraṇopapattyā, na tv avadhārayati na vyavasyati na niścinoti evam evedam iti/ kathaṃ tattvajñānārtha iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:544: tattvajñānaviṣayābhyanujñālakṣaṇānugrahabhāvitāt prasannād anatarapramāṇasāmarthyāt tattvajñānam utpadyata ity evaṃ tattvajñānārtha
GSP29nysvbh1u:546: so 'yaṃ tarkaḥ pramāṇāni pratisandadhānaḥ pramāṇābhyanujñānāt pramāṇasahito vāde 'padiṣṭa ity avijñātatattvam anujānāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:548: yathā so 'rho bhavati tasya tathābhāvaḥ tattvam, aviparyayo
GSP29nysvbh1u:551: sthāpanā sādhanam, pratiṣedha upālambhaḥ/ tau sādhanopālambhau pakṣapratipakṣāśrayau vyatiṣaktāv anubandhena pravartamānau pakṣapratipakṣāv ity ucyete/ tayor anyatarasya nivṛttir
GSP29nysvbh1u:553: nedaṃ pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ sambhavatīti --- eko hi pratijñātam arthaṃ hetutaḥ sthāpayati pratiṣiddhaṃ coddharati dvitīyasya/
GSP29nysvbh1u:554: dvitīyena sthāpanāhetuḥ pratiṣidhyate tasyaiva pratiṣedhahetuś coddhriyate sa nivartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:557_0: ubhābhyām evārthāvadhāraṇam ity āha / kayā yuktyā? ekasya sambhavo dvitīyasyāsambhavaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:557_1: tāv etau sambhavāsambhavau vimarśaṃ saha nivarttayataḥ --- ubhayasambhave ubhayāsambhave
GSP29nysvbh1u:558: vimṛśyeti vimarśaṃ kṛtvā/ so 'yaṃ vimarśaḥ pakṣapratipakṣāv avadyotya
GSP29nysvbh1u:559: nyāyaṃ pravartayatīty upādīyata iti/ etac ca viruddhayor ekadharmisthayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:560: boddhavyam/ yatra tu dharmisāmānyagatau viruddhau dharmau hetutaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:561: sambhavataḥ tatra samuccayaḥ, hetuto 'rthasya tathābhāvopapatteḥ/ yathā
GSP29nysvbh1u:562: --- kriyāvad dravyam iti lakṣaṇavacane yasya dravyasya kriyāyogo hetutaḥ sambhavati tat kriyāvat, yasya na sambhavati tad akriyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:563: ekadharmisthayoś ca viruddhayor dharmayor ayugapadbhāvinoḥ kālavikalpaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:564: yathā --- tad eva dravyaṃ kriyāyuktaṃ kriyāvat, anutpannoparatakriyaṃ punar akriyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:565: na cāyaṃ nirṇaye niyamo vimṛśyaiva pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇaya iti, kiṃ tv indriyārthasannikarṣotpannapratyakṣe 'rthāvadhāraṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:566: nirṇaya iti, parīkṣāviṣaye tu vimṛśya pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇayaḥ/ vāde śāstre ca vimarśavarjam// 41 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:568: dvitīyāhnikam tisraḥ kathā bhavanti --- vādo jalpo vitaṇḍā ceti/ tāsām ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:569: NyS_1,2.1: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapannaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:573: nānādhikaraṇasthau viruddhau na pakṣapratipakṣau, yathā --- nitya ātmā anityā buddhir iti/ parigraho 'bhyupagamavyavasthā/ so 'yam
GSP29nysvbh1u:574_0: pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ / tasya viśeṣanaṃ pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ, pramāṇais
GSP29nysvbh1u:574_1: tarkeṇa ca sādhanam upālambhaś cāsmin kriyata iti / sādhanaṃ sthāpanā / upālambhaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:574_2: pratiṣedhaḥ / tau sādhanopālambhāv ubhayor api pakṣayor vyatiṣaktāv anubaddhau ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:574_3: yāvad eko nivṛtta ekataro vyavasthita iti nivṛttasyopālambho vyavasthitasya sādhanam
GSP29nysvbh1u:576: jalpe nigrahasthānaviniyogād vāde tatpratiṣedhaḥ/ pratiṣedhe kasyacid abhyanujñānārthaṃ siddhāntāviruddha iti vacanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:578: ``siddhāntam abhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddha'' iti hetvābhāsasya nigrahasthānasyābhyanujñā vāde/ pañcāvayavopapanna iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:579: ``hīnam anyatamenāpy avayavena nyūnam'' ``hetūdāharaṇādhikam adhikam'' iti caitayor abhyanujñānārtham iti/ avayaveṣu pramānatarkāntarbhāve pṛthak
GSP29nysvbh1u:580: pramāṇatarkagrahaṇaṃ sādhanopālambhavyatiṣaṅgajñāpanārtham/ anyathobhāv api pakṣau sthāpanāpravṛttau vāda iti syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:582: antareṇāpi cāvayavasambandhaṃ pramāṇāny arthaṃ sādhayantīti dṛṣṭam, tenāpi kalpena sādhanopālambhau vāde bhavata iti jñāpayati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:584: jalpa iti mā vijñāyi, chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambha eva jalpaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:585: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambho vād eveti mā vijñāyīty evamarthaṃ pṛthak pramānatarkagrahaṇam iti// 1 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:588: chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambha iti, chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanam upālambhaś cāsmin kriyata iti evaṃviśeṣaṇo jalpaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:589: na khalu vai chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanaṃ kasyacid arthasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:590: sambhavati, pratiṣedhārthataivaiṣāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇe viśeṣalakṣaṇe ca śrūyate --- ``vacanavighāto 'rthavikalpopapattyā chalam'' iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:594: viśeṣalakṣaṇeṣv api yathāsvam iti/ na caitad vijānīyāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:595: pratiṣedhārthatayaivārthaṃ sādhayantīti, chalajātinigrahasthānopālambho jalpa ity evam apy ucyamāne vijñāyata etad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:597: svapakṣarakṣaṇārthatvāt/ na svatantrāṇāṃ sādhanabhāvaḥ --- yat tat pramāṇair arthasya sādhanaṃ tatra chalajātinigrahasthānānām aṅgabhāvo
GSP29nysvbh1u:598: rakṣaṇārthatvāt/ tāni hi prayujyamānāni parapakṣavighātena svapakṣaṃ rakṣanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:600_1: kaṇṭakaśākhāvaraṇavat'' iti / yaś cāsau pramāṇaiḥ pratipakṣasyopālambhas tasya caitāni
GSP29nysvbh1u:600_2: prayujyamānāni pratiṣedhavighātāt sahakārīṇi bhavanti / tad evam aṅgībhūtanāṃ chalādīnām
GSP29nysvbh1u:600_3: upādānaṃ jalpe, na svatantrāṇāṃ sādhanabhāvaḥ / upālambhe tu svātantryam
GSP29nysvbh1u:603_0: sa jalpo vitaṇḍā bhavati / kiṃviśeṣaṇaḥ? pratipakṣasthāpanayā hīnaḥ / yau tau samānādhikaraṇau
GSP29nysvbh1u:603_1: viruddhau dharmau pakṣāv ity uktaṃ tayor ekataraṃ vaitaṇḍiko na sthāpayatīti prapakṣapratiṣedhenaiva
GSP29nysvbh1u:604_0: astu tarhi sa pratipakṣahīno vitaṇḍā? yad vai khalu tat parapratiṣedhalakṣaṇaṃ vākyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:604_1: sa vaitaṇḍikasya pakṣaḥ, na tv asau sādhyaṃ kañcid arthaṃ pratijñāya sthāpayatīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:605: hetulakṣaṇābhāvād ahetavo hetusāmānyād dhetuvad ābhāsamānāḥ/ ta ime ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:609: vyabhicāra ekatrāvyavasthitiḥ/ sahavyabhicāreṇa vartata iti svayabhicāraḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:611: nidarśanam --- nityaḥ śabdo 'sparśatvāt, sparśavān kumbho 'nityo dṛṣṭaḥ na ca tathā sparśavān śabdas tasmād asparśatvān nityaḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:613: dṛṣṭānte sparśavattvam anityatvaṃ ca dharmau na sādhyasādhanabhūtau gṛhyete sparśavāṃś cāṇur nityaś ceti/ ātmādau ca dṛṣṭānte
GSP29nysvbh1u:615: ``udāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ'' ity asparśatvād iti hetur nityatvaṃ vyabhicarati, asparśā buddhir anityā ceti/ evaṃ dvividhe 'pi
GSP29nysvbh1u:616: dṛṣṭānte vyabhicārāt sādhyasādhanabhāvo nāstīti lakṣaṇābhāvād ahetur iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:617: nityatvam apy eko 'nto 'nityatvam apy eko ṇta ekasminn ante vidyata iti aikāntikaḥ viparyayād anaikāntika ubhayāntavyāpakatvād iti// 5 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:619: taṃ viruṇaddhīti tadvirodhy abhyupetaṃ siddhāntaṃ vyāhantīti/ yathā so 'yaṃ vikāro vyakter apaiti nityatvapratiṣedhāt ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:621: na nityo vikāra upapadyata apeto 'pi vikāro 'sti vināśapratiṣedhāt/ so
GSP29nysvbh1u:622: 'yaṃ nityatvapratiṣedhād iti/ hetur vyakter apeto 'pi vikāro 'stīty anena svasiddhāntena virudhyate/ katham? vyaktir ātmalābhaḥ/ apāyaḥ pracyutiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:623: yady ātmalābhāt pracyuto vikāro 'sti nityatvapratiṣedho nopapadyate/ yad vyakter apetasyāpi vikārasyāstitvaṃ tat khalu nityatvam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:626_0: yad ātmalābhāt pracyavate tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭam, yad asti na tad ātmalābhāt pracyavate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:626_1: astitvaṃ cātmalābhāt pracyutir iti ca viruddhāv etau dharmau na saha sambhavata iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:626_2: so 'yaṃ hetur yaṃ siddhāntam āśritya pravartate tam eva vyāhantīti // 6 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:627: NyS_1,2.7: yasmāt prakaraṇacintā sa nirṇayārtham apadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:628: vimarśādhiṣṭhānau pakṣapratipakṣāv ubhāv anavasitau prakaraṇam, tasya cintā vimarśāt prabhṛti prāṅ nirṇayād yat samīkṣaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:630: sā jijñāsā yatkṛtā sa nirṇayārthaṃ prayukta ubhayapakṣasāmyāt prakaraṇam anativartamānaḥ prakaraṇasamo nirṇayāya na prakalpate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:631_0: prajñāpanaṃ tv anityaḥ śabdo nityadharmānupalabdher iti, anupalabhyamānan ity adharmakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:631_1: nityaṃ dṛṣṭam sthālyādi / nityaḥ śabdo vānityadharmānupalabdheḥ anupalabhyamānānityadharmakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:633: yatra samāno dharmaḥ saṃśayakāraṇaṃ hetutvenopādīyate sa saṃśayasamaḥ savyabhicāra eva/
GSP29nysvbh1u:634_0: yā tu vimarśasya viśeṣāpekṣitā ubhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhiś ca sā prakaraṇaṃ pravartayati /
GSP29nysvbh1u:634_1: yathā śabde nityadharmo nopalabhyata evam anityadharmo 'pi / seyam ubhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhiḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:637: katham? viparyaye hi prakaraṇanivṛtteḥ --- yadi nityadharmaḥ śabde gṛhyeta na syāt prakaraṇam, yadi na syāt prakaraṇam, yadi vānityadharmo gṛhyeta
GSP29nysvbh1u:638: evam api nivarteta prakaraṇam/ so 'yaṃ hetur ubhau pakṣau pravartayann anyatarasya nirṇayāya na prakalpate// 7 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:640: dravyaṃ chāyeti sādhyam, gatimattvād iti hetuḥ sādhyenāviśiṣṭaḥ sādhanīyatvāt sādhyasamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:642_0: ayam apy asiddhatvāt sādhyavat prajñāpayitavyaḥ / sādhyaṃ tāvad etat kiṃ puruṣavac
GSP29nysvbh1u:642_1: chāyāpi gacchaty āhosvid āvarakadravye saṃsarpaty āvaraṇasantānād asannidhisantāno
GSP29nysvbh1u:644: sarpatā khalu dravyeṇa yo yas tejobhāga āvriyate tasya tasyāsannidhir evāvicchinno gṛhyata iti/ āvaraṇaṃ tu prāptipratiṣedhaḥ// 8 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:646: kālātyayena yukto yasyārthaikadeśo 'padiśyamānasya sa kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ kālātīta ity ucyate/ nidarśanam --- nityaḥ śabdaḥ saṃyogavyaṅgyatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:648: prāg ūrdhvaṃ ca vyakter avasthitaṃ rūpaṃ pradīpaghaṭasaṃyogena vyajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:649: tathā ca śabdo 'py avasthito bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogena vyajyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:650_0: dāruparaśusaṃyogena vā, tasmāt samyogavyaṅgyatvān nityaḥ śabda iti; ayam ahetuḥ kālātyayāpadeśāt /
GSP29nysvbh1u:650_1: vyañjakasya saṃyogasya kālaṃ na vyaṅgyasya rūpasya vyaktir atyeti / sati pradīpasaṃyoge
GSP29nysvbh1u:650_2: rūpasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati, na nivṛtte saṃyoge rūpaṃ gṛhyate / nivṛtte dāruparaśusaṃyoge
GSP29nysvbh1u:650_3: dūrasthena śabdaḥ śrūyate vibhāgakāle / seyaṃ śabdasya vyaktiḥ saṃyogakālam atyetīti
GSP29nysvbh1u:651: saṃyoganirmitā bhavati/ kasmāt? kāraṇābhāvād dhi kāryābhāva iti/ evam udāharaṇasādharmyasyābhāvād asādhanam ayaṃ hetur hetvābhāsa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:655: ity etadvacanād viparyāsenokto hetur udāharaṇasādharmyāt tathā vaidharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na jahāti/ ajahaddhetulakṣaṇaṃ na hetvābhāso
GSP29nysvbh1u:657: ``avayavaviparyāsavacanam aprāptakālam'' iti nigrahasthānam uktam, tad evedaṃ punar ucyata iti, atas tan na sūtrārthaḥ// 9 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:660: na sāmānyalakṣaṇe chalaṃ śakyam udāhartum, vibhāge tūdāharaṇāni// 10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:662: NyS_1,2.11 : tat trividhaṃ vākchalaṃ sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalam ceti ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:666: navakambalo 'yaṃ māṇavaka iti prayogaḥ/ atra navaḥ kambalo 'syeti vaktur
GSP29nysvbh1u:667: abhiprāyaḥ/ vigrahe tu viśeṣaḥ, na samāse/ tatrāyaṃ chalavādī vaktur
GSP29nysvbh1u:668: abhiprāyād avivakṣitam anyam arthaṃ nava kambalā asyeti tāvad abhihitaṃ bhavateti kalpayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:670: kalpayitvā cāsambhavena pratiṣedhati eko 'sya kambalaḥ kuto nava kambalā
GSP29nysvbh1u:672: tad idaṃ sāmānyaśabde vāci chalaṃ vākchalam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:674_1: kambalo 'syeti nava kambalā asyeti; etasmin prayukte yeyaṃ kalpanā nava kambalā asyety
GSP29nysvbh1u:674_2: etadbhavatābhihitaṃ tac ca na sambhavatīti, etasyām anyatarābhidhānakalpanāyāṃ viśeṣo
GSP29nysvbh1u:674_3: vaktavyaḥ / yasmād viśeṣo 'rthaviśeṣeṣu vijñāyate 'yam artho 'nenābhihita iti / sa
GSP29nysvbh1u:677: asyābhidhānasyāyam artho 'bhidheya iti samānaḥ sāmānyaśabdasya, viśeṣo
GSP29nysvbh1u:678: viśiṣṭaśabdasya/ prayuktapūrvāś ceme śabdā arthe prayujyante nāprayuktapūrvāḥ/ prayogaś cārthasampratyayārthaḥ/ arthapratyayāc ca vyavahāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:680_0: tatraivam arthagatyarthe śabdaprayoge sāmarthyāt sāmānyaśabdasya prayoganiyamaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:680_1: ajāṃ grāmaṃ naya sarpir āhāra brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayeti sāmānyaśabdāḥ santo 'rthāvayaveṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:682: kriyādeśanāsambhavāt/ evam ayaṃ sāmānyaśabdo navakambala iti yo 'rthaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:683: sambhavati navaḥ kambalo 'syeti tatra pravartate, yas tu na sambhavait nava kambalā asyeti tatra na pravartate/ so 'yam
GSP29nysvbh1u:686: aho khalv asau brāhmaṇo vidyācaraṇasampanna ity ukte kaścid āha sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampad
GSP29nysvbh1u:689: --- yadi brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṃasampat sambhavati vrātye 'pi sambhavet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:690_0: vrātyo 'pi brāhmaṇaḥ, so 'py astu vidyācaraṇasampanna iti / yad vivakṣitam artham
GSP29nysvbh1u:690_1: āpnoti cātyeti ca tad atisāmānyam / yathā brāhmaṇatvaṃ vidyācaraṇasampadaṃ kvacid
GSP29nysvbh1u:690_2: āpnoti kvacid atyeti / sāmānyanimittaṃ chalaṃ sāmānyacchalam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:691_0: asya ca pratyavasthānam --- avivakṣitahetukasya viṣayānuvādaḥ praśaṃsārthatvād vākyasya;
GSP29nysvbh1u:691_1: tad atrāsambhūtārthakalpanānupapattiḥ / yathā sambhavanty asmin kṣetre śālaya iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:692: pravṛttiviṣayas tu kṣetraṃ praśasyate; so 'yaṃ kṣetrānuvādaḥ nāsmin śālayo
GSP29nysvbh1u:693: vidhīyanta iti; bījāt tu śālinirvṛttiḥ satī na vivakṣitā/ evaṃ sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampad iti sampadviṣayo brāhmaṇatvaṃ na sampaddhetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:694: na cātra hetur vivakṣitaḥ/ viṣayānuvādas tv ayaṃ praśaṃsārthatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:695_0: vākyasya, sati brāhmaṇatve sampaddhetuḥ samartha iti / vis'yaṃ ca praśaṃsatā vākyena
GSP29nysvbh1u:695_1: yathāhetutaḥ phalanirvṛttir na pratyākhyāyate / tad evaṃ sati vacanavighāto 'sambhūtārthakalpanayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:698: dṛṣṭasyānyatra prayogaḥ, tasya nirdeśe dharmavikalpanirdeśe/ yathā mañcāḥ krośantīti arthasadbhāvena
GSP29nysvbh1u:699: mañcasthāḥ puruṣāḥ krośanti na tu mañcāḥ krośanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:701: bhaktyā prayoge prādhānyena kalpanam upacāraviṣayaṃ chalam upacāracchalam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:702: upacāro nītārthaḥ sahacaraṇādinimittena, atadbhāve tadvad abhidhānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:704_0: atra samādhiḥ --- prasiddhe prayoge vaktur yathābhiprāyaṃ śabdārthayor abhyanujñā
GSP29nysvbh1u:704_1: pratiṣedhā vā na cchandataḥ / pradhānabhūtasya śabdasya bhāktasya ca guṇabhūtasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:704_2: prayoga ubhayor lokasiddhaḥ / siddhe prayoge yathā vaktur abhiprāyas tathā śabdārthāv
GSP29nysvbh1u:705_0: cchandataḥ / yadi vaktā pradhānaśabdaṃ prayuṅkte yathābhūtasyābhyanujñā pratiṣedho
GSP29nysvbh1u:705_1: vā, na cchandataḥ / atha guṇabhūtam, tadā guṇabhūtasya / yatra tu vaktā guṇabhūtaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:706: pratiṣedhati, svamanīṣayā pratiṣedho 'sau bhavati na paropālambha iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:708: na vākchalād upacāracchalaṃ bhidyate tasyāpy arthāntarakalpanāyā aviśeṣāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:709: ihāpi sthānyartho guṇaśabdaḥ pradhānaśabdaḥ sthānārtha iti kalpayitvā pratiṣidhyata iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:715: NyS_1,2.17 : aviṣeṣe vā kiñcit sādharmyād ekacchalaprasaṅaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:716: chalasya dvitvam abhyanujñāya tritvaṃ pratiṣidhyate kiñcit sādharmyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:717: yathā cāyaṃ hetus tritvaṃ pratiṣedhati tathā dvitvam apy abhyanujñātaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:718: pratiṣedhati, vidyate hi kiñcit sādharmyaṃ dvayor apīti/ atha dvitvaṃ kiñcitsādharmyān na nivartate, tritvam api na nivartsyati//
GSP29nysvbh1u:721: prayukte hi hetau yaḥ prasaṅgo jāyate sa jātiḥ/ sa ca prasaṅgaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:727_0: viparītā vā kutsitā vā pratipattir vipratipattiḥ / vipratipadyamānaḥ parājayaṃ prāpnoti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:727_1: nigrahasthānaṃ khalu parājayaprāptiḥ / apratipattis tv ārambhaviṣaye anārambhaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:727_2: pareṇa sthāpitaṃ vā na pratiṣedhati pratiṣedhaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:728: vā noddharati/ asamāsāc ca naite eva nigrahasthāne iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:729: kiṃ punar dṛṣṭāntavaj jātinigrahasthānayor abhedo 'tha siddhāntavad bheda ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:732: tayoś ca vipratipattyapratipattyor vikalpān nigrahasthānabahutvam/ nānā kalpo vikalpaḥ, vividho vā kalpo vikalpaḥ/ tatra ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:733: apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam ity apratipattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:735: ime pramāṇādayaḥ padārthā uddiṣṭāḥ, yathoddeśaṃ lakṣitāḥ, yathālakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣiṣyanta iti trividhā cāsya śāstrasya pravṛttir veditavyeti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:736: iti vātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:738: ata ūrdhvaṃ pramāṇādiparīkṣā/ sā ca ``vimṛśya pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇayaḥ'' ity agre vimarṣa eva parīkṣyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:739: NyS_2,1.1 : samānānekadharmādhyavasāyād anyataradharmādhyavasāyād vā na saṃśayaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:740: samānasya dharmasyādhyavasāyāt saṃśayo na dharmamātrāt/ atha vā samānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:741: anayor dharmam upalabha iti dharmadharmigrahaṇe saṃśayābhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:743: atha vā samānadharmādhyavasāyād arthāntarabhūte dharmiṇi saṃśayo
GSP29nysvbh1u:744_0: 'nupapannaḥ, na jātu rūpasyārthāntarabhūtasyādhyavasāyād arthāntarabhūte sparśe saṃśaya
GSP29nysvbh1u:744_1: iti / atha vā na adhyavasāyād arthāvadhāraṇād anavadhāraṇajñānaṃ saṃśaya upapadyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:745: etenānekadharmādhyavasāyād iti vyākhyātam/ anyataradharmādhyvasāyāc ca saṃśayo na bhavati, tato hy anyatarāvadhāraṇam eveti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:747: na vipratipattimātrād avyavasthāmātrād vā saṃśayaḥ/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:748_0: vipratipattim upalabhamānasya saṃśayaḥ / evam avyavasthāyām apīti / atha vāsty ātmety
GSP29nysvbh1u:748_1: eke nāsty ātmety apare manyanta ity upalabdheḥ kathaṃ saṃśayaḥ syād iti / tathopalabdhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:751: yāṃ ca vipratipattiṃ bhavān saṃśayahetuḥ manyate sā sampratipattiḥ, sā hi dvayoḥ pratyanīkadharmaviṣayā/ tatra yadi vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:754: na saṃśayaḥ/ yadi tāvad iyam avyavasthā ātmani eva vyavasthitā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:755: vyavasthānād avyavasthā na bhavatīty anupapannaḥ saṃśayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:756: atha avyavasthātmani na vyavasthitā, evam atādātmyād avyavasthā na bhavatīti saṃśayābhāva
GSP29nysvbh1u:758_0: yena kalpena bhavān samānadharmopapatteḥ saṃśaya iti manyate, tena khalv atyantasaṃśayaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:758_1: prasajyate / samānadharmopapatter anucchedāt saṃśayānucchedaḥ / na hy ayam ataddharmā
GSP29nysvbh1u:761: NyS_2,1.6 : yathoktādhyavasāyād eva tadaviśeṣāpekṣāt saṃśaye nāsaṃśayo nātyantasaṃśayo vā ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:762: na saṃśayānutpattiḥ saṃśayānucchedaś ca prasajyate/ katham? yat tāvat samānadharmādhyavasāyaḥ saṃśayahetuḥ na samānadharmamātram iti, evam etat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:763: kasmād evaṃ nocyata iti? viśeṣāpekṣa iti vacanāt tatsiddheḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:764: viśeṣasyāpekṣā ākaṅkṣā, sā cānupalabhyamāne viśeṣe samarthā, na coktaṃ samānadharmāpekṣa iti/ samāne ca dharme katham ākaṅkṣā na bhaved yady ayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:765: pratyakṣaḥ syāt/ etena sāmarthyena vijñāyate samānadharmādhyavasāyād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:766: upapattivacanād vā --- samānadharmopapatter ity ucyate na cānyā sadbhāvasaṃvedanād ṛte samānadharmopapattir asti/ anupalabhyamānasadbhāvo hi samāno dharmo 'vidyamānavad bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:767: viṣayaśabdena vā viṣayiṇaḥ pratyayasyābhidhānam --- yathā loke dhūmenāgnir
GSP29nysvbh1u:768: anumīyate ity ukte dhūmadarśanenāgnir anumīyata iti jñāyate/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:769: dṛṣṭvā hi dhūmam athāgnim anuminoti nādṛṣṭveti; na ca vākye darśanaśabdaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:770_0: śrūyate, anujānāti ca vākyasyārthapratyāyakatvam; tena manyāmahe viṣayaśabdena viṣayiṇaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:770_1: pratyayasyābhidhānaṃ boddhānujānāti / evam ihāpi samānadharmaśabdena samānadharmādhyvasāyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:771_0: yathohitvā samānamanayor dharmam upalabha iti dharmadharmigrahaṇe saṃśayābhāva iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:771_1: pūrvadṛṣṭaviṣayam etat / yāv aham arthau pūrvam adrākṣaṃ tayoḥ samānaṃ dharmam upalabhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:771_2: viśeṣaṃ nopalabha iti, kathaṃ nu viśeṣaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:772: paśyeyaṃ yenānyataram avadhārayeyam iti/ na caitat samānadharmopalabdhau
GSP29nysvbh1u:774: yac coktaṃ nārthāntarādhyavasāyād anyatra saṃśaya iti, yo hy arthāntarādhyavasāyamātraṃ saṃśayahetum upādadīta sa evaṃ vācya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:775: yat punar etat kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyābhāvād iti, kāraṇasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ kāryasya bhāvābhāvau kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:777: yasyotpādād yad utpadyate yasya cānutpādād yan notpadyate tat kāraṇaṃ kāryam itarad ity etat sārūpyam, asti ca saṃśayakāraṇe saṃśaye caitad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:779: yat punar etad uktaṃ ``vipratipattyavyavasthādhyavasāyāc ca na saṃśaya''
GSP29nysvbh1u:780: iti, pṛthakpravādayor vyāhatam artham upalabhe viśeṣaṃ ca na jānāmi nopalabhe yenānyataram
GSP29nysvbh1u:782: tat ko 'tra viśeṣaḥ syād yenaikataram avadhārayeyam iti saṃśayo
GSP29nysvbh1u:784: nivartayitum iti/evam upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthākṛte saṃśaye veditavyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:785_0: yat punar etat vipratipattau ca sampratipatter iti, vipratipattiśabdasya yo 'rthaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:785_1: tadadhyavasāyo viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśayahetus tasya ca samākhyāntareṇa na nivṛttiḥ / samāne
GSP29nysvbh1u:785_2: 'dhikaraṇe vyāhatārthau pravādau vipratipattiśabdasyārthaḥ tadadhyavasāyaś ca viśeṣāpekṣaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:785_3: saṃśayahetuḥ / na cāsya sampratipattiśabde samākhyāntare yojyamāne saṃśayahetutuvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:788_0: saṃśayahetor arthasyāpratiṣedhād avyavasthābhyanujñānāc ca nimittāntareṇa śabdāntarakalpanā
GSP29nysvbh1u:788_1: vyarthā / śabdāntarakalpanāvyavasthā khalv avyavasthā na bhavaty avyavasthātmani
GSP29nysvbh1u:790_0: nānayor upalabdhyanupalabdhyoḥ sadasadviṣayatvaṃ viśeṣāpekṣaṃ saṃśayahetur na bhvatīti
GSP29nysvbh1u:790_1: pratiṣidhyate yāvatā cāvyavasthātmani vyavasthitā na tāvatātmānaṃ jahāti, tāvatā
GSP29nysvbh1u:792_0: yat punar etat ``tathātyantasaṃśayas taddharmasātatyopapatteḥ'' iti, nāyaṃ samānadharmādibhya
GSP29nysvbh1u:792_1: eva saṃśayaḥ / kiṃ tarhi? tadviṣayādhyavasāyād viśeṣasmṛtisahitād ity ato nātyantasaṃśaya
GSP29nysvbh1u:793: anyataradharmādhyavasāyād vā na saṃśaya iti, tan na yuktam; viśeṣāpekṣo vimarṣaḥ saṃśaya iti vacanāt/ viśeṣaś cānyataradharmo na tasminn adhyvasīyamāne viśeṣāpekṣā sambhavatīti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:795: yatra yatra saṃśayapūrvikā parīkṣā śāstre kathāyāṃ vā, tatra tatraivaṃ saṃśaye pareṇa pratiṣiddhe samādhir vācya iti/ ataḥ sarvaparīkṣāvyāpitvāt prathamaṃ saṃśayaḥ parīkṣita iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:798: pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ nāsti traikālyāsiddheḥ pūrvāparasahabhāvānupapatter ity arthaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:800: NyS_2,1.9 : pūrvaṃ hi pramāṇasiddhau nendriyārthasannikarṣāt pratyakṣotpattiḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:801: gandhādiviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam, tad yadi pūrvam, paścād gandhādīnāṃ siddhiḥ, nedaṃ gandhādisannikarṣād utpadyata iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:802: NyS_2,1.10 : paścāt siddhau na pramāṇebhyaḥ prameyasiddhiḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:803: asati pramāṇe kena pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyaḥ syāt pramāṇena khalu pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyam ity etat sidhyati//
GSP29nysvbh1u:806: yadi pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ ca yugapadbhavataḥ, evam api gandhādiṣv
GSP29nysvbh1u:807_0: indriyārtheṣu jñānāni pratyarthaniyatāni yugapatsambhavantīti jñānānāṃ pratyakṣaniyatatvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:807_1: kramavṛttitvābhāvaḥ / yā imā buddhayaḥ krameṇārtheṣu varttante tāsāṃ kramavṛttitvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:808: jñānānutpattir manaso liṅgam'' iti/ etāvāṃś ca pramāṇaprameyayoḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:809: sadbhāvaviṣayaḥ sa cānupapanna iti/ tasmāt pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ na
GSP29nysvbh1u:814: kavacid upalabdhihetuḥ, paścād upalabdhiviṣayaḥ, yathādityasya prakāśa utpadyamānānām/ kvacit pūrvam upalabdhiviṣayaḥ paścād upalabdhihetuḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:815: yathāvasthitānāṃ pradīpaḥ/ kvacid upalabdhihetur upalabdhiviṣayaś ca saha bhvataḥ, yathā dhūmenāgner grahaṇam iti/ upalabdhihetuś ca pramāṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:817: 'niyate yathārtho dṛśyate tathā vibhajya vacanīya iti tatraikāntena
GSP29nysvbh1u:818: pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ, sāmānyena khalu vibhajya pratiṣedha ukta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:819: samākhyāhetos traikālyayogāt tathābhūtā samākhyā/ yat punar idaṃ paścāt siddhāv asati pramāṇe prameyaṃ na sidhyati, pramāṇena pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:820: prameyam iti vijñāyata iti/ pramāṇam ity etasyāḥ samākhyāyā upalabdhihetutvaṃ nimittam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:822: tasya traikālyayogaḥ/ upalabdhim akārṣīt, upalabdhiṃ karoti, upalabdhiṃ kariṣyatīti samākhyāhetos traikālyayogāt samākhyā tathābhūtā pramito
GSP29nysvbh1u:823: 'nenārthaḥ pramīyate pramāsyata iti pramāṇam; pramitam, pramīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:824: pramāsyate iti ca prameyam/ evaṃ sati bhaviṣyaty asmin hetuta upalabdhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:825: pramāsyate 'yam arthaḥ prameyam idam ity etat sarvaṃ bhvatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:826: traikālyānabhyanujñāne ca vyavahārānupapattiḥ/ yaś caivaṃ nābhyanujānīyāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:827: tasya pācakam ānaya pakṣyati lāvakam ānaya laviṣyatīti vyavahāro nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:829: pramāṇapratiṣedhaḥ/ tatrāyaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ, athānena pratiṣedhena bhavatā kiṃ kriyata iti? kiṃ sambhavo nivartyate athāsambhavo jñāpyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:831: tad yadi sambhavo nivartyate sati sambhave pratyakṣādīnāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:832: pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ/ athāsambhavo jñāpyate, pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ prāptas tarhi
GSP29nysvbh1u:836: asya tu vibhāgaḥ/ pūrvaṃ hi pratiṣedhasiddhāv asati pratiṣedhye kim anena pratiṣidhyate paścāt siddhau pratiṣedhyāsiddhiḥ pratiṣedhābhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:839: pratiṣedhalakṣaṇe ca vākye 'nupapadyamāne siddhaṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇatvam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:842: traikālyāsiddher ity asya hetor yady udāharaṇam upādīyate hetvarthasya sādhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭānte darśayitavyam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:844: na ca tarhi pratyakṣādīnām aprāmāṇyam/ atha pratyakṣādīnām aprāmāṇyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:845: upādīyamānam apy udāharaṇaṃ nārthaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti so 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:846: sarvapramāṇavyāhato hetur ahetuḥ; ``siddhāntam abhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddhaḥ'' iti/ vākyārtho hy asya siddhāntaḥ/ sa ca vākyārthaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:847: pratyakṣādīni nārthaṃ sādhayantītīdaṃ cāvayavānām upādānam arthasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:848: sādhanāyeti/ atha nopādīyate apradarśitaṃ hetvarthasya dṛṣṭāntena sādhakatvam iti niṣedho nopapadyate hetutvāsiddher iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:850: pratiṣedhalakṣaṇe svavākye teṣām avayavāśritānāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ prāmāṇye
GSP29nysvbh1u:852: 'viśeṣād iti/ evaṃ ca na sarvāṇi pramāṇāni pratiṣidhyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:853: vipratiṣedha iti vīty ayam upasargaḥ sampratipattyarthe, na vyāghāte 'rthābhāvād iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:854: NyS_2,1.15 : traikālyāpratiṣedhaś ca śabdād ātodyasiddhivat tatsiddheḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:855: kim arthaṃ punar idam ucyate? pūrvoktanibandhanārtham/ yat tāvat pūrvoktam
GSP29nysvbh1u:856: upalabdhihetor upalabdhiviṣayasya cārthasya pūrvāparasahabhāvāniyamād yathādarśanaṃ vibhāgavacanam iti, tad itaḥ samutthānaṃ yathā vijñāyeta/
GSP29nysvbh1u:857: anityam adarśī khalv ayam ṛṣir niyamena pratiṣedhaṃ pratyācaṣṭe ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:858: traikālyasya cāyuktaḥ pratiṣedha iti/ tatraikāṃ vidhām udāharati śabdād ātodyasiddhivad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:860: yathā paścāt siddhena śabdena pūrvasiddham ātodyam anumīyate, sādhyaṃ cātodyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca śabdaḥ, antarhite hy ātodye svanato 'numānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:861_0: bhavatīti vīṇā vādyate veṇuḥ pūryate iti svanaviśeṣeṇa ātodyaviśeṣaṃ pratipadyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:861_1: tathā pūrvasiddham upalabdhiviṣayaṃ paścāt siddhenopalabdhihetunā pratipadyata iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:863: kasmāt punar iha tan nocyate? pūrvoktam upapādyata iti/ sarvathā tāvad ayam arthaḥ prakāśayitavyaḥ, sa iha vā prakāśyeta tatra vā, na kaścid viśeṣa iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:864: pramāṇaṃ prameyam iti ca samākhyā samāveśena varttate
GSP29nysvbh1u:866: upalabdhiviṣayaś ca prameyam iti/ yadā ca upalabdhiviṣayaḥ kvacid upalabdhisādhanaṃ bhavati tadā pramāṇaṃ prameyam iti caiko 'rtho
GSP29nysvbh1u:869: gurutvaparimāṇajñānasādhanaṃ tulā pramāṇam, jñānaviṣayo guru dravyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:870_0: suvarṇādi prameyam / yathā suvarṇādinā tulāntaraṃ vyavasthāpyate tadā tulāntarapratipattau
GSP29nysvbh1u:870_1: suvarṇādi pramāṇam tulāntaraṃ prameyam iti / evam anavayavena tantrārtha uddiṣṭo
GSP29nysvbh1u:871_0: prameye paripaṭhitaḥ, upalabdhau svātantryāt pramātā / buddhir upalabdhisādhanatvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:871_1: pramāṇam, upalabdhiviṣayatvāt prameyam; ubhayābhāvāt tu pramitiḥ / evam arthaviśeṣe
GSP29nysvbh1u:871_2: samākhyāsamāveśo yojyaḥ / tathā ca kārakaśabdā nimittavaśāt samāveśena varttanta
GSP29nysvbh1u:873: vṛkṣas tiṣṭhatīti svasthitau svātantryāt kartā/ vṛkṣaṃ paśyatīti darśanenāptum iṣyamāṇatamatvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:875: vṛkṣeṇa candramasaṃ jñāpayatīti jñāpakasya sādhakatamatvāt karaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:877: vṛkṣāyodakam āsiñcatīti āsicyamānenodakena vṛkṣam abhipraitīti sampradānam/ vṛkṣāt parṇaṃ patatīti ``dhruvam apāye 'pādānam'' ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:878: apādānam/ vṛkṣe vayāṃsi santīti ``ādhāro 'dhikaraṇam'' ity adhikaraṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:879: evam ca sati na dravyamātraṃ kārakam, na kriyāmātram/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:880: kriyāsādhanaṃ kriyāviśeṣayuktaṃ kārakam/ yat kriyāsādhanaṃ svatantram sa
GSP29nysvbh1u:881: kartā, na dravyamātraṃ na kriyāmātram/ kriyayā vyāptum iṣyamāṇatamaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:884_0: na dravyamātraṃ na kryāmātram / evaṃ sādhakatamādiṣv api / evaṃ ca kārakānvākhyānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:884_1: yathaiva upapattita evaṃ lakṣaṇataḥ / kārakānvākhyānam api na dravyamātre na kriyāyām
GSP29nysvbh1u:884_2: vā / kiṃ tarhi? kriyāsādhane kriyāviśeṣayukta iti / kārakaśabdaś cāyaṃ pramāṇaṃ prameyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:884_3: iti, sa ca kārakadharmaṃ na hātum arhati //16 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:885_0: asti bhoḥ kārakaśabdānāṃ nimittavaśāt samāveṣaḥ / pratyakṣādīni ca pramāṇāni upalabdhihetutvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:885_1: prameyaṃ copalabdhiviṣayatvāt / saṃvedyāni ca pratyakṣādīni pramāṇāni, pratyakṣeṇopalabhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:885_2: anumānenopalabhe upamānenopalabhe āgamenopalabhe / pratyakṣaṃ me jñānam ānumānikaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:886: aupamānikaṃ me jñānam āgamikaṃ me jñānam iti viśeṣā gṛhyante/ lakṣaṇataś ca jñāpyamānāni jñāyante viśeṣeṇendriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānam ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:888: seyam upalabdhiḥ pratyakṣādiviṣayā kiṃ pramāṇāntarataḥ athāntareṇa pramāṇāntaram asādhaneti? kaś cātra viśeṣaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:890: yadi pratyakṣādīni pramāṇenopalabhyante, yena pramāṇenopalabhyante tat
GSP29nysvbh1u:891: pramāṇāntaram astīti pramāṇāntarasadbhāvaḥ prasajyata iti anavasthām āha tasyāpy anyena tasyāpy
GSP29nysvbh1u:896: yadi pratyakṣādyupalabdhau pramāṇāntaraṃ nivarttane ātmādyupalabdhāv api pramāṇāntaraṃ nivartsyaty
GSP29nysvbh1u:897: evaṃ ca sarvapramāṇavilopa ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:899_0: yathā pradīpaprakāśaḥ pratyakṣāṅgatvād dṛśyadarśane pramāṇam, sa ca pratyakṣāntareṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:899_1: cakṣuṣaḥ sannikarṣeṇa gṛhyate; pradīpabhāvābhāvayor darśanasya tathābhāvād darśanahetur
GSP29nysvbh1u:900: ity āptopadeśenāpi pratipadyate; evaṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ yathādarśanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:901: pratyakṣādibhir evopalabdhiḥ/ indriyāṇi tāvat svaviṣayagrahaṇenaivānumīyante/ arthāḥ pratyakṣato
GSP29nysvbh1u:903: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānam ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogaviśeṣād ātmasamavayāc ca sukhādivad gṛhyate/ evaṃ pramāṇaviśeṣo vibhajya
GSP29nysvbh1u:904_0: vacanīyaḥ / yathā ca dṛśyaḥ san pradīpaprakāśo dṛśyāntarāṇāṃ darśanahetur iti dṛśyadarśanavyavasthāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:904_1: labhate, evaṃ prameyaṃ sat kiñcid arthajātam upalabdhihetutvāt pramāṇaprameyavyvasthāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:904_2: labhate / seyaṃ pratyakṣādibhir eva pratyakṣādīnāṃ yathādarśanam upalabdhir na pramāṇāntarataḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:905: tenaiva tasyāgrahaṇam iti cet, na; arthabhedasya lakṣaṇasāmānyāt ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:906: pratyakṣādīnāṃ pratyakṣādibhir eva grahaṇam ity ayuktam, anyena hy anyasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:907: grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam iti/ na, arthabhedasya lakṣaṇasāmānyāt ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:908: pratyakṣalakṣaṇenāneko 'rthaḥ saṃgṛhītas tatra kenacit kasyacid grahaṇam ity adoṣaḥ/ evam anumānādiṣv apīti/ yatoddhṛtenodakenāśayasthasya grahaṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:909_0: jñātṛmanasoś ca darśanāt --- ahaṃ sukhī ahaṃ duḥkhī ceti tenaiva jñātrā tasyaiva
GSP29nysvbh1u:909_1: grahaṇaṃ dṛśyate / ``yugapajjñānānutpattir manaso liṅgam'' iti ca tenaiva manasā
GSP29nysvbh1u:909_2: tasyaivānumānaṃ dṛśyate, jñātur jñeyasya cābhedo grahaṇasya grāhyasya cābheda iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:910: nimittabhedo 'treti cet samānam --- na nimittāntareṇa vinā jñātā ātmānaṃ jānīte, na ca nimittāntareṇa vinā manasā mano gṛhyata iti samānam etat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:911: pratyakṣādbhiḥ pratyakṣādīnāṃ grahaṃam ity atrāpy arthabhedo na gṛhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:912_0: pratyakṣādīnāṃ cāviṣayasyānupapatteḥ --- yadi syāt kiṃcid arthajātaṃ pratyakṣādīnām
GSP29nysvbh1u:912_1: aviṣayaḥ yat pratyakṣādibhir na śakyaṃ grahītum, tasya grahaṇāya pramāṇāntaram upādīyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:912_2: tat tu na śakyaṃ kenacid upapādayitum
GSP29nysvbh1u:913: iti/ pratyakṣādīnāṃ yathādarśanam evedaṃ sac cāsac ca sarvaṃ viṣaya iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:914: NyS_2,1.20 : kvacin nivṛttidarśanād anivṛttidarśanāc ca kvacid anekāntaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:915: kecit tu dṛṣṭāntam aparigṛhītaṃ hetunā viśeṣahetum antareṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:917: antareṇa gṛhyate tathā pramāṇāni pramāṇāntaram antareṇa gṛhyata iti/ sa cāyam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:918_0: yathā cāyaṃ prasaṅgo nivṛttidarśanāt pramāṇasādhāyopādīyate / evaṃ prameyasādhanāyāpy
GSP29nysvbh1u:918_1: upādeyo 'viśeṣahetutvāt --- yathā ca sthālyādirūpagrahaṇe pradīpaprakāśaḥ prameyasādhanāyopādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:921: viśeṣahetuparigraham antareṇa dṛṣṭānta ekasmin pakṣe upādeyo na pratipakṣa ity anekāntaḥ/ ekasmiṃś ca pakṣe dṛṣṭānta ity anekānto viśeṣahetvabhāvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:924: viśeṣahetuparigṛhītas tu dṛṣṭānta ekasmin pakṣe upasaṃhriyamāṇo na śakyo 'nujñātum/ evaṃ ca saty anekānta ity ayaṃ pratiṣedho na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:925: pratyakṣādīnāṃ pratyakṣādibhir upalabdhāv anavastheti ced, na saṃvidviṣayanimittānām upalabdhyā vyavahāropapatteḥ --- pratyakṣeṇārtham
GSP29nysvbh1u:926_0: upalabhe, anumānenārtham upalabhe, upamānenārtham upalabhe, āgamenārtham upalabhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:926_1: iti, pratyakṣaṃ me jñānam, ānumānikaṃ me jñānam, aupamānikaṃ me jñānam, āgamikaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:927: copalabhamānasya dharmārthasukhāpavargaprayojanas tatpratyanīkaparivarjanaprayojanaś ca vyavahāra upapadyate, so 'yaṃ tāvaty eva nivartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:929: na cāsti vyavahārāntaram anavasthāsādhanīyaṃ yena pratyuktānavasthām
GSP29nysvbh1u:930: sāmānyena pramāṇāni parīkṣya viśeṣeṇa parīkṣyante/ tatra ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:933: na cāsaṃyukte dravye saṃyogajanyasya guṇasyotpattir iti jñānotpattidarśanād ātmamanaḥsannikarṣaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:935: manaḥsannikarṣānapekṣasya cendriyārthasannikarṣasya jñānakāraṇatve yugapad utpadyeran buddhaya iti manaḥsannikarṣo 'pi kāraṇam/ tad idaṃ sūtraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:938: ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣābhāve notpadyate pratyakṣam indriyārthasannikarṣābhāvavad iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:941: digādiṣu satsu jñānabhāvāt tāny api kāraṇānīti? akāraṇabhāve 'pi
GSP29nysvbh1u:942: jñānotpattir digādisannidher avarjanīyatvāt --- yadāpy akāraṇaṃ digādīni
GSP29nysvbh1u:943: jñānotpattau, tadāpi satsu digādiṣu jñānena bhavitavyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:945: na hi digādīnāṃ sannidhiḥ śakyaḥ parivarjayitum iti/ tatra kāraṇabhāve hetuvacanam, etasmād dhetor digādīni jñānakāraṇānīti//23//
GSP29nysvbh1u:946: ātmamanaḥsannikarṣas tarhy upasaṅkhyeya iti/ tatredam ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:948: jñānam ātmaliṅgaṃ tadguṇatvāt/ na cāsaṃyukte dravye saṃyogajasya guṇasyotpattir astīti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:950: anavarodha iti varttate/ yugapaj jñānānutpattir manaso liṅgam ity ucyamāne
GSP29nysvbh1u:951: sidhyaty eva manaḥsannikarṣāpekṣa indriyārthasannikarṣo jñānakāraṇam iti//25//
GSP29nysvbh1u:952: NyS_2,1.26: pratyakṣanimittatvāc cendriyārthayoḥ sannikarṣasya svaśabdena vacanam ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:954: pratyakṣasyaivendriyārthasannikarṣa ity asamānaḥ, asamānatvāt tasya grahaṇam//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:956: indriyārthasannikarṣasya grahaṇaṃ nātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣasyeti/ ekadā khalv ayaṃ prabodhakālaṃ praṇidhāya suptaḥ praṇidhānavaśāt prabudhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:957_0: yadā tu tīvrau dhvanisparśau prabodhakāraṇaṃ bhavatas tadā prasuptasyendriyasannikarṣanimittaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:957_1: prabodhajñānam utpadyate / tatra na jñātur manasaś ca sannikarṣasya prādhānyaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nysvbh1u:958: indriyārthayoḥ sannikarṣasya/ na hy ātmā jijñāsamānaḥ prayatnena manas
GSP29nysvbh1u:960: ekadā khalv ayaṃ viṣayāntarāsaktamanāḥ saṅkalpavaśād viṣayāntaraṃ jijñāsamānaḥ prayatnapreritena manasā indriyaṃ saṃyojya tad viṣayāntaraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:961: jānīte/ yadā tu khalv asya niḥsaṅkalpasya nirjijñāsasya ca vyāsaktamanaso bāhyaviṣayopanipātanāj jñānam utpadyate tadendriyārthasannikarṣasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:964: na hy atrāsau jijñāsamānaḥ prayatnena manaḥ prerayatīti/ prādhānyāc cendriyārthasannikarṣasya grahaṇaṃ kāryaṃ guṇatvād nātmamanasoḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:967: tair indriyair arthaiś ca vyapadiśyante jñānaviśeṣāḥ/ katham? ghrāṇena
GSP29nysvbh1u:968: jighrati, cakṣuṣā paśyati, rasanayā rasayatīti, ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ rasanāvijñānaṃ gandhavijñānaṃ rūpavijñānaṃ rasavijñānam iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:969: ca/ indriyaviṣayaviśeṣāc ca pañcadhā buddhir bhavati/ ataḥ prādhānyam indriyārthasannikarṣasyeti//28//
GSP29nysvbh1u:974: yadi tāvat kvacid ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣasya jñānakāraṇatvaṃ neṣyate, tadā
GSP29nysvbh1u:975: ``yugapajjñānānutpattir manaso liṅgam'' iti vyāhanyeta/ nedānīṃ manasaḥ sannikarṣam indriyārthasannikarṣo
GSP29nysvbh1u:977: manaḥsaṃyogānapekṣāyāṃ ca yugapajjñānotpattiprasaṅgaḥ/ atha mā bhūd
GSP29nysvbh1u:978: vyāghāta iti sarvavijñānānām ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣaḥ kāraṇam iṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:979: tadavastham evedaṃ bhavati; jñānakāraṇatvād ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:982: nāsti vyāghātaḥ, na hy ātmamanaḥsannikarṣasya jñānakāraṇatvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:984: arthaviśeṣaprābalyād dhi suptavyāsaktamanasāṃ jñānotpattir ekadā bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:985: arthaviśeṣaḥ kaścid evendriyārthaḥ, tasya prābalyaṃ tīvratāpaṭute/ tac cārthaviśeṣaprābalyam indriyārthasannikarṣaviṣayaṃ nātmamanasoḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:987: asati praṇidhāne saṅkalpe cāsati suptavyāsaktamanasāṃ yad indriyārthasannikarṣād utpadyate jñānam, tatra manaḥsaṃyogo 'pi kāraṇam iti manasi kriyākāraṇaṃ vācyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:988: yathaiva jñātuḥ khalv ayam icchājanitaḥ prayatno manasaḥ preraka ātmaguṇaḥ, evam ātmani guṇāntaraṃ sarvasya sādhakaṃ pravṛttidoṣajanitam
GSP29nysvbh1u:989_0: asti, yena preritaṃ mana indriyeṇa sambadhyate / tena hy apreryamāṇe manasi saṃyogābhāvāj
GSP29nysvbh1u:989_1: jñānānutpattau sarvārthatāsya nivarttate / eṣitavyaṃ cāsya guṇāntarasya dravyaguṇakarmakāraṇatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:989_2: anyathā hi caturvidhānām aṇūnāṃ bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ manasāṃ ca tato 'nyasya kriyāhetor
