GSP29nysvbh1u:2353_1: manasi kriyāhetuḥ evaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ ca sidhyatīty evaṃ cen manyase, samānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2353_2: --- smṛtihetāv api saṃyogaviśeṣo bhavitum arhati / tatra yad uktam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2354: ``ātmapreraṇayadṛcchājñatābhiś ca na saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ'' ity ayam apratiṣedha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2355: iti/ pūrvas tu pratiṣedho ``nāntaḥśarīravṛttitvān manasa'' iti//32//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2356: kaḥ khalv idānīṃ kāraṇayaugapadyasadbhāve yugapad asmaraṇasya hetur iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2358_0: yathā khalv ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃskāraś ca smṛtihetur evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ liṅgādijñānāni
GSP29nysvbh1u:2358_1: tāni ca na yugapadbhavanti tatkṛtā smṛtīnāṃ yugapad anutpattir iti / pratibhavat
GSP29nysvbh1u:2359: yaugapadyaprasaṅgaḥ/ yat khalv idaṃ prātibham iva jñānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2360: praṇidhānādyanapekṣaṃ smārttam utpadyate kadācit tasya yugapadutpattiprasaṅgo hetvabhāvāt/ sataḥ smṛtihetor asaṃvedanāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:2361: prātibhena samānābhimānaḥ/ bahvarthaviṣaye vai cintāprabandhe kaścid evārthaḥ kasyacit smṛtihetuḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2362: % cintāprabandhe kaścid evārthaḥ kasyacit smṛtihetuḥ,] p.864
GSP29nysvbh1u:2363_0: tasyānucintanāt tasya smṛtir bhavati / na cāyaṃ smartā sarvaṃ smṛtihetuṃ saṃvedayate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2363_1: evaṃ me smṛtir utpanneti / asaṃvedanāt prātibham iva jñānam idaṃ smārtam iti abhimanyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2363_2: na tv asti praṇidhānādyanapekṣaṃ smārtam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2364_0: prātibhe katham iti cet puruṣakarmaviśeṣād upabhogavan niyamaḥ / prātibham idānīṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2364_1: jñānaṃ yugapat kasmān notpadyate? yathopabhogārthaṃ karma yugapadupabhogaṃ na karoti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2364_2: evaṃ puruṣakarmaviśeṣaḥ pratibhāhetur na yugapad anekaṃ prātibhaṃ jñānam utpādayati /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2365: hetvabhāvād ayuktam iti cet, na karaṇasya pratyayaparyāye sāmarthyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2366: ``upabhogavan niyama'' ity asti dṛṣṭānto hetur nāstīti cen manyase? na,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2367_0: karaṇasya pratyayaparyāye sāmarthyāt / naikasmin jñeye yugapad anekaṃ jñānam utpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2367_1: na cānekasmin / tad idaṃ dṛṣṭena pratyayaparyāyeṇānumeyaṃ karaṇasāmarthyam itthambhūtam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2367_2: iti na jñātuḥ vikaraṇadharmaṇo dehanānātve pratyayayaugapadyād iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2368: % pratyayaparyāyeṇānumeyaṃ karaṇasāmarthyam itthambhūtam iti na jñātuḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2370: ayaṃ ca dvitīyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ, avasthitaśarīrasya cānekajñānasamavāyād ekapradeśe yugapad anekārthasmaraṇaṃ syāt/ kvacid deśe 'vasthitaśarīrasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2371: jñātur indriyārthaprabandhena jñānam anekam ekasminn ātmapradeśe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2372_0: samavaiti / tena yadā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadā jñātapūrvasyānekasya yugapat smaraṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2372_1: prasajyate pradeśasaṃyogaparyāyābhāvād iti / ātmapradeśānām adravyāntaratvād ekārthasamavāyasyāviśeṣe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2374: śabdasantāne tu śrotrādhiṣṭhānapratyāsattyā śabdaśravaṇavat saṃskārapratyāsattyā manasaḥ smṛtyutpatter na yugapad utpattiprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2375: pūrva eva tu pratiṣedho nānekajñānasamavāyād ekapradeśe yugapat smṛtiprasaṅga iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2376: puruṣadharmo jñānam antaḥkaraṇasyecchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhāni dharmā iti kasyacid darśanam, tat pratiṣidhyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2378: ayaṃ khalu jānāti tāvad idaṃ me sukhasādhanam idaṃ me duḥkhasādhanam iti jñātvā svasya sukhasādhanam āptum icchati, duḥkhasādhanaṃ hātum icchati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2380_1: ekenābhisambandhaḥ / ekakartṛkatvaṃ jñānecchāpravṛttīnāṃ samānāśrayatvaṃ ca / tasmāj
GSP29nysvbh1u:2381: ārambhanivṛttyoś ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭatvāt paratrānumānaṃ veditavyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2384_0: ārambhanivṛttiliṅgāv icchādveṣāv iti yasyārambhanivṛttī tasyecchādveṣau tasya jñānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2384_1: iti prāptaṃ pārthivāpy ataijasavāyavīyānāṃ śarīrāṇām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair
GSP29nysvbh1u:2385_0: śarīre caitanyanivṛttiḥ / ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair yoga iti prāptaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2385_1: paraśvādeḥ karaṇasyārambhanivṛttidarśanāc caitanyam iti / atha śarīrasyecchādibhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2386: vyabhicarataḥ, na tarhy ayaṃ hetuḥ pārthivāpy ataijasavāyavīyānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2388: ayaṃ tarhy anyo 'rthaḥ --- talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayoḥ pārthivādyeṣv
GSP29nysvbh1u:2389_0: apratiṣedhaḥ / pṛthivyādīnāṃ bhūtānām ārambhas tāvat trasasthāvaraśarīreṣu tadavayavavyūhaliṅgaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2389_1: pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ loṣṭādiṣu ca liṅgābhāvāt pravṛttiviśeṣābhāvo nivṛttiḥ / ārambhanivṛttiliṅgāv
GSP29nysvbh1u:2390: pārthivādyeṣv aṇuṣu taddarśanād icchādveṣayogas tadyogāj jñānayoga iti siddhaṃ bhūtacaitanyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2391_0: kumbhādiṣv anupalabdher ahetuḥ / kumbhādimṛdavayavānāṃ vyūhaliṅgaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣa
GSP29nysvbh1u:2391_1: ārambhaḥ, sikatādiṣu pravṛttiviśeṣābhāvo nivṛttiḥ / na ca mṛtsikatānām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2392: tasmāt talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayor ity ahetur iti//36//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2397: kiṃ tarhi? prayojyāśraye/ tatra prayujyamāneṣu bhūteṣu pravṛttinivṛttī staḥ na sarveṣv ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:2398_0: yasya tu jñatvād bhūtānām icchādveṣanimitte ārambhanivṛttī svāśraye tasya niyamaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2398_1: syāt, yathā bhūtānāṃ guṇāntaranimittā pravṛttir guṇapratibandhāc ca nivṛttir bhūtamātre
GSP29nysvbh1u:2398_2: bhavati niyamena, evaṃ bhūtamātre jñānecchādveṣanimitte pravṛttinivṛttī svāśraye
GSP29nysvbh1u:2399: tasmāt prayojakāśritā jñānecchādveṣaprayatnāḥ, prayojyāśraye tu pravṛttinivṛttīti siddham/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2400_0: ekaśarīre tu jñātṛbahutvaṃ niranumānam / bhūtacaitanikasyaikaśarīre bahūni bhūtāni
GSP29nysvbh1u:2400_1: jñānecchādveṣaprayatnaguṇānīti jñātṛbahutvaṃ prāptam / om iti bruvataḥ pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2401: buddhyādiguṇavyavasthānāt, evam ekaśarīre 'pi buddhyādivyavasthānumānaṃ syāj jñātṛbahutvasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2402: dṛṣṭaś ca anyaguṇanimittaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣo bhūtānāṃ so 'numānam anyatrāpi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2403: dṛṣṭaḥ karaṇalakṣaṇeṣu bhūteṣu paraśvādiṣu upādānalakṣaṇeṣu ca mṛtprabhṛtiṣv anyaguṇanimittaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ/ so 'numānam anyatrāpi
GSP29nysvbh1u:2405: anyaguṇanimitta iti/ sa ca guṇaḥ prayatnasamānāśrayaḥ saṃskāro dharmādharmasamākhyātaḥ sarvārthaḥ puruṣārthārādhanāya prayojako bhūtānāṃ prayatnavad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2406_0: ātmāstitvahetubhir ātmanityatvahetubhiś ca bhūtacaitanyapratiṣedhaḥ kṛto veditavyaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2406_1: ``nendriyārthayos tadvināśe 'pi jjānāvasthānād''iti ca samānaḥ pratiṣedha iti / kriyāmātraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2407: anyathā tv ime ārambhanivṛttī ākhyāte, na ca tathāvidhe pṛthivyādiṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2408: dṛśyete/ tasmād ayuktam ``talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayoḥ pārthivādyeṣv apratiṣedha''iti//37
GSP29nysvbh1u:2410: NyS_3,2.38: yathoktahetutvāt pāratantryād akṛtābhyāgamāc ca na manasaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2411: ``icchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhajñānāny ātmano liṅgam''ity ataḥ prabhṛti yathoktaṃ saṅgṛhyate, tena bhūtendriyamanasāṃ caitanyapratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2412: pāratantryāt --- paratantrāṇi bhūtendriyamanāṃsi dhāraṇapreraṇavyūhanakriyāsu prayatnavaśāt pravarttante, caitanye punaḥ svatantrāṇi syur iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2413_1: parakṛtaṃ karma puruṣeṇopabhujyata iti syāt, acaitanye tu tatsādhanasya svakṛtakarmaphalopabhogaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2416: ātmaguṇo jñānam iti prakṛtam/ pariśeṣo nāma `prasaktapratiṣedhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2417: anyatrāprasaṅgāc chiṣyamāṇe sampratyayaḥ''/ bhūtendriyamanasāṃ pratiṣedhe dravyāntaraṃ na prasajyate śiṣyate cātmā tasya guṇo jñānam iti jñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2421: atha vā upapatteś ceti hetvantaram evedam/ nityaḥ khalv ayam ātmā, yasmād ekasmin śarīre dharmaṃ caritvā kāyasya bhedāt svarge deveṣūpapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2422: adharmaṃ caritvā dehabhedāt narakeṣūpapadyata iti/ upapattiḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2423: śarīrāntaraprāptilakṣaṇā, sā sati sattve nitye cāśrayavatī,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2424: buddhiprabandhamātre tu nirātmake nirāśrayā nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2426_0: śarīraprabandhocchedaś cāpavargo muktir ity upapadyate / buddhisantatimātre tv ekasattvānupapatter
GSP29nysvbh1u:2426_1: na kaścid dīrgham adhvānaṃ sandhāvati na kaścic charīraprabandhād vimucyata iti saṃsārāpavargānupapattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2427: buddhisantatimātre ca sattvabhedāt sarvam idaṃ prāṇivyavahārajātam apratisaṃhitam avyāvṛttam apariniṣṭhaṃ ca syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2428: % -jātam apratisaṃhitam avyāvṛttam apariniṣṭhaṃ ca syāt,] p.876
GSP29nysvbh1u:2429: tataḥ smaraṇābhāvāt nānyadṛṣṭam anyaḥ smaratīti/ smaraṇaṃ ca khalu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2430: pūrvajñātasya samānena jñātrā grahaṇam ajñāsiṣam amum arthaṃ jñeyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2431: so .yam eko jñātā pūrvajñātam arthaṃ gṛhṇāti tac cāsya grahaṇaṃ smaraṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2434: upapadyata iti/ ātmana eva smaraṇaṃ na buddhisantatimātrasyeti/ tuśabdo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2435: 'vadhāraṇe/ katham? jñasvabhāvatvāt/ jña iti asya svabhāvaḥ svo dharmaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2436: ayaṃ khalu jñāsyati jānāti ajñāsīd iti trikālaviṣayeṇānekena jñānena sambadhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2438: tac cāsya trikālaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ jñāsyāmi jānāmi ajñāsiṣam iti varttate, tad yasyāyaṃ svo dharmas tasya smaraṇaṃ na buddhiprabandhamātrasya nirātmakasyeti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2439: smṛtihetūnām ayaugapadyād yugapad asmaraṇam ity uktam/ atha kebhyaḥ smṛtir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2442: susmūrṣayā manaso dhāraṇaṃ praṇidhānaṃ susmūrṣitaliṅgacintanaṃ cārthasmṛtikāraṇam/ nibandhaḥ khalv ekagranthopayamo 'rthānām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2443: ekagranthopayatāḥ khalv arthā anyonyasmṛtihetava ānupūrvyeṇetarathā vā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2446: dhāraṇaśāstrakṛto vā prajñāteṣu vastuṣu smartavyānām upanikṣepo nibandha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2448: abhyāsas tu samāne viṣaye jñānānām abhyāvṛttiḥ, abhyāsajanitaḥ saṃskāra ātmaguṇo 'bhyāsaśabdenocyate, sa ca smṛtihetuḥ samāna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2449: liṅgaṃ punaḥ saṃyogi samavāyy ekārthasamavāyi virodhi ceti/ yathā dhūmo 'gneḥ, gor viṣāṇam, pāṇiḥ pādasya, rūpaṃ sparśasya abhūtaṃ bhūtasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2450: lakṣaṇaṃ paśvavayavasthaṃ gotrasya smṛtihetuḥ, vidānām idaṃ gargāṇām idam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2451: iti/ sādṛśyaṃ citragataṃ pratirūpakaṃ devadattasyetyevamādi/ parigrahāt svena vā svāmī svāminā vā svaṃ smaryate/ āśrayād grāmaṇyā tadadhīnaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2452: saṃsmarati/ āśritāt tadadhīnena grāmaṇyam iti/ sambandhād antevāsinā yuktaṃ guruṃ smarati, ṛtvijā yājyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2454: ānantaryād iti karaṇīyeṣv artheṣu/ viyogād yena viyujyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2455: tadviyogapratisaṃvedī bhṛśaṃ smarati/ ekakāryāt kartrantaradarśanāt kartrantare smṛtiḥ/ virodhāt, vijigīṣamāṇayor anyataradarśanād anyataraḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2456: smaryate/ atiśayād yenātiśaya utpāditaḥ/ prāpteḥ yato 'nena kiṃcit prāptam āptavyaṃ vā bhavati tam abhīkṣṇaṃ smarati/ vyavadhānāt kośādibhir asiprabhṛtīni smaryante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2458_0: sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ taddhetuḥ smaryate / icchādveṣābhyāṃ yam icchati yaṃ ca dveṣṭi taṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2458_1: smarati / bhayād yato bibheti / arthitvād yenārthī bhojanenācchādanena vā / kriyayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2458_2: rathena rathakāraṃ smarati / rāgād yasyāṃ striyāṃ rakto bhavati tām abhīkṣṇaṃ smarati /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2458_3: dharmāj jātyantarasmaraṇam iha cādhītaśrutāvadhāraṇam iti / adharmāt prāganubhūtaduḥkhasādhanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2458_4: smarati / na caiteṣu nimitteṣu yugapat saṃvedanāni bhavantīti yugapad asmaraṇam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2458_5: nidarśanaṃ cedaṃ smṛtihetūnāṃ na parisaṅkhyānam iti //41 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2459_0: anityāyāṃ ca buddhāv utpannāpavargitvāt kālāntarāvāsthānāc ca anityānāṃ saṃśayaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2459_1: kim utpatpannāpavargiṇī buddhiḥ śabdavat āhosvit kālāntarāvasthāyinī kumbhavad iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2461: karmaṇo 'navasthāyino grahaṇād iti/ kṣiptasyeṣor āpatanāt kriyāsantāno
GSP29nysvbh1u:2462: gṛhyate, pratyarthaniyamāc ca buddhīnāṃ kriyāsantānavad buddhisantānoupapattir iti/ avasthitagrahaṇe ca vyavadhīyamānasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2463: pratyakśanivṛtteḥ/ avasthite ca kumbhe gṛhyamāṇe santānenaiva buddhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2464: vartate prāg vyavadhānāt tena vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ nivartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2465: % santānena iva buddhir ... j,jānaṃ nivartate,] p.882
GSP29nysvbh1u:2466: kālāntarāvasthāne tu buddher dṛśyavyavadhāne 'pi pratyakṣam avatiṣṭheteti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2467: smṛtiś cāliṅgaṃ buddhyavasthāne saṃskārasya buddhijasya smṛtihetutvāt/ yaś ca manyeta avatiṣṭhate buddhiḥ dṛṣṭā hi buddhiviṣaye smṛtiḥ sā ca buddhāv
GSP29nysvbh1u:2468: anityāyāṃ kāraṇābhāvān na syād iti/ tad idam aliṅgam/ kasmāt? buddhijo hi saṃskāro guṇāntaraṃ smṛtihetur na buddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2469: hetvabhāvād ayuktam iti cet? buddhyavasthānāt pratyakṣatve smṛtyabhāvaḥ/yāvad avatiṣṭhate buddhis tāvad asau boddhavyārthiḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyskṣe ca smṛtir anupapanna iti//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2472: yady utpannāpavargiṇī buddhiḥ prāptam avyaktaṃ boddhavyasya grahaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2473: yathā vidyutsampāte vaidyutasya prakāśasyānavasthānād avyaktaṃ rūpagrahaṇam iti; vyaktaṃ tu dravyāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ tasmād ayuktam etad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2475: utapannāpavargiṇī buddhir iti pratiṣeddhavyaṃ tad eva abhyanujñāyate vidyutsampāte rūpāvyaktagrahaṇavad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2476: yatrāvyaktagrahaṇaṃ tatrotpannāpavargiṇī buddhir iti/ grahaṇahetuvikalpād grahaṇavikalpo na buddhivikalpāt/ yad idaṃ kvacid avyaktaṃ kvacid vyaktaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2477: grahaṇam ayaṃ vikalpo grahaṇahetuvikalpāt yatrānavasthito grahaṇahetuḥ tatrāvyaktaṃ grahaṇam yatra avasthitas tatra vyaktam, na tu buddher
GSP29nysvbh1u:2478_0: avasthānānavasthānābhyām iti / kasmāt? arthagrhaṇaṃ hi buddhiḥ yat tadarthagrahaṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2478_1: avyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ vā buddhiḥ sā iti / viśeṣāgrahaṇe ca sāmānyagrahaṇamātram avyaktagrahaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2478_2: tatra viṣayāntare buddhyanatarānutpattir nimittābhāvāt / yatra samānadharmayuktaś
GSP29nysvbh1u:2478_3: ca dharmī gṛhyate viśeṣadharmayuktaś ca tad vyaktam grahaṇam, yatra tu viśeṣe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2479: 'gṛhyamāṇe sāmānyagrahaṇamātraṃ tad avyaktaṃ grahaṇam/ samānadharmayogāc ca viśiṣthadharmayogo viṣayāntaram, tatra yad grahaṇaṃ na bhavati tad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2481: yathāviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ vyaktam eva pratyarthaniyatatvāc ca buddhīnām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2482_0: sāmānyaviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati vyaktaṃ viśeṣaviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2482_1: prati vyaktaṃ pratyarthaniyatā hi buddhayaḥ, tad idam avyaktagrahaṇaṃ deśitaṃ kva
GSP29nysvbh1u:2483_0: dharmiṇas tu dharmabhede buddhinānātvasya bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tadupapattiḥ /dharmiṇaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2483_1: khalv arthasya samānāś ca dharmā viśiṣṭāś ca, teṣu pratyarthaniyatā nānābuddayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2483_2: tā ubhayo yadi dharmiṇi vartante tadā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2484: vyakataṃ grahaṇaṃ dharmiṇam abhipretya/ yadā tu sāmānyagrahaṇamātraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2485: tadāvyaktaṃ grahaṇam iti/ evaṃ dharmiṇam abhipretya vyaktāvyakatayor grahaṇayor upapattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2486: na cedam avyaktaṃ grahaṇaṃ budder boddhavyasya vānavasthāyitvād upapadyate iti/ idaṃ hi
GSP29nysvbh1u:2488: anavasthāyitve 'pi buddhes teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ vyaktaṃ pratipattavyam/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2489_1: grāhyānavasthānaṃ ca pratyarthaniyatatvād buddhīnāṃ yāvanti pradīpārcīṃṣi tāvatyo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2491: cetanā śarīraguṇaḥ sati śarīre bhāvād asati ca abhāvād iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2493: sāṃśayikaḥ sati bhāvaḥ, svaguṇo 'psu dravatvam upalabhyate, paraguṇaś
GSP29nysvbh1u:2494: coṣṇatā, tenāyaṃ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ śarīraguṇaś cetanā śarīre gṛhyata atha dravyāntaraguṇa iti//46//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2497: na rūpādihīnaṃ śarīraṃ gṛhyate cetanāhīnan tu gṛhyate yathoṣṇatāhīnā āpaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2499: saṃskāravad iti ced na kāraṇānucchedāt/ yathāvidhe dravye saṃskāraḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2500: tathāvidha evoparamo na, tatra kāraṇocchedād atyantaṃ saṃskārānupapattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2501: bhavati/ yathāvidhe śarīre cetanā gṛhyate tathāvidhe evātyantoparamaś
GSP29nysvbh1u:2502: cetanāyā gṛhyate/ tasmāt saṃskāravad ity asamaḥ samādhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2503: athāpi śarīrasthaṃ cetanotpattikāraṇaṃ syāt? dravyāntarasthaṃ vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2504_0: ubhayasthaṃ vā? tan na, niyamahetvabhāvāt / śarīrasthena kadācic cetanotpadyate kadācin
GSP29nysvbh1u:2504_1: neti niyame hetur nāstīti / dravyāntarasthena ca śarīra eva cetanotpadyate na loṣṭādiṣv
GSP29nysvbh1u:2504_2: ity atra na niyame hetur astīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2505: ubhayasthasya nimittatve śarīrasamānajātīyadravye cetanā notpadyate śarīra eva cotpadyate iti niyame hetur nāstīti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2506: yac ca manyeta sati śyāmādiguṇe dravye śyāmādyuparamo dṛṣṭaḥ evaṃ cetanoparamaḥ syād iti ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2508: nātyantaṃ rūpoparamo dravyasya, śyāme rūpe nivṛtte pākajaṃ guṇāntaraṃ raktaṃ rūpam utpadyate, śarīre tu cetanāmātroparamo 'tyantam iti//48//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2511: yāvatsu dravyeṣu pūrvaguṇapratidvandvisiddhis tāvatsu pākajotpattir dṛśyate pūrvaguṇaiḥ saha pākajānām avasthānasyāgrahaṇāt/ na ca śarīre
GSP29nysvbh1u:2512: cetanāpratidvandvisiddhau sahānavasthāyi guṇāntaraṃ gṛhyate yenānumīyeta tena cetanāyā virodhaḥ/ tasmād apratiṣiddhā cetanā yāvac charīraṃ varteta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2513: na tu vartate, tasmān na śarīraguṇaś cetanā iti//49//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2516_0: śarīraṃ śarīrāvayavāś ca sarve cetanotpattyā vyāptā iti na kvacid anutpattiś cetanāyāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2516_1: śarīravac charīrāvayavāś cetanā iti prāptaṃ cetanabahutvam / tatra yathā pratiśarīraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2516_2: cetanabahutve sukhaduḥkhajñānānāṃ vyavasthā liṅgam evam ekaśarīre 'pi syāt, na tu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2517: yad uktaṃ na kvacic charīrāvayave cetanāyā anutpattir iti sā ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2519: keśeṣu nakhādiṣu cānutpattiś cetanāyā iti anupapannaṃ śarīravyāpitvam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2521: indriyāśrayatvaṃ śarīralakṣaṇam, tvakparyantaṃ jīvamanaḥsukhaduḥkhasaṃvittyāyatanabhūtaṃ śarīram, tasmān na keśādiṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2522: cetanotpadyate/ arthakāritas tu śarīropanibandhaḥ keśādīnām iti//52//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2525: dvividhaḥ śarīraguṇaḥ --- apratyakṣaś ca gurutvam, indriyagrāhyaś ca rūpādiḥ, vidhāntaraṃ tu cetanā, nāpratyakṣā saṃvedyatvāt, nendriyagrāhyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2528: yathā itaretaravidharmāṇo rūpādayo na śarīraguṇatvaṃ jahaty evaṃ rūpādivaidharmyāc cetanā śarīraguṇatvaṃ na hāsyatīti//54//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2530: apratyaksatvāc ceti/ yathetaretaravidharmāṇo rūpādayo na dvaividhyam ativartante tathā rūpādivaidharmyāc cetanā na dvaividhyam ativarteta yadi
GSP29nysvbh1u:2531: śarīraguṇaḥ syād iti/ ativarttate tu, tasmān na śarīraguṇa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2532: bhūtendriyamanasāṃ jñānapratiṣedhāt siddhe saty ārambho viśeṣajñāpanārthaḥ, bahudhā parīkṣyamāṇaṃ tattvaṃ suniścitataraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2533: parīkṣitā buddhiḥ, manasa idānīṃ parīkṣākramaḥ/ tat kiṃ pratiśarīram ekam anekam iti vicāre
GSP29nysvbh1u:2535: asti khalu vai jñānāyaugapadyam ekaikasyendriyasya yathāviṣayam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2536: karaṇasyaikapratyayanirvṛttau sāmarthyāt, na tadekatve manaso liṅgam/ yat tu khalv idam indriyāntarāṇāṃ viṣayāntareṣu jñānāyaugapadyam iti tal
GSP29nysvbh1u:2537: liṅgam/ kasmāt? sambhavati khalu vai bahuṣu manaḥsv indriyamanaḥsaṃyogayaugapadyam iti jñānayaugapadyaṃ syāt, na tu bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2540_0: ayaṃ khalv adhyāpako 'dhīte vrajati kamaṇḍaluṃ dhārayati panthānaṃ paśyati śṛṇoty
GSP29nysvbh1u:2540_1: āraṇyajān śabdān bibhyad vyālaliṅgāni bubhutsate smarati ca gantavyaṃ sthānīyam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2540_2: kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapad etāḥ kriyā iti prāptaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2543: āśusañcārād alātasya bhramato vidyamānaḥ kramo na gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2546: tathā buddhīnāṃ kriyāṇāṃ cāśuvṛttitvād vidyamānaḥ kramo na gṛhyate kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapat kriyā bhavanntīty abhimāno bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2547: kiṃ punaḥ kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapat kriyābhimānaḥ, atha yugapadbhāvād eva
GSP29nysvbh1u:2548: yugapadanekakriyopalabdhir iti nātra viśeṣapratipatteḥ kāraṇam ucyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2549_0: uktam indriyāntarāṇāṃ viṣayāntareṣu paryāyeṇa buddhayo bhavantīti tac cāpratyākhyeyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2549_1: ātmapratyakṣatvāt / athāpi dṛṣṭaśrutān arthān cintayataḥ krameṇa buddhayo vartante
GSP29nysvbh1u:2551: katham? vākyastheṣu khalu varṇeṣūccaratsu prativarṇaṃ tāvac chravaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2552: bhavati, śrutaṃ varṇam ekam anekaṃ vā padabhāvena sa pratisandhatte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2553: pratisandhāya padaṃ vyavasyati, padavyavasāyena smṛtyā padārthaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2554: pratipadyate, padasamūhapratisandhānāc ca vākyaṃ vyavasyati, sambaddhāṃś ca padārthān gṛhītvā vākyārthaṃ pratipadyate/ na cāsāṃ krameṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:2555: vartamānānāṃ buddhīnām āśuvṛttitvāt kramo gṛhyate, tad etad anumānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2556: anyatra buddhikriyāyaugapadyābhimānasyeti/ na cāsti muktasaṃśayā yugapad utpattir buddhīnāṃ yayā manasāṃ bahutvam ekaśarīre 'numīyeta iti//58//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2558: aṇu mana ekaṃ ceti dharmasamuccayo jñānāyaugapadyāt/ mahattve manasaḥ sarvendriyasaṃyogād yugapad viṣayagrahaṇaṃ syād iti//59//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2559_0: manasaḥ khalu bhoḥ sendriyasya śarīre vṛttilābho nānyatra śarīrāt / jñātuś ca puruṣasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2559_1: śarīrāyatanā buddhyādayo viṣayopabhogo jihāsitahānam īpsitāvāptiś ca sarve ca śarīrāśrayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2560: saṃśayaḥ --- kim ayaṃ puruṣakarmanimittaḥ śarīrasarga āhosvid bhūtamātrād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2561: akarmanimitta iti/ śrūyate khalv atra vipratipattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2564: pūrvaśarīre yā pravṛttir vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhalakṣaṇā tat pūrvakṛtaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2568: tasyotpattiḥ śarīrasya, na svatantrebhya iti/ yad adhiṣṭhāno 'yam ātmā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2569_0: 'yam aham iti manyamāno yatrābhiyukto yatropabhogatṛṣṇayā viṣayānupalabhamāno dharmādharmau
GSP29nysvbh1u:2569_1: saṃskaroti tad asya śarīram, tena saṃskāreṇa dharmādharmalakṣaṇena bhūtasahite patite
GSP29nysvbh1u:2569_2: 'smin śarīra uttaraṃ niṣpadyate, niṣpannasya cāsya pūrvaśarīravat puruṣārthakriyā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2569_3: puruṣasya ca pūrvaśarīravat pravṛttir iti karmāpekṣebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ śarīrasarge saty
GSP29nysvbh1u:2570: % pravṛttir iti karmāpekṣebhyo ... upapadyata iti/] p.901
GSP29nysvbh1u:2571: dṛṣṭā ca puruṣaguṇena prayatnena prayuktebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ puruṣārthkriyāsamarthānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ rathaprabhṛtīnām utpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2572: tathānumātavyaṃ śarīram api puruṣārthakriyāsamartham utpadyamānaṃ puruṣasya guṇāntarāpekṣebhyo bhūtebhya utpadyata iti//60//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2575_1: puruṣārthakāritvād upādīyante tathā karmanirapekṣebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ śarīram utpannaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2577_1: apy akarmanimittaḥ sargaḥ sādhyaḥ sādhyasamatvād asādhanam iti ``bhūtebhyo mūrtyupādānavad''
GSP29nysvbh1u:2579: viṣamaś cāyam upanyāsaḥ/ kasmāt? nirbījā imā mūrtaya utpadyante bījapūrvikā tu śarīrotpattiḥ/ mātāpitṛśabdena lohitaretasī bījabhūte
GSP29nysvbh1u:2580: gṛhyete/ tatra sattvasya garbhavāsānubhavanīyaṃ karma pitroś ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:2581: putraphalānubhavanīye karmaṇī mātur garbhāśraye śarīrotpattiṃ bhūtebhyaḥ prayojayantīty upapannaṃ bījānuvidhānam iti//63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2583: utpattinimittatvād iti prakṛtam/ bhuktaṃ pītam āhāraḥ tasya paktinirvṛttaṃ rasadravyaṃ mātṛśarīre copacīyate bīje garbhāśayasthe bījasamānapākam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2584: mātrayā copacayo bīje yāvad vyūhasamarthaḥ sañcaya iti/ sañcitaṃ ca kalalārbudamāṃsapeśīkaṇḍarāśiraḥpāṇyādinā ca vyūhenendriyādhiṣṭhānabhedena
GSP29nysvbh1u:2585: vyuhyate, vyūhe ca garbhanāḍyāvatāritaṃ rasadravyam upacīyate yāvat
GSP29nysvbh1u:2586: prasavasamartham iti/ na cāyam annapānasya sthālyādigatasya kalpata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2587: etasmāt kāraṇāt karmanimittatvaṃ śarīrasya vijñāyata iti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2589_0: na sarvo dampatyoḥ saṃyogo garbhādhānahetur dṛśyate tatrāsati karmaṇi na bhavati
GSP29nysvbh1u:2589_1: sati ca bhavatīty anupapanno niyamābhāva iti / karmanirapekṣeṣu bhūteṣu śarīrotpattihetuṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2589_2: niyamaḥ syāt na hy atra kāraṇābhāva iti //65 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2592_0: yathā khalv idaṃ śarīraṃ dhātuprāṇasaṃvāhinīnāṃ nāḍīnāṃ śukrāntānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ca snāyutvagasthiśirāpeśīkalalakaṇḍarāṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2592_1: ca śirobāhūdarāṇāṃ sakthnāṃ ca koṣṭhagānāṃ vātapittakaphānāṃ ca mukhahṛdayāmāśayapakvāśayādhaḥsrotasāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2592_2: ca paramaduḥkhasampādanīyena sanniveśena vyūhanam aśakyaṃ pṛthivyādibhiḥ karmanirapekṣair
GSP29nysvbh1u:2592_3: utpādayitum iti karmanimittā śarīrotpattir iti vijñāyate; evaṃ ca pratyātmaniyatasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2593_0: nimittasyābhāvān niratiśayair ātmabhiḥ sambandhāt sarvātmanāṃ ca samānaiḥ pṛthivyādibhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2593_1: utpāditaṃ śarīraṃ pṛthivyādigatasya ca niyamahetor abhāvāt sarvātmanāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃvittyāyatanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2594: vyavatiṣṭhate tatra śarīrotpattinimittaṃ karma vyavashtāhetur iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2595: vijñāyate/ paripacyamāno hi pratyātmaniyataḥ karmāśayo yasminn ātmani
GSP29nysvbh1u:2596: vartate tasyaivopabhogāyatanaṃ śarīram utpādya vyavasthāpayati/ tad evaṃ ``śarīrotpattinimittavat saṃyoganimittaṃ karma'' iti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2597: pratyātmavyavasthānaṃ tu śarīrasyātmanā saṃyogaṃ pracakṣmaha iti//66//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2599: yo .yam akarmanimitte śarīrasarge saty aniyama ity ucyate, ayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2602: kas tāvad ayaṃ niyamaḥ? yathaikasyātmanaḥ śarīraṃ tathā sarveṣām iti niyamaḥ/ anyasyānyathānyasyānyathety aniyamo bhedo vyāvṛttir viśeṣa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2603: % -ty aniyamo bhedo vyāvṛttir viśeṣa iti/] p.909
GSP29nysvbh1u:2604_0: dṛṣṭā ca janmavyāvṛttir uccābhijano nikṛṣṭābhijana iti, praśastaṃ nindatam iti, vyādhibahulam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2604_1: arogam iti, samagraṃ vikalam iti, pīḍābahulaṃ sukhabahulam iti, puruṣātiśayalakṣaṇopapannaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2605: praśastalakṣaṇaṃ ninditalakṣaṇam iti, paṭvindriyaṃ mṛḍvindriyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2606_0: sūkṣmaś ca bhedo 'parimeyaḥ / so 'yam janmabhedaḥ pratyātmaniyatāt karmabhedād upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2606_1: asati karmabhede pratyātmaniyate niratiśayatvād ātmanāṃ samānatvāc ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2606_2: pṛthivyādigatasya niyamahetor ahbāvāt sarvaṃ sarvātmanāṃ prasajyeta, na tv idam itthambhūtaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2607: upapannaś ca tadviyogaḥ karmakṣayopapatteḥ/ karmanimitte śarīrasarge tena
GSP29nysvbh1u:2608_0: śarīreṇātmano viyoga upapannaḥ / kasmāt? karmakṣayopapatteḥ / upapadyate khalu karmakṣayaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2608_1: samyagdarśanāt prakṣīṇe mohe vītarāgaḥ punarbhavahetukarma kāyavāṅmanobhir na karotīty
GSP29nysvbh1u:2609: pūrvopacitasya vipākapratisaṃvedanāt prakṣayaḥ/ evaṃ prasavahetor abhāvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:2611: akarmanimitte tu śarīrasarge bhūtakṣayānupapattes tadviyogānupapattir iti//67//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2612: NyS_3,2.68: tad adṛṣṭakāritam iti cet punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarge ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2613: adarśanaṃ khalv adṛṣṭam ity ucyata adṛṣṭakāritā bhūtebhyaḥ śarīrotpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2614: na jātv anutpanne śarīre draṣṭā nirāyatano dṛśyaṃ paśyati/ tac cāsya dṛśyaṃ dvividhaṃ viṣayaś ca nānātvaṃ cāvyaktātmanaḥ, tadarthaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2615: śarīrasargaḥ/ tasminn avasite caritārthāni bhūtāni na śarīram
GSP29nysvbh1u:2616_0: utpādayantīty upapannaḥ śarīraviyoga ity evaṃ cen manyase, ``punas tat prasaṅgo 'pavarge''
GSP29nysvbh1u:2616_1: --- punaḥ śarīrotpattiḥ prasajyata iti / yā cānutpanne śarīre darśanānutpattir adarśanābhimatā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2617: darśanānutpattir adarśanabhūtā naitayor adarśanayoḥ kvacid viśeṣa ity adarśanasyānivṛtter apavarge punaḥ śarīrotpattiprasaṅga iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2618: caritārthatā viśeṣa iti cet na karaṇākaraṇayor ārambhadarśanāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2619: caritārthāni bhūtāni darśanāvasānān na śarīrāntaram ārabhanta ity ayaṃ viśeṣa evaṃ ced ucyate; na, karaṇākaraṇayor ārambhadarśanāt ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2620_0: caritārthānāṃ bhūtānāṃ viṣayopalabdhikaraṇāt punaḥ punaḥ śarīrārambho dṛśyate prakṛtipuruṣayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:2620_1: nānātvadarśanasyākaraṇān nirarthakaḥ śarīrārambhaḥ punaḥ punar dṛśyate / tasmād akarmanimittāyāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2620_2: bhūtasṛṣṭau na darśanārthā śarīrotpattir yuktā, yuktā tu karmanimitte sarge darśanārthā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2621_0: tad adṛṣṭakāritam iti cet? kasyacid darśanam adṛṣṭaṃ nāma paramāṇūnāṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2621_1: kriyāhetus tena preritāḥ paramāṇavaḥ sammūrcchitāḥ śarīram utpādayantīti tan manaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2621_2: samāviśati svaguṇenādṛṣṭena preritaṃ samanaske śarīre draṣṭur upalabdhir bhavatīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2622: etasmin vai darśane guṇānucchedāt punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarge/ apavarge śarīrotpattiḥ paramāṇuguṇasyādṛṣṭasyānucchedyatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2624: manoguṇenādṛṣṭena samāveśite manasi saṃyogavyucchedo na syāt, tac ca kiṃkṛtaṃ śarīrād apasarpaṇaṃ manasa iti? karmāśayakṣaye tu karmāśayāntarād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2625: vipacyamānād apasarpaṇopapattir iti/ adṛṣṭād evāpasarpaṇam iti cet --- yo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2626_0: 'dṛṣṭaḥ śarīropasarpaṇahetuḥ sa evāpasarpaṇahetur apīti? na, ekasya jīvanaprāyaṇahetutvānupapatteḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2626_1: --- evaṃ ca saty ekam adṛṣṭaṃ jīvanaprāyaṇayor hetur iti prāptam, naitad upapadyate //69 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2628: vipākasaṃvedanāt karmāśayakṣaye śarīrapātaḥ prāyaṇam, karmāśayāntarāc ca punarjanma/ bhūtamātrāt tu karmanirapekṣāc charīrotpattau kasya kṣayāc
GSP29nysvbh1u:2629: charīrapātaḥ prāyaṇam iti? prāyaṇānupapatteḥ khalu vai nityatvaprasaṅgaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2630: vidmaḥ/ yādṛcchike tu prāyaṇe prāyaṇabhedānupapattir iti//70//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2631: punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarga ity etat samādhitsur āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2633: yathāṇoḥ śyāmatā nityā agnisaṃyogena pratiṣiddhā na punar utpadyata evam adṛṣṭakāritaṃ śarīram apavarge punar notpadyata iti// 71 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2635_0: nāyam asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ / kasmāt? akṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgāt / akṛtaṃ pramāṇato 'nupapannam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2635_1: tasyābhyāgamo 'bhyupapattir vyavasāyaḥ, etacchraddadhānena pramāṇato ṇupapannaṃ mantavyam /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2635_2: tasmān nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto na pratyakṣaṃ na
GSP29nysvbh1u:2636: cānumānaṃ kiṃcid ucyata iti/ tad idaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyasamatvam abhidhīyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2637_1: samādadhānasyākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgaḥ / akṛte sukhaduḥkhahetau karmaṇi puruṣasya sukhaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2637_2: duḥkham abhyāgacchatīti prasajyeta / om iti bruvataḥ pratyakṣānumānāgamavirodhaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2639_0: pratyātmavedanīyatvāt pratyakṣaṃ sarvaśarīriṇām / ko bhedaḥ? tīvraṃ mandaṃ ciram
GSP29nysvbh1u:2639_1: āśu nānāprakāram ekaprakāram ity evam ādir viśeṣaḥ / na cāsti pratyātmaniyataḥ sukhaduḥkhahetuviśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2640_0: dṛśyate / karmanimitte tu sukhaduḥkhayoge karmaṇāṃ tīvramandatopapatteḥ karmasañcayānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2643: sukhaduḥkhavyavasthānam/ yaḥ khalu cetanāvān sādhananirvartanīyaṃ sukhaṃ buddhvā tad īpsan sādhanāvāptaye prayatate sa sukhena yujyate na
GSP29nysvbh1u:2644_0: viparītaḥ / yaś ca sādhananirvartanīyaṃ duḥkhaṃ buddhvā taj jihāsuḥ sādhanaparivarjanāya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2644_1: yatate sa ca duḥkhena tyajyate na viparītaḥ / asti cedaṃ yatnam antareṇa cetanānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2644_2: sukhaduḥkhavyavasthānaṃ tenāpi cetanaguṇāntaravyavasthākṛtena bhavitavyam ity anumānam /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2646: tad etad akarmanimitte sukhaduḥkhayoge virudhyata iti/ tac ca guṇāntaram
GSP29nysvbh1u:2647: asaṃvedyatvād adṛṣṭaṃ vipākakālāniyamāc cāvyavasthitam/ buddhyādayas tu saṃvedyāś cāpavargiṇaś
GSP29nysvbh1u:2648: athāgamavirodhaḥ --- bahu khalv idam ārṣam ṛṣīṇām upadeśajātam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2651: tac cobhayam etasyāṃ dṛṣṭau ``nāsti karma sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2652: karmanimittaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhayogaḥ'' iti virudhyate/ seyaṃ pāpiṣṭhānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ --- akarmanimittā śarīrasṛṣṭir akarmanimittaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2654: iti śrīvātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye tṛtīyādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam// 2 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2657: manaso 'nantaraṃ pravṛttiḥ parīkṣitavyā/ tatra khalu yāvad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2658: dharmādharmāśrayaśarīrādi parīkṣitam, sarvā sā pravṛtteḥ parīkṣety āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2661: pravṛttyanantarās tarhi doṣāḥ parīkṣyantām ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2663_0: parīkṣitā iti / buddhisamānāśrayatvād ātmaguṇāḥ, pravṛttihetutvāt punarbhavapratisandhānasāmarthyāc
GSP29nysvbh1u:2663_1: ca saṃsārahetavaḥ, saṃsārasyānāditvād anādinā prabandhena pravartante, mithyājñānanivṛttis
GSP29nysvbh1u:2665: pravartanālakṣaṇā doṣā ity uktam, tathā ceme mānerṣyāsūyāvicikitsāmatsarādayaḥ, te kasmān nopasaṅkhyāyante ity ata āha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2667: teṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ trayo rāśayas trayaḥ pakṣāḥ/ rāgapakṣaḥ --- kāmo matsaraḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā lobha iti/ dveṣapakṣaḥ --- krodha īrṣyā asūyā droho 'marṣa
GSP29nysvbh1u:2669: mithyājñānaṃ vicikitsā mānaḥ pramāda iti/ trairāśyān nopasaṅkhyāyante iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2670: lakṣaṇasya tarhy abhedāt tritvam anupapannam? nānupapannam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2672_0: āsaktilakṣaṇo rāgaḥ, amarṣalakṣaṇo dveṣaḥ, mithyāpratipattilakṣaṇo moha iti / etat
GSP29nysvbh1u:2672_1: pratyātmavedanīyaṃ sarvaśarīriṇām --- vijānāty ayaṃ śarīrī rāgam utpannam ``asti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2672_2: me 'dhyātmaṃ rāgadharma'' iti / virāgaṃ ca vijānāti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2673: ---``nāsti me 'dhyātmaṃ rāgadharma'' iti/ evam itarayor apīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2674: mānerṣyāsūyāprabhṛtayas tu trairāśyam anupatitā iti nopasaṅkhyāyante//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2676: nārthāntaraṃ rāgādayaḥ/ kasmāt? ekapratyanīkabhāvāt --- tattvajñānaṃ samyaṅmatir āryaprajñā sambodha ity ekam idaṃ pratyanīkaṃ trayāṇām
GSP29nysvbh1u:2678: ekapratyanīkāḥ pṛthivyāṃ śyāmādayo 'gnisaṃyogenaikena, ekayonayaś ca pākajā iti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2681: mohaḥ pāpaḥ, pāpataro vā dvāv abhipretyoktam/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2684: amūḍhasya rāgadveṣā notpadyante mūḍhasya tu yathāsaṅkalpam utpattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2685: viṣayeṣu rañjanīyāḥ saṅkalpā rāgahetavaḥ, kopanīyāḥ saṅkalpā dveṣahetavaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2686_0: ubhaye ca saṅkalpā na mithyāpratipattilakṣaṇatvān mohād anye, tāv imau mohayonī rāgadveṣāv
GSP29nysvbh1u:2686_1: iti / tattvajñānāc ca mohanivṛttau rāgadveṣānutpattir ity ekapratyanīkabhāvopapattiḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2687: ``duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvād apavarga'' iti vyākhyātam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2690: anyad dhi nimittam anyac ca naimittikam iti doṣanimittatvād adoṣo moha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2692: pravarttanālakṣaṇā doṣā ity anena doṣalakṣaṇenāvarudhyate doṣeṣu moha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2694: dravyāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ vānekavidhavikalpo nimittanaimittikabhāve tulyajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2695: doṣānantaraṃ pretyabhāvaḥ, tasyāsiddhir ātmano nityatvāt --- na khalu nityaṃ kiṃcij jāyate mriyate vā iti janmamaraṇayor nityatvād ātmano
GSP29nysvbh1u:2696: 'nupapattiḥ, ubhayaṃ ca pretyabhāva iti tatrāyaṃ siddhānuvādaḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2698: nityo 'yam ātmā praiti pūrvaśarīraṃ jahāti mriyate iti, pretya ca pūrvaśarīraṃ hitvā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2699: bhavati jāyate śarīrāntaram upādatta iti/ tac caitad ubhayaṃ ``punar
GSP29nysvbh1u:2700: utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ'' ity atroktaṃ pūrvaśarīraṃ hitvā śarīrāntaropādānaṃ pretyabhāvaḥ iti tac caitannityatve sambhavatīti/ yasya tu sattvotpādaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2701: sattvanirodhaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ tasya kṛtahānam akṛtābhyāgamaś ca doṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2705: kena prakāreṇa kiṃdharmakāt kāraṇād vyaktaṃ śarīrādy utpadyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2706_0: vyaktād bhūtasamākhyātāt pṛthivyāditaḥ paramasūkṣmān nityād vyaktaṃ śarīrendriyaviṣayopakaraṇādhāraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2706_1: prajñātaṃ dravyam utpadyate / vyaktaṃ ca khalv indriyagrāhyaṃ tatsāmānyāt kāraṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2707: rūpādiguṇayogaḥ rūpādiguṇayuktebhyaḥ pṛthivyādibhyo nityebhyo rūpādiguṇayuktaṃ śarīrādy utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2709_0: pratyakṣaprāmāṇyāt --- dṛṣṭo hi rūpādiguṇayuktebhyo mṛtprabhṛtibhyas tathābhūtasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2709_1: dravyasyotpādaḥ, tena cādṛṣṭasyānumānam iti / rūpādīnām anvayadarśanāt prakṛtivikārayoḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2712: idam api pratyakṣam --- na khalu vyaktād ghaṭād vyakto ghaṭa utpadyamāno dṛśyate iti, vyaktād vyaktasyānutpattidarśanān na vyaktaṃ kāraṇam iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2714: na brūmaḥ sarvaṃ sarvasya kāraṇam iti, kin tu yad utpadyate vyaktaṃ dravyaṃ tat tathābhūtād evotpadyate iti/ vyaktaṃ ca tanmṛddravyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2715: kapālasaṃjñakaṃ yato ghaṭa utpadyate/ na caitannihnuvānaḥ kvacid
GSP29nysvbh1u:2716: abhyanujñāṃ labdhum arhatīti/ tad etat tattvam//13//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2719: asataḥ sad utpadyate ity ayaṃ pakṣaḥ/ kasmāt? upamṛdya prādurbhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2720: upamṛdya bījam aṅkura utpadyate nānupamṛdya, na ced vījopamardo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2724_0: upamṛdya prādurbhāvād ity ayuktaḥ prayogo vyāghātāt / yad upamṛdnāti na tad upamṛdya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2724_1: prādurbhavitum arhati vidyamānatvāt / yac ca prādurbhavati na tenāprādurbhūtenāvidyamānenopamarda
GSP29nysvbh1u:2726: atīte cānāgate cāvidyamāne kārakaśabdāḥ prayujyante/ putro janiṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2727: janiṣyamāṇaṃ putram abhinandati, putrasya janiṣyamāṇasya nāma karoti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2728: abhūt kumbhaḥ, bhinnaṃ kumbham anuśocati, bhinnasya kumbhasya kapālāni,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2729_0: ajātāḥ putrāḥ pitaraṃ tāpayantīti bahulaṃ bhāktāḥ prayogā dṛśyante / kā punar iyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2729_1: bhaktiḥ? ānantaryaṃ bhaktiḥ, ānantaryasāmarthyād upamṛdya prādurbhāvārthaḥ, prādurbhaviṣyann
GSP29nysvbh1u:2731: na vinaṣṭād bījād aṅkura utpadyate iti tasmān nābhāvād bhāvotpattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:2733: upamardaprādurbhāvayoḥ paurvāparyaniyamaḥ kramaḥ, sa khalv abhāvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2734: bhāvotpatter hetur nirdiśyate; sa ca na pratiṣidhyate iti/ vyāhatavyūhānām avayavānāṃ pūrvavyūhanivṛttau vyūhāntarād dravyaniṣpattir nābhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2735_0: bījāvayavāḥ kutaścin nimittāt prādurbhūtakriyāḥ pūrvavyūhaṃ jahati vyūhāntaraṃ cāpadyante
GSP29nysvbh1u:2735_1: vyūhāntarād aṅkura utpadyate / dṛśyante khalu avayavās tatsaṃyogāś cāṅkurotpattihetavaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2736: bījāvayavānāṃ śakyaṃ vyūhāntareṇa bhavitum ity upamardaprādurbhāvayoḥ paurvāparyaniyamaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2738: tasmān nābhāvād bhāvotpattir iti/ na cānyad bījāvayavebhyo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2742: puruṣo 'yaṃ samīhamāno nāvaśyaṃ samīhāphalaṃ prāpnoti tenānumīyate parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya karmaphalārādhanam iti, yadadhīnaṃ sa īśvaraḥ/ tasmād īśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2744: īśvarādhīnā cet phalaniṣpattiḥ syād api tarhi puruṣasya samīhām antareṇa phalaṃ niṣpadyeteti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2746: puruṣakāram īśvaro 'nugṛhṇāti, phalāya puruṣasya yatamānasyeśvaraḥ phalaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2747: sampādayatīti/ yadā na sampādayati tadā puruṣakarmāphalaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2748: tasmād īśvarakāritatvāt ahetuḥ puruṣakarmābhāve phalāniṣpatter iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2749: guṇaviśiṣṭam ātmāntaram īśvaraḥ/ tasya ātmakalpāt kalpāntarānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2750: adharmamithyājñānapramādahānyā dharmajñānasamādhisampadā ca viśiṣṭam ātmāntaram īśvaraḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2752: saṅkalpānuvidhāyī cāsya dharmaḥ pratyātmavṛttīn dharmādharmasañcayān pṛthivyādīni ca bhūtāni pravartayati/ evaṃ ca svakṛtābhyāgamasyālopena
GSP29nysvbh1u:2753_0: nirmāṇaprākāmyam īśvarasya svakṛtakarmaphalaṃ veditavyam / āptakalpaś cāyam --- yathā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2753_1: pitāpatyānāṃ tathā pitṛbhūta īśvaro bhūtānām / na cātmakalpād anyaḥ kalpaḥ sambhavati /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2753_2: na tāvad asya buddhiṃ vinā kaścid dharmo liṅgabhūtaḥ śakya upapādayitum / āgamāc
GSP29nysvbh1u:2754: iti/ buddhyādibhiś cātmaliṅgair nirupākhyam īśvaraṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamaviṣayātītaṃ kaḥ śakta
GSP29nysvbh1u:2755: % liṅgair nirupākhyam īśvaraṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamaviṣayātītaṃ kaḥ śakta
GSP29nysvbh1u:2757: svakṛtābhyāgamalopena ca pravartamānasyāsya yad uktaṃ pratiṣedhajātam akarmanimitte śarīrasarge tat sarvaṃ prasajyate iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2761: taikṣṇyam, parvatadhātūnāṃ citratā, grāvṇāṃ ślakṣṇatā, nirnimittaṃ ca upādānavac ca dṛṣṭaṃ tathā śarīrādisargo .pīti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2763: animittato bhāvotpattir ity ucyate yataś cotpadyate tannimittam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2766: anyad dhi nimittam anyac ca nimittapratyākhyānam, na ca pratyākhyānam eva pratyākhyeyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2767_0: yathānudakaḥ kamaṇḍalur iti nodakapratiṣedha udakaṃ bhavatīti / sa khalv ayaṃ vādo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2767_1: 'karmanimittaḥ śarīrādisarga ity etasmān na bhidyate, abhedāt tatpratiṣedhenaiva
GSP29nysvbh1u:2770: kim anityaṃ nāma? yasya kadācid bhāvas tad anityam/ utpattidharmakam anutpannaṃ nāsti vināśadharmakaṃ ca vinaṣṭaṃ nāsti/ kiṃ punaḥ sarvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2772: abhautikaṃ ca buddhyādi, tad ubhayam utpattivināśadharmakaṃ vijñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2775: yadi tāvat sarvasyānityatā nityā, tannityatvān na sarvam anityam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2776: athānityā tasyām avidyamānāyāṃ sarvaṃ nityam iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2778: tasyā anityatāyā apy anityatvam/ katham? yathā agnir dāhyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2781: ayaṃ khalu vādo nityaṃ pratyācaṣṭe, nityasya ca pratyākhyānam anupapannam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2782: kasmāt? yathopalabdhi vyavasthānāt/ yasyotpattivināśadharmakatvam upalabhyate pramāṇatas tad
GSP29nysvbh1u:2783: yasya nopalabhyate tadviparītam/ na ca paramasūkṣmāṇāṃ bhūtānām ākāśakāladigātmamanasāṃ tadguṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcit sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2784: cotpattivināśadharmakatvaṃ pramāṇata upalabhyate, tasmān nityāny etānīti//28//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2787: bhūtamātram idaṃ sarvaṃ tāni ca nityāni bhūtocchedānupapatter iti//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2789: utpattikāraṇaṃ copalabhyate vināśakāraṇaṃ ca, tat sarvanityatve vyāhanyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2791: yasyotpattivināśakāraṇam upalabhyate iti manyase, na tad bhūtalakṣaṇahīnam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2792: arthāntaraṃ gṛhyate, bhūtalakṣaṇāvarodhād bhūtamātram idam ity ukto 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2795: kāraṇasamānaguṇasyotpattiḥ kāraṇaṃ copalabhyate/ na caitad ubhayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2796_0: nityaviṣayam, na cotpattitatkāraṇopalabdhiḥ śakyā pratyākhyātum, na cāviṣayā kācid
GSP29nysvbh1u:2796_1: upalabdhiḥ / upalabdhisāmarthyāt kāraṇena samānaguṇaṃ kāryam utpadyate ity anumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2796_2: sa khalūpalabdher viṣaya iti / evaṃ ca tallakṣaṇāvarodhopapattir iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2797: utpattivināśakāraṇaprayuktasya jñātuḥ prayatno dṛṣṭa iti/ prasiddhaś cāvayavī taddharmā/ utpattivināśadharmā cāvayavī siddha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2798: śabdakarmabuddhyādīnāṃ cāvyāptiḥ/ pañcabhūtanityatvāt tallakṣaṇāvarodhāc cety anena śabdakarmabuddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnāś ca na vyāptāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2800: svapnaviṣayābhimānavan mithyopalabdhir iti cet bhūtopalabdhau tulyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2801: yathā svapne viṣayābhimāna evam utpattikāraṇābhimāna iti/ evaṃ caitad bhūtopalabdhau tulyaṃ pṛthivyādyupalabdhir api svapnaviṣayābhimānavat prasajyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2802: pṛthivyādyabhāve sarvavyavahāravilopa iti cet tad itaratra samānam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2804: 'yaṃ nityānām atīndriyatvād aviṣayatvāc cotpattivināśayoḥ svapnaviṣayābhimānavad ity ahetur
GSP29nysvbh1u:2805: avasthitasyopādānasya dharmamātraṃ nivartate dharmamātram upajāyate sa khalūtpattivināśayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:2807: yac copajāyate tat prāg apy upajananād asti, yac ca nivartate tan nivṛttam apy astīti, evaṃ ca sarvasya nityatvam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2809: ayam upajanaḥ iyaṃ nivṛttir iti vyavasthā nopapadyate, upajātanivṛttayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:2810: vidyamānatvāt/ ayaṃ dharma upajāto 'yaṃ nivṛtta iti sadbhāvāviśeṣād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2811: avyavasthā, idānīm upajananivṛttī nedānīm iti kālavyavasthā nopapadyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2812: sarvadā vidyamānatvāt asya dharmasyopajananivṛttī nāsyeti vyavasthānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2814: ubhyor aviśeṣāt/ anāgato 'tīta iti ca kālavyavasthānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2815_1: nivṛttir ity etasmin sati naite doṣāḥ / tasmād yad uktaṃ prāg apy upajanād asti nivṛttaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2818: sarvaṃ nānā na kaścid eko bhāvo vidyate/ kasmāt? bhāvalakṣaṇapṛthaktvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:2819: --- bhāvasya lakṣaṇam abhidhānam, yena lakṣyate bhāvaḥ sa samākhyāśabdaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2821: sarvo bhāvasamākhyāśabdaḥ samūhavācī, kumbha iti saṃjñāśabdo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2825: anekavidhalakṣaṇair iti madhyamapadalopī samāsaḥ/ gandhādibhiś ca guṇair
GSP29nysvbh1u:2826: budhnādibhiś cāvayavaiḥ sambaddha eko bhāvo niṣpadyate, guṇavyatiriktaṃ ca dravyam avayavātiriktaś cāvayavīti/ vibhaktanyāyaṃ caitad ubhayam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2829: na kaścid eko bhāva ity ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/ kasmāt? lakṣaṇavyavasthānād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2830: eva/ yad iha lakṣaṇaṃ bhāvasya saṃjñāśabdabhūtaṃ tad ekasmin vyavasthitam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2831: yaṃ kumbham adrākṣaṃ taṃ spṛśāmi yam evāsprākṣaṃ taṃ paśyāmīti nāṇusamūho gṛhyate iti/ aṇusamūhe cāgṛhyamāṇe yad gṛhyate tad ekam eveti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2832: athāpy etad anūktam nāsty eko bhāvo yasmāt samudāyaḥ, ekānupapatter nāsty eva samūhaḥ --- nāsty eko bhāvo yasmāt samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogaḥ;ekasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2834: samūho nopapadyate ekasamuccayo hi samūha iti/ vyāhatatvād anupapannaṃ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2835_0: nāsty eko bhāva iti yasya pratiṣedhaḥ pratijñāyate, samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogād iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2835_1: hetuṃ bruvatā sa evābhyanujñāyate, ekasamuccayo hi samūha iti / samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2835_2: iti ca samūham āśritya pratyekaṃ samūhipratiṣedho nāsty eko bhāva iti / so 'yam ubhayato
GSP29nysvbh1u:2837: yāvad bhāvajātaṃ tat sarvam abhāvaḥ/ kasmāt? bhāveṣv
GSP29nysvbh1u:2838_0: itaretarābhāvasiddheḥ / ``asan gaur aśvātmanā'' anaśvo gauḥ ``asann aśvo gavātmanā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2838_1: agaur aśvaḥ'' ity asatpratyayasya pratiṣedhasya ca bhāvaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:2839: pratijñāvākye padayoḥ pratijñāhetvoś ca vyāghātād ayuktam/ anekasyāśeṣatā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2840: sarvaśabdasyārtho, bhāvapratiṣedhaś cābhāvaśabdasyārthaḥ/ pūrvaṃ sopākhyam uttaraṃ nirupākhyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2841: samupākhyāyamānaṃ kathaṃ nirupākhyam abhāvaḥ syād iti? na jātv abhāvo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2842: nirupākhyo 'nekatayāśeṣatayā śakyaḥ pratijñātum iti/ sarvam etad abhāva
GSP29nysvbh1u:2843: iti cet --- yad idaṃ sarvam iti manyase tadabhāva iti? evaṃ cet anivṛtto
GSP29nysvbh1u:2844: vyāghātaḥ, anekam aśeṣaṃ ceti nābhāve pratyayena śakyaṃ bhavitum/ asti cāyaṃ pratyayaḥ sarvam iti, tasmān nābhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2845: pratijñāhetvoś ca vyāghātaḥ --- sarvam abhāva iti bhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2846_0: pratijñā, bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvasiddher iti hetuḥ / bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvam anujñāyāśritya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2846_1: ca itaretarābhāvasiddhyā sarvam abhāva ity ucyate / yadi sarvam abhāvo bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvasiddher
GSP29nysvbh1u:2846_2: iti nopapadyate / atha bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvasiddhiḥ, sarvam abhāva iti nopapadyate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2849: na sarvam abhāvaḥ/ kasmāt? svena bhāvena sadbhāvād bhāvānām/ svena dharmeṇa bhāvā bhavantīti pratijñāyate/ kaś ca svo dharmo bhāvānām?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2851: sparśaparyantāḥ pṛthivyā iti ca; pratyekaṃ cānanto bhedaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2853: so 'yam abhāvasya nirupākhyatvāt sampratyāyako 'rthabhedo na syāt? asti tv ayam, tasmān na sarvam abhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2854_0: atha vā na svabhāvasiddher bhāvānām iti svarūpasiddher iti / gaur iti prayujyamāne
GSP29nysvbh1u:2854_1: śabde jātiviśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate, nābhāvamātram / yadi ca sarvam abhāvaḥ gaur ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:2855: yasmāt tu gośabdaprayoge dravyaviśeṣaḥ pratīyate nābhāvas tasmād ayuktam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2856_0: atha vā na svabhāvasiddher iti / asan gaur aśvātmaneti gavātmanā kasmān nocyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2856_1: avacanād gavātmanā gaur astīti svabhāvasiddhiḥ, anaśvo 'śva iti vā gaur agaur iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2856_2: vā kasmān nocyate? avacanāt svena rūpeṇa vidyamānatā dravyasyeti vijñāyate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2857: avyatirekapratiṣedhe ca bhāvena asatpratyayasāmānādhikaraṇyam bhāve saṃyogādisambandho vyatirekaḥ/ atra avyatirekaḥ abhedākhyasambandhaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2858: tatpratiṣedhe sadā ca asatpratyayasāmānādhikaraṇyam, yathā na santi kuṇḍe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2859: badarāṇīti/ asan gaur aśvātmanā anaśvo gaur iti ca gavāśvayor avyatirekaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2860: pratiṣidhyate gavāśvayor ekatvaṃ nāstīti/ tasmin pratiṣidhyamāne bhāvena
GSP29nysvbh1u:2861_0: gavā sāmānādhikaraṇyam asatpratyayasya asan gaur aśvātmaneti, yathā na santi kuṇḍe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2861_1: badarāṇīti kuṇḍe badarasaṃyoge pratiṣidhyamāne sadbhir asatpratyayasya sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2863: apekṣākṛtam āpekṣikam/ hrasvāpekṣākṛtaṃ dīrghaṃ dīrghāpekṣākṛtaṃ hrasvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2864: na svenātmanāvasthitaṃ kiñcit/ kasmāt? apekṣāsāmarthyāt/ tasmān na svabhāvasiddhir bhāvānām
GSP29nysvbh1u:2866: yadi hrasvāpekṣākṛtaṃ dīrghaṃ hrasvam anāpekṣikam/ kim idānīm apekṣya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2867: hrasvam iti gṛhyate? atha dīrghāpekṣākṛtaṃ hrasvam, dīrgham anāpekṣikam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2868: evam itaretarāśrayayor ekābhāve anyatarābhāvād ubhayābhāva iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2870: % retarāśrayayor ekābhāve anyatarābhāvād ubhayābhāva iti apekṣāvyavasthānupapannā/] p.984
GSP29nysvbh1u:2871: svabhāvasiddhāv asatyāṃ samayoḥ parimaṇḍalayor vā dravyayor āpekṣike dīrghatvahrasvatve kasmān na bhavataḥ? apekṣāyām anapekṣāyāṃ ca dravyayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:2872: abhedaḥ/ yāvatī dravye apekṣamāṇe tāvatī evānapekṣamāṇe nānyataratra
GSP29nysvbh1u:2873: bhedaḥ/ āpekṣikatve tu saty anyataratra viśeṣopajanaḥ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2874: kim apekṣāsāmarthyam iti cet? dvayor grahaṇe 'tiśayagrahaṇopapattiḥ/ dve dravye paśyann ekatra vidyamānam atiśayaṃ gṛhṇāti tad dīrgham iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2875: vyavasyati, yac ca hīnaṃ gṛhṇāti tad dhrasvam iti vyavasyatīti/ etac cāpekṣāsāmarthyam iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2878: sarvaṃ dvedhā nityānityabhedāt/ sarvaṃ tredhā jñātā jñānaṃ jñeyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2879: sarvaṃ caturddhā pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitir iti/ evaṃ yathāsambhavam anye 'pīti/ tatra parīkṣā ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2881: yadi sādhyasādhanayor nānātvam, ekānto na siddhyati vyatirekāt/ atha
GSP29nysvbh1u:2882: sādhyasādhanayor abhedaḥ? evam apy ekānto na sidhyati sādhanābhāvāt, na hi hetum antareṇa kasyacit siddhir iti//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2884: na saṅkhyaikāntānām asiddhiḥ kasmāt? kāraṇasyāvayavabhāvāt/ avayavaḥ kaścit sādhanabhūta ity avyatirekaḥ/ evaṃ dvaitādīnām apīti//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2886: kāraṇasyāvayavabhāvād ity ahetuḥ/ kasmāt? sarvam ekam ity anapavargeṇa pratijñāya kasyacid ekatvam ucyate, tatra vyapavṛkto 'vayavaḥ sādhanabhūto
GSP29nysvbh1u:2888: te khalv ime saṅkhyaikāntā yadi viśeṣakāritasyārthabhedavistārasya pratyākhyānena varttante, pratyakṣānumānāgamavirodhān mithyāvādā bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2890: viśeṣakāritaś cārthabheda iti evam ekāntatvaṃ jahatīti/ te khalv ete
GSP29nysvbh1u:2893: NyS_4,1.44: sadyaḥ kālāntare ca phalaniṣpatteḥ saṃśayaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2894: pacati dogdhīti sadyaḥ phalamodanapayasī, karṣati vapatīti kālāntare
GSP29nysvbh1u:2896: śasyādhigama iti/ asti ceyaṃ kriyā agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma iti etasyāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2899: tac ca bhinne 'smin dehabhedād utpadyate iti/ na sadyaḥ grāmādikāmānāmü@ārambhaphalam iti//44//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2901: dhvastāyāṃ pravṛttau pravṛtteḥ phalaṃ na kāraṇam antareṇotpattum arhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2902: na khalu vai vinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt kiñcid utpadyate iti//45//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2903: NyS_4,1.46: prāṅ niṣpatter vṛkṣaphalavat tat syāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2904_0: yathā phalārthinā vṛkṣamūle sekādi parikarma kriyate, tasmiṃś ca pradhvaste pṛthivīdhātur
GSP29nysvbh1u:2904_1: abdhātunā saṃgṛhīta āntareṇa tejasā pacyamāno rasadravyaṃ nirvartayati, sa dravyabhūto
GSP29nysvbh1u:2904_2: raso vṛkṣānugataḥ pākaviśiṣṭo vyūhaviśeṣeṇa sanniviśamānaḥ parṇādi phalaṃ nirvartayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2904_3: evaṃ pariṣekādi karma cārthavat / na ca vinaṣṭāt phalaniṣpattiḥ / tathā pravṛttyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2905: dharmādharmalakṣaṇo janyate, sa jāto nimittāntarānugṛhītaḥ kālāntare phalaṃ niṣpādayatīti/ uktañ caitat ``pūrvakṛtaphalānubandhāt tadutpattir''
GSP29nysvbh1u:2907: NyS_4,1.47: nāsan na san na sadasat sadasator vaidharmyāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:2908: prāṅ niṣpatter niṣpattidharmakaṃ nāsat, upādānaniyamāt/ kasyacid utpattaye kiñcid upādeyaṃ na sarvaṃ sarvasyety asadbhāve niyamo nopapadyate iti/ na
GSP29nysvbh1u:2909: sat, prāṅ utpatter vidyamānasyotpattir anupapanneti/ na, sadasat sadasator vaidharmyāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:2910: sad ity arthābhyanujñā, asad iti arthapratiṣedhaḥ, etayor vyāghāto vaidharmyaṃ vyāghātād avyatirekānupapattir iti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2911: prāg utpatter utpattidharmakam asad ity addhā/ kasmāat?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2913: yat punaruktaṃ prāg utpatteḥ kāryaṃ nāsad upādānaniyamād iti---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2915: idam asyotpattaye samarthaṃ na sarvam iti prāg utpatter niyatakāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ buddhyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2916: siddham utpattiniyamadarśanāt/ tasmād upādānaniyamasyopapattiḥ sati tu kārye prāg utpatter utpattir eva nāstīti//49//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2918: mūlasekādi parikarma phalaṃ cobhayaṃ vṛkṣāśrayam, karma ceha śarīre,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2919: phalaṃ cāmutra ity āśrayavyatirekād ahetur iti//50//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2921: prītir ātmapratyakṣatvād ātmāśrayā, tadāśrayam eva karma dharmasaṃjñitam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2924: putrādi phalaṃ nirdiśyate na prītiḥ, ``grāmakāmo yajeta'' ``putrakāmo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2925: yajete''ti tatra yad uktaṃ prītiḥ phalam ity etad ayuktam iti//52//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2927: putrādisambandhāt phalaṃ prītilakṣaṇam utpadyate iti putrādiṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2929: phalānantaraṃ duḥkham uddiṣṭam, uktaṃ ca ``bādhanālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkham''iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2930: tat kim idaṃ pratyātmavedanīyasya sarvajantupratyakṣasya sukhasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2932_0: anya ity āha / katham? na vai sarvalokasākṣikaṃ sukhaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātum / ayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2932_1: tu janmamaraṇaprabandhānubhavanimittād duḥkhān nirviṇṇasya duḥkhaṃ jihāsato duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanopadeśo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2934: kayā yuktyā? sarve khalu sattvanikāyāḥ sarvāṇy utpattisthānāni sarvaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2935: punarbhavo bādhanānuṣakto duḥkhasāhacaryād bādhanālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkham ity uktam ṛṣibhiḥ, duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanam upadiśyate atra ca hetur upādīyate---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2937: janma jāyate iti śarīrendriyabuddhayaḥ śarīrādīnāṃ ca saṃsthānaviśiṣṭānāṃ prādurbhāva utpattiḥ/ vividhā ca bādhanā, hīnā madhyamā utkṛṣṭā ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2938_0: utkṛṣṭā nārakiṇām, tiraścāṃ tu madhyamā, manuṣyāṇāṃ tu hīnā, devānāṃ hīnatarā vītarāgāṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2938_1: ca / evaṃ sarvam utpattisthānaṃ vividhabādhanānuṣaktaṃ paśyataḥ sukhe tatsādhaneṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:2943: tṛṣṇāprahāṇāt sarvaduḥkhād vimucyate iti/ yathā viṣayogāt payo viṣam iti budhyamāno nopādatte, anupādadāno maraṇaduḥkhaṃ nāpnoti//54//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2944: duḥkhoddeśas tu na sukhasya pratyākhyānam, kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2946: na khalv ayaṃ duḥkhoddeśaḥ sukhasya pratyākhyānam/ kasmāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2947: sukhasyāntarālaniṣpatteḥ/ niṣpadyate khalu bādhanāntarāleṣu sukhaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ śarīriṇām, tad aśakyaṃ pratyākhyātum iti//55//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2951_0: viṣayārjanatṛṣṇā, paryeṣaṇasya doṣo yad ayaṃ vedayamānaḥ prārthayate tac cāsya prārthitaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2951_1: na sampadyate, sampadya vā vipadyate, nyūnaṃ vā sampadyate, bahupratyanīkaṃ vā sampadyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2952: nānāvidho mānasaḥ santāpo bhavati evaṃ vedayataḥ paryeṣaṇadoṣād bādhanāyā anivṛttiḥ/ bādhanānivṛtter duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanam upadiśyate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2953: anena kāraṇena duḥkhaṃ janma na tu sukhasyābhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2956: athainam aparaḥ kāmaḥ kṣipram eva prabādhate//''
GSP29nysvbh1u:2957: ``api ced udanemi samantād bhūmim imāṃ labhate sagavāśvām/ na sa tena
GSP29nysvbh1u:2958: dhanena dhanaiṣī tṛpyati kin nu sukhaṃ dhanakāme//'' iti//56//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2960: duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanopadeśaḥ kriyate/ ayaṃ khalu sukhasaṃvedane vyavasthitaḥ sukhaṃ paramapuruṣārthaṃ manyate, na sukhād anyan niḥśreyasam asti sukhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2961: prāpte caritārthaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyo bhavati/ mithyāsaṅkalpāt sukhe tatsādhaneṣu ca viṣayeṣu saṃrajyate, saṃraktaḥ sukhāya ghaṭate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2962: ghaṭamānasyāsya janmajarāvyādhiprāyaṇāniṣṭasaṃyogeṣṭaviyogaprārthitānupapattinimittam anekavidhaṃ yāvad duḥkham utpadyate, taṃ duḥkhavikalpaṃ sukham ity
