GSP29nysvbh1u:3092: uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvād apavarga'' iti/ sa cāyaṃ śāstrārthasaṃgraho 'nūdyate nāpūrvo vidhīyate iti//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3095: kāmaviṣayā indriyārthā iti rūpādaya ucyante/ te mithyā saṅkalpyamānā
GSP29nysvbh1u:3096_0: rāgadveṣamohān pravartayanti, tān pūrvaṃ prasañcakṣīta / tāṃś ca prasañcakṣāṇasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3096_1: rūpādiviṣayo mithyāsaṅkalpo nivartate / tannivṛttāv adhyātmaṃ śarīrādi prasañcakṣīta /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3099: so 'yam adhyātmaṃ bahiś ca viviktacitto viharan mukta ity ucyate//2//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3100: ataḥ paraṃ kācit saṃjñā heyā kācid bhāvayitavyety upadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3103: teṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ nimittaṃ tv avayavyabhimānaḥ/ sā ca khalu strīsaṃjñā sapariṣkārā puruṣasya, puruṣasaṃjñā ca striyāḥ sapariṣkārā nimittasaṃjñā anuvyañjanasaṃjñā ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3106: anuvyañjanasaṃjñā --- itthaṃ daṇḍā ittham oṣṭhāv iti/ seyaṃ saṃjñā kāmaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3107: vardhayati tadanuṣaktāṃś ca doṣān vivarjanīyān, varjanaṃ tv asyāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3111: tām aśubhasaṃjñety ācakṣate/ tām asya bhāvayataḥ kāmarāgaḥ prahīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3112: saty eva ca dvividhe viṣaye kācit saṃjñā bhāvanīyā kācit parivarjanīyety
GSP29nysvbh1u:3116: sadasator upalambhād vidyā dvividhā, sadasator anupalambhād avidyāpi
GSP29nysvbh1u:3119: upalabhyate (following ṭhakur, yady apalabhyate ṛinsen) athāpi nopalabhyate na kathañcana saṃśayān mucyata iti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3121: tasminn anupapannaḥ saṃśayaḥ/ kasmāt? pūrvoktahetūnām apratiṣedhād asti
GSP29nysvbh1u:3124: vṛttyanupapatter api tarhi saṃśayānupapattir nāsty avayavīti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3127_0: ekaiko 'vayavo na tāvat kṛtsne 'vayavini vartate, tayoḥ parimāṇabhedād avayavāntarasambandhābhāvaprasaṅgāc
GSP29nysvbh1u:3127_1: ca / nāpy avayavyekadeśena, na hy asyānye avayavā ekadeśabhūtāḥ santīti //7 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3130: na tāvat pratyavayavaṃ vartate, tayoḥ parimāṇabhedād dravyasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3131: caikadravyatvaprasaṅgāt/ nāpy ekadeśaiḥ sarveṣu anyāvayavābhāvāt/ tad evaṃ na yuktaḥ saṃśayo nāsty avayavīti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3133: avayavyabhāva iti vartate/ na cāyaṃ pṛthag avayavebhyo vartate agrahaṇāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:3136: na cāvayavānāṃ dharmo 'vayavī/ kasmāt? dharmamātrasya dharmibhir avayavaiḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3140: kiṃ pratyavayavaṃ kṛtsno 'vayavī vartate athaikadeśeneti nopapadyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:3141_0: praśnaḥ / kasmāt? ekasmin bhedābhāvād bhedaśabdaprayogānupapatteḥ / kṛtsnam ity anekasyāśeṣābhidhānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3141_1: ekadeśa iti nānātve kasyacid abhidhānam / tāv imau kṛtsnaikadeśaśabdau bhedaviṣayau
GSP29nysvbh1u:3144: avayavāntarābhāvād iti/ yady api ekadeśo 'vayavāntarabhūtaḥ syāt tathāpy avayave 'vayavāntaraṃ vartate nāvayavīti anyo 'vayavīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3146: anyāvayavabhāve 'py avṛtter avayavino naikadeśena vṛttir anyāvayavābhāvād ity ahetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3147: vṛttiḥ katham iti cet? ekasyānekatrāśrayāśritasambandhalakṣaṇā prāptiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3148: āśrayāśritabhāvaḥ katham iti cet? yasya yato 'nyatrātmalābhānupapattiḥ sa
GSP29nysvbh1u:3149: āśrayaḥ/ na kāraṇadravyebhyo 'nyatra kāryadravyam ātmānaṃ labhate
GSP29nysvbh1u:3151: nityeṣu katham iti cet, anityeṣu darśanāt siddham, nityeṣu dravyeṣu katham
GSP29nysvbh1u:3152: āśrayāśrayibhāva iti cet? anityeṣu dravyaguṇeṣu darśanād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3154: tasmād avayavyabhimānaḥ pratiṣidhyate niḥśreyasakāmasya, nāvayavī, yathā rūpādiṣu mithyāsaṅkalpo na rūpādaya iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3155: sarvāgrahaṇam avayavyasiddher iti pratyavasthito 'py etad āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3157: yathaikaikaḥ keśas taimirikeṇa nopalabhyate keśasamūhas tūpalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3158: tathaikaiko 'ṇur nopalabhyate aṇusañcayas tūpalabhyate, tad idam aṇusamūhaviṣayaṃ grahaṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3161: yathāviṣayam indriyāṇāṃ paṭumandabhāvād viṣayagrahaṇānāṃ paṭumandabhāvo bhavati/ cakṣuḥ khalu prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ nāviṣayaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3162: nikṛṣyamāṇaṃ ca na svaviṣayāt pracyavate/ so 'yaṃ taimirikaḥ kaścic cakṣur
GSP29nysvbh1u:3163: viṣayaṃkeśaṃ na gṛhṇāti, kaścid gṛhṇāti keśasamūham/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3164: ubhayaṃ hy ataimimirikeṇa caks.uṣā gṛhyate/ paramāṇavas tv atīndriyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:3165: indriyāviṣayabhūtā na kenacid indriyeṇa gṛhyante, samuditās tu gṛhyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3166: ity aviṣaye pravṛttir indriyasya prasajyeta/ na jātv arthāntaram aṇubhyo gṛhyata iti/ te khalv ime paramāṇavaḥ sannihitā gṛhyamāṇā atīndriyatvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3167: jahati, viyuktāś cāgṛhyamāṇā indriyaviṣayatvaṃ na labhanta iti/ so 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3168: dravyāntarānutpattāv atimahān vyāghāta ity upapadyate dravyāantaram yad grahaṇasya viṣaya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3169: sañcayamātraṃ viṣaya iti cen na, sañcayasya saṃyogabhāvāt tasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3170: cātīndriyasyāgrahaṇād ayuktam/ sañcayaḥ khalv anekasya saṃyogaḥ, sa ca gṛhyamāṇāśrayo gṛhyate nātīndriyāśrayaḥ, bhavati hīdam anena saṃyuktam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3173: tasmān nendriyadaurbalyād anupalabdhir aṇūnām, yathā nendriyadaurbalyāc cakṣuṣānupalabdhir gandhādīnām iti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3175: yaḥ khalv avayavino 'vayaveṣu vṛttipratiṣedhād abhāvaḥ so 'yam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3176: avayavasyāvayaveṣu prasajyamānaḥ sarvapralayāya vā kalpeta, niravayavād vā paramāṇuto nivarteta/ ubhayathā copalabdhiviṣayasyābhāvaḥ, tadabhāvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3177: upalabhyabhāvaḥ/ upalabhyāśrayaś cāyaṃ vṛttipratiṣedhaḥ, sa āśrayaṃ vyāghnan ātmaghātāya kalpata iti//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3180: avayavavibhāgam āśritya vṛttipratiṣedhād abhāvaḥ prasajyamāno niravayavāt paramāṇor nivartate na sarvapralayāya kalpate, niravayavatvaṃ tu paramāṇor
GSP29nysvbh1u:3181_0: vibhāgair alpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatrāvasthānāt / loṣṭasya khalu pravibhajyamānāvayavasyālpataram
GSP29nysvbh1u:3181_1: alpatamam uttaram uttaraṃ bhavati / sa cāyam alpataraprasaṅgaḥ yasmān nālpataram
GSP29nysvbh1u:3182: nivartate, yataś ca nālpīyo 'sti taṃ parama'nuṃ pracakṣmahe iti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3185: athedānīm ānupalambhikaḥ sarvaṃ nāstīti manyamāna āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3187: tasyāṇor niravayavasya nityasyānupapattiḥ/ kasmāt? ākāśavyatibhedāt/ antar bahiś cāṇur ākāśena samāviṣṭo vyatibhinnaḥ, vyatibhedāt sāvayavaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3190: athaitan neṣyate --- paramāṇor antar nāsty ākāśam ity asarvagatatvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3192: NyS_4,2.20: antar bahiś ca kāryadravyasya kāraṇāntaravacanād akārye
GSP29nysvbh1u:3194: ``antar'' iti pihitaṃ kāraṇāntaraiḥ kāraṇam ucyate/ ``bahir'' iti ca vyavadhāyakam avyavahitaṃ kāraṇam evocyate/ tad etat kāryadravyasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3195: sambhavati, nāṇor akāryatvāt/ akārye hi paramāṇāv antar bahir ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:3198: yatra cāsya bhāvo 'nukāryaṃ tat, na paramāṇuḥ, yato hi nālpataram asti sa paramāṇur iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3200: yatra kvacid utpannāḥ śabdā vibhavanty ākāśe --- tadāśrayā bhavanti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3201: manobhiḥ paramāṇubhis tatkāryaiś ca saṃyogā vibhavanty ākāśe, nāsaṃyuktam ākāśena kiñcin mūrtadravyam upalabhyate, tasmān nāsarvagatam iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3203: saṃsarpatā pratighātinā dravyeṇa na vyuhyate, yathā kāṣṭhenodakam/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3204: niravayavatvāt/ sarpac ca pratighāti na viṣṭambhāti --- nāsya kriyāhetuṃ guṇaṃ pratibadhnāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3205: kasmāt? asparśatvāt/ viparyaye hi viṣṭambho dṛṣṭa iti sa bhavān sāvayave sparśavati dravye dṛṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ viparīte nāśāṅkitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3206: aṇvavayavasyāṇutaratvaprasaṅgād anukāryapratiṣedhaḥ/ sāvayavatve cāṇor aṇvavayavo 'nutara iti prasajyate/ kasmāt? kāryakāraṇadravyayoḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3207: parimāṇabhedadarśanāt/ tasmād aṇvavayavasyāṇutaratvam, yas tu sāvayavo
GSP29nysvbh1u:3208: 'nukāryaṃ tad iti/ tasmād anukāryam idaṃ pratiṣidhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3212: paricchinnānāṃ hi sparśavatāṃ saṃsthānaṃ trikoṇaṃ caturasraṃ samaṃ parimaṇḍalam ity upapadyate, yat tat saṃsthānaṃ so 'vayavasanniveṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3215: madhye sann aṇuḥ pūrvāparābhyām aṇubhyām saṃyuktas tayor vyavadhānaṃ kurute/ vyavadhānenānumīyate pūrvabhāgena pūrveṇāṇunā saṃyujyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3216: parabhāgena pareṇāṇunā saṃyujyate, yau tau pūrvāparau bhāgau tāv asyāvayavau, evaṃ sarvataḥ saṃyujyamānasya sarvato bhāgā avayavā iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3217: yat tāvan ``mūrtimatāṃ saṃsthānopapatter avayavasadbhāva'' iti? atroktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3218: kim uktam? vibhāge 'lpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatra nivṛtter aṇavayavasya cāṇutaratvaprasaṅgād aṇukāryapratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3219: yat punar etat saṃyogopapatteś ceti? sparśavattvād vyavadhānam āśrayasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3220: cāvyāptyā bhāgabhaktiḥ/ uktaṃ cātra sparśavān aṇuḥ sparśavator aṇvoḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3221: pratighātād vyavadhāyako na sāvayavatvāt/ sparśavattvāc ca vyavadhāne saty aṇusaṃyogo nāśrayaṃ vyāpnotīti bhāgabhaktir bhavati bhāgavānn ivāyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3222: uktaṃ cātra vibhāge 'lpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatrāvasthānāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:3224: mūrtimatāṃ ca saṃsthānopapatteḥ saṃyogopapatteś ca paramāṇūnāṃ sāvayavatvam iti hetvoḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3226_0: yāvan mūrtimad yāvac ca saṃyujyate tat sarvaṃ sāvayavam ity anavasthākāriṇāv imau
GSP29nysvbh1u:3226_1: hetū, sā cānavasthā nopapadyate / satyām anavasthāyāṃ satyau hetū syātām, tasmād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3227: vibhāgasya ca vibhajyamānahānir nopapadyate tasmāt pralayāntatā nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3228: anavasthāyāṃ ca pratyadhikaraṇaṃ dravyāvayavānām ānantyāt parimāṇabhedānāṃ gurutvasya cāgraḥaṇam samānaparimāṇatvaṃ cāvayavāvayavinoḥ paramaṇvavayavibhāgād ūrdhvam iti//25//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3229: yad idaṃ bhavān buddhīr āśritya buddhiviṣayāḥ santīti manyate mithyābuddhaya etāḥ, yadi hi tattvabuddhayaḥ syur buddhyā vivecane
GSP29nysvbh1u:3231: NyS_4,2.26: buddhyā vivecanāt tu bhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhis tantvapakarṣaṇe paṭasadbhāvānupalabdhivat tadanupalabdhiḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3232: yathāyaṃ tantur ayaṃ tantur iti pratyekaṃ tantuṣu vivicyamāneṣu nārthāntaraṃ kiñcid upalabhyate --- yat paṭabuddher viṣayaḥ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3233: yāthātmyānupalabdher asati viṣaye paṭabuddhir bhavantī mithyābuddhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:3236: yadi buddhyā vivecanaṃ bhāvānāṃ na sarvabhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3237: atha sarvabhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhir na buddhyā vivecanam/ bhāvānāṃ buddhyā vivecanaṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhiś ceti vyāhanyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3239: tad uktam --- ``avayavāvayaviprasaṅgaś caivam ā pralayād'' iti// 27 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3241: kāryadravyaṃ kāraṇadravyāśritaṃ tat kāraṇebhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nopalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3243: yatrāśrayāśritabhāvo nāsti tatra pṛthaggrahaṇam iti/ buddhyā vivecanāt tu
GSP29nysvbh1u:3244: bhāvānāṃ pṛthaggrahaṇam atīndriyeṣv aṇuṣu, yad indriyeṇa gṛhyate tad etayā buddhyā vivicyamānam anyad iti// 28 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3246: buddhyā vivecanād bhāvānāṃ yāthātmyopalabdhiḥ, yad asti yathā ca yan nāsti
GSP29nysvbh1u:3247: yathā ca tat sarvaṃ pramāṇata upalabdhyā sidhyati, yā ca pramāṇata
GSP29nysvbh1u:3248_0: upaloabdhis tad buddhyā vivecanaṃ bhāvānām, tena sarvaśāstrāṇi sarvakarmāṇi sarve
GSP29nysvbh1u:3248_1: ca śarīriṇāṃ vyavahārā vyāptāḥ / parīkṣamāṇo hi buddhyādhyavasyatīdam astīdaṃ nāstīti
GSP29nysvbh1u:3249: evaṃ ca sati sarvaṃ nāstīti nopapadyate, kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3250: pramāṇānupapattyupapattibhyām/ yadi sarvaṃ nāstīti pramāṇam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3251: sarvaṃ nāstīti etad vyāhanyate/ atha pramāṇaṃ nopapadyate, sarvaṃ nāstīty asya kathaṃ siddhiḥ? atha pramāṇam antareṇa siddhiḥ, sarvam astīty asya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3254: yathā svapne na viṣayāḥ santy atha cābhimāno bhavati, evaṃ na pramāṇāni
GSP29nysvbh1u:3255: prameyāṇi ca santy atha ca pramāṇaprameyābhimāno bhavati// 31 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3258_0: svapnānte viṣayābhimānavat pramāṇaprameyābhimāno na punar jāgaritānte viṣayopalabdhivad
GSP29nysvbh1u:3258_1: ity atra hetur nāsti / hetvabhāvād asiddhiḥ / svapnānte cāsanto viṣayā upalabhyanta
GSP29nysvbh1u:3260: yadi pratibodhe ṇupalambhāt svapne viṣayā na santīti, tarhi ya ime
GSP29nysvbh1u:3261: pratibuddhena viṣayā upalabhyanta upalambhāt santīti/ viparyaye hi hetusāmarthyam/ upalambhāt sadbhāve saty anupalambhād abhāvaḥ siddhyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3262: ubhayathā tv abhāve nānupalambhasya sāmarthyam asti, yathā pradīpasyābhāvād rūpasyādarśanam iti, tatra bhāvenābhāvaḥ samarthyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3263: svapnāntavikalpe ca hetuvacanam/ svapnaviṣayābhimānavad iti bruvatā
GSP29nysvbh1u:3264: svapnāntavikalpe hetur vācyaḥ/ kaścit svapno bhayopasaṃhitaḥ, kaścit
GSP29nysvbh1u:3265: pramodopasaṃhitaḥ, kaścid ubhayaviparītaḥ, kadācit svapnam eva na
GSP29nysvbh1u:3269_0: pūrvopalabdhaviṣayaḥ / yathā smṛtiś ca saṅkalpaś ca pūrvopalabdhaviṣayau na tasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3269_1: pratyākhyānāya kalpete tathā svapne viṣayagrahaṇaṃ pūrvopalabdhaviṣayaṃ na tasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3271_0: evaṃ dṛṣṭaviṣayaś ca svapnānto jāgaritāntena / yaḥ suptaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati sa eva
GSP29nysvbh1u:3271_1: jāgrat svapnadarśanāni pratisandhatta idam adrākṣam iti / tatra jāgradbuddhivṛttivaśāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:3271_2: svapnaviṣayābhimāno mithyeti vyavasāyaḥ / sati ca pratisandhāne yā jāgrato buddhivṛttis
GSP29nysvbh1u:3272: ubhayāviśeṣe tu sādhanānarthakyam/ yasya svapnāntajāgaritāntayor aviśeṣas
GSP29nysvbh1u:3273: tasya svapnaviṣayābhimānavad iti sādhanam anarthakaṃ tadāśrayapratyākhyānāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3274: atasmiṃs tad iti ca vyavasāyaḥ pradhānāśrayaḥ/ apuruṣe sthāṇau puruṣa iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:3275_0: vyavasāyaḥ, sa pradhānāśrayaḥ, na khalu puruṣe 'nupalabdhe puruṣa ity apuruṣe vyavasāyo
GSP29nysvbh1u:3275_1: bhavati, evaṃ svapnaviṣayasya vyavasāyo hastinam adrākṣaṃ parvatam adrākṣam iti pradhānāśrayo
GSP29nysvbh1u:3278: sthāṇau pruṣo 'yam iti vyavasāyo mithyopalabdhiḥ atasmiṃs tad iti jñānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3279_0: sthāṇau sthāṇur iti vyavasāyas tattvajñānam / tattvajjānena ca mithyopalabdhir nivartyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3279_1: nārthaḥ sthāṇupuruṣasāmānyalakṣaṇaḥ / yathā pratibodhe yā jñānavṛttis tayā svapnaviṣayābhimāno
GSP29nysvbh1u:3279_3: api yā buddhayo 'tasmiṃs tad iti vyavasāyās tatrāpy anenaiva kalpena
GSP29nysvbh1u:3281: upādānavac ca māyādiṣu mithyājñānam/ prajñāpanīyasarūpaṃ ca dravyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3282: upādāya sādhanavān aparasya mithyādhyavasāyaṃ karoti sā māyā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3283: nīhāraprabhṛtīnāṃ nagarasarūpasanniveśe dūrān nagarabuddhir utpadyate viparyaye tadabhāvāt, sūryamarīciṣu bhaumenoṣmaṇā saṃsṛṣṭeṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:3284: spandamāneṣūdakabuddhir bhavati sāmānyagrahaṇāt, antikasthasya viparyaye tadabhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3285: kvacit kadācit kasyacic ca bhāvān nānimittaṃ mithyājñānam/ dṛṣṭaṃ ca buddhidvaitaṃ māyāprayoktuḥ parasya ca, dūrānikasthayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:3286: gandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāsu, suputapratibuddhayoś ca svapnaviṣaye/ tad etat sarvasyābhāve nirupākhyatāyāṃ nirātmakatve nopapadyata iti// 35 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3289: sadbhāvopalambhāc ca/ upalabhyate hi mithyābuddhinimittaṃ mithyābuddhiś ca pratyātmam utpannā gṛhyate saṃvedyatvāt, tasmān mithyābuddhir apy astīti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3291: tattvaṃ sthāṇur iti, pradhānaṃ puruṣa iti/ tattvapradhānayor alopād bhedāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:3292: sthāṇau puruṣa iti mithyābuddhir utpadyate sāmānyagrahaṇāt/ evaṃ patākāyāṃ balāketi, loṣṭe kapota iti na tu samāne viṣaye mithyābuddhīnāṃ samāveśaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3293: sāmānyagrahaṇavyavasthānāt/ yasya tu nirātmakaṃ nirupākhyaṃ sarvaṃ tasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3295_0: gandhādau ca prameye gandhādibuddayo mithyābhimatās tattvapradhānayoḥ sāmānyagrahaṇasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3295_1: cābhāvāt tattvabuddhaya eva bhavanti / tasmād ayuktam etat --- pramāṇaprameyabuddhayo
GSP29nysvbh1u:3295_2: mithyeti // doṣanimittānāṃ tattvajñānād ahaṅkāranivṛttir ity uktam / atha kathaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3297: sa tu pratyāhṛtasyendriyebhyo manaso dhārakeṇa prayatnena dhāryamāṇasyātmanā saṃyogas tattvabubhutsāviśiṣṭaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3299: sati hi tasminn indriyārtheṣu buddhayo notpadyante, tadabhyāsavaśāt tattvabuddhir utpadyate// yad uktaṃ ``sati hi tasminn indriyārtheṣu buddhayo notpadyanta'' ity etat ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3301: anicchato 'pi buddhyutpatter naitad yuktam/ kasmāt? arthaviśeṣaprābalyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3305: kṣutpipāsābhyāṃ śītoṣṇābhyāṃ vyādhibhiś cānicchato 'pi buddhayaḥ pravartante tasmād aikāgryānupapattir iti// 40 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3306: astv etat samādhiṃ vihāya vyutthānaṃ vyutthānanimittaṃ samādhipratyanīkaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3309_1: (corr.; gogābhyāsa-, ed.), niṣphale hy abhyāse nābhyāsam ādriyeran / dṛṣṭaṃ hi laukikeṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:3313: yogābhyāsajanito dharmo janmāntare 'py anuvartate/ pracayakāṣṭhāgate tattvajñānahetau dharme prakṛṣṭāyāṃ samādhibhāvanāyāṃ tattvajñānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3314: utpadyata iti/ dṛṣṭaś ca samādhinārthaviśeṣaprābalyābhibhavaḥ ``nāham etad aśrauṣaṃ nāham etad ajñāsiṣam anyatra me mano 'bhūd'' ity āha laukika
GSP29nysvbh1u:3320_0: karmavaśān niṣpanne śarīre ceṣṭendriyārthāśraye nimittabhāvād avaśyambhāvī buddhīnām
GSP29nysvbh1u:3320_1: utpādaḥ / na ca prabalo 'pi san bāhyo ṛtha ātmano buddhyutpāde samartho bhavati tasyendriyeṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:3323: tasya buddhinimittāśrayasya śarīrendriyasya dharmādharmābhāvād abhāvo 'pavarge/ tatra yad uktam ``apavarge 'py evaṃ prasaṅga'' iti, tad ayuktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3324: tasmāt sarvaduḥkhavimokṣo 'pavargaḥ/ yasmāt sarvaduḥkhabījaṃ sarvaduḥkhāyatanaṃ cāpavarge vicchidyate tasmāt sarveṇa duḥkhena vimuktir
GSP29nysvbh1u:3325: apavargaḥ/ na nirbījaṃ nirāyatanaṃ ca duḥkham utpadyata iti// 45 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3326: NyS_4,2.46: tadarthaṃ yamaniyamābhyām ātmasaṃskāro yogāc cādhyātmavidhyupāyaiḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3327_0: tasyāpavargasyādhigamāya yamaniyamābhyām ātmasaṃskāraḥ / yamaḥ samānam āśramiṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3327_1: dharmasādhanam, niyamas tu viśiṣṭam / ātmasaṃskāraḥ punar adharmahānaṃ dharmopacayaś
GSP29nysvbh1u:3328: sa punas tapaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ pratyāhāro dhyānaṃ dhāraṇeti/ indriyaviṣayeṣu prasaṃkhyānābhyāso rāgadveṣaprahāṇārthaḥ/ upāyas tu yogācāravidhānam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3329: NyS_4,2.47: jñānagrahaṇābhyāsas tadvidyaiś ca saha saṃvādaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3330: tadartham iti prakṛtam/ jñāyate 'neneti jñānam ātmavidyāśāstraṃ tasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3332: tadvidyaiś ca saha saṃvāda iti prajñāparipākārtham, paripākas tu saṃśayacchedanam avijñātārthabodho 'dhyavasitābhyanujñānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3334: tadvidyaiś ca saha saṃvāda ity avibhaktārthaṃ vacanaṃ vibhajyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3337: yadi ca manyeta pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahaḥ pratikūlaḥ parasyeti ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3338: NyS_4,2.49: pratipakṣahīnam api vā prayojanārhtam arthitve ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3339: tam abhyupeyād iti vartate/ parataḥ prajñām upāditsamānas
GSP29nysvbh1u:3340: tattvabubhutsāprakāśanena svapakṣam anavasthāpayan svadarśanaṃ pariśodhayed iti/ anyonyapratyanīkāni ca prāvādukānāṃ darśanāni// 49 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3343: anutpannatattvajñānānām aprahīṇadoṣāṇāṃ tadarthaṃ ghaṭamānānām etad iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3346: vigṛhyeti vijigīṣayā, na tattvabubhutsayeti/ tad etad vidyāpālārthaṃ na lābhapūjākhyātyartham iti// 51 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3351: saṅkṣepeṇaoktam, tad vistareṇa vibhajyate --- tāḥ khalv imā jātayaḥ sthāpanāhetau prayukte caturviṃśatiḥ pratiṣedhahetavaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3358: sādharmyeṇopasaṃhāre sādhyadharmaviparyayopapatteḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3359_0: nidarśanam kriyāvān ātmā, dravyasya kriyāhetuguṇayogāt / dravyaṃ loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3359_1: kriyāvān, tathā cātmā, tasmāt kriyāvān iti / evam upasaṃhṛte paraḥ sādharmyeṇaiva
GSP29nysvbh1u:3359_2: pratyavatiṣṭhate niṣkriya ātmā vibhuno dravyasya niṣkriyatvād, vibhu cākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3359_3: ca, tathā cātmā, tasmān niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3361: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyam, na punar akriyasādharmyād niṣkriyeṇeti/ viśeṣahetvabhāvāt sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedho
GSP29nysvbh1u:3363: atha vaidharmyasamaḥ --- kriyāhetuguṇayukto loṣṭaḥ paricchinno dṛṣṭo na ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:3364: tathātmā, tasmān na loṣṭavat kriyāvān iti/ na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3365: kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3367: vaidharmyeṇa copasaṃhāraḥ --- niṣkriya ātmā vibhutvāt, kriyāvad dravyam avibhu dṛṣṭaṃ yathā loṣṭaḥ, na ca tathātmā, tasmān niṣkriya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3369_0: kriyāhetuguṇarahitaṃ dṛṣṭam, na ca tathātmā, tasmān na niṣkriya iti / na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3369_1: kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyavaidharmyāt kriyāvateti
GSP29nysvbh1u:3370: atha sādharmyasamaḥ --- kriyāvān loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto dṛṣṭaḥ, tathā
GSP29nysvbh1u:3371: cātmā, tasmāt kriyāvān iti/ na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyo na punaḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvān iti viśeṣahetvabhāvāt sādharmyasamaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3374: sādharmyamātreṇa vaidharmyamātreṇa ca sādhyasādhane pratijñāyamāne syād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3376: sā tu dharmaviśeṣe nopapadyate, gosādharmyād gotvāj jātiviśeṣād gauḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3377: sidhyati, na tu sāsnādisambandhāt/ aśvādivaidharmyād gotvād eva gauḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3378: sidhyati, na guṇādibhedāt/ tac caitat kṛtavyākhyānam avayavaprakaraṇe/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3379: pramāṇānām abhisambandhāc caikārthakāritvaṃ samānaṃ vākya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3383_0: dṛṣṭāntadharmaṃ sādhye samāsañjayata utkarṣasamaḥ / yadi kriyāhetuguṇayogāl loṣṭavat
GSP29nysvbh1u:3383_1: kriyāvān ātmā, loṣṭavad eva sparśavān api prāpnoti / atha na sparśavān, loṣṭavat
GSP29nysvbh1u:3383_2: kriyāvān api na prāpnoti, viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3385: sādhye dharmābhāvaṃ dṛṣṭāntāt prasañjayato 'pakarṣasamaḥ/ loṣṭaḥ khalu kriyāvān avibhur
GSP29nysvbh1u:3387: kāmam ātmāpi kriyāvān avibhur astu, viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3388: khyāpanīyo varṇyo viparyayād avarṇyaḥ/ tāv etau sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmau
GSP29nysvbh1u:3390: sādhanadharmayukte dṛṣṭānte dharmāntaravikalpāt sādhyadharmavikalpaṃ prasañjayato vikalpasamaḥ/ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcid guru yathā loṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3391: kiṃcil laghu yathā vāyuḥ, evaṃ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcit kriyāvat syāt yathā loṣṭaḥ, kiñcid akriyaṃ yathātmā, viśeṣo vā vācya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3392: hetvādyavayavasāmarthyayogī dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ, taṃ dṛṣṭānte prasañjayataḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3393: sādhyasamaḥ/ yadi yathā loṣṭas tathātmā, prāptas tarhi yathātmā tathā loṣṭa iti/ sādhyaś cāyam ātmā kriyāvān iti kāmaṃ loṣṭo 'pi sādhyaḥ/ atha
GSP29nysvbh1u:3394: naivam, na tarhi yathā loṣṭaḥ tathātmā//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3397: alabhyaḥ siddhasya nihnavaḥ/ siddhaṃ ca kiñcitsādharmyād upamānaṃ yathā gaus tathā gavaya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3399: tatra na labhyo gogavayayor dharmavikalpaś codayitum/ evaṃ sādhake dharme
GSP29nysvbh1u:3400: dṛṣṭāntādisāmarthyayukte na labhyaḥ sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor dharmavikalpād vaidharmyāt pratiṣedho vaktum iti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3403: prajñāpanārtham/ evaṃ sādhyātideśād dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhyatvam anupapannam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3404: NyS_5,1.7: prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3406: hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayed aprāpya vā? na tāvat prāpya prāptyām aviśiṣṭatvād asādhakaḥ/ dvayor vidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3408: aprāpya sādhakaṃ na bhavati, nāprāptaḥ pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti/ prāptyā pratyavasthānaṃ prāptisamaḥ, aprāptyā pratyavasthānam aprāptisamaḥ//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3411: ubhayathā khalv ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇāni prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭādikāryaṃ niṣpādayanti, abhicārāc ca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam aprāpya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3413: NyS_5,1.9: dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānāc ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau
GSP29nysvbh1u:3414_0: sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyam iti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3414_1: kriyāhetuguṇayogī kriyāvān loṣṭa iti hetur nāpadiśyate, na ca hetum antereṇa siddhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:3415: pratidṛṣṭāntena pratyavasthānaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntasamaḥ/ kriyāvān ātmā kriyāhetuguṇayogād loṣṭavad ity ukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3416: kriyāhetuguṇayuktam ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti/ kaḥ punar ākāśasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3420: idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktum arhati, atha ke pradīpam upādadate, kimarthaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3421: veti? didṛkṣamāṇā dṛśyadarśanārtham iti/ atha pradīpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3422: pradīpāntaraṃ kasmān nopādadate? antareṇāpi pradīpāntaraṃ dṛśyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:3423_0: pradīpaḥ, tatra pradīpadarśanārthaṃ pradīpopādānaṃ nirarthakam / atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ kimartham
GSP29nysvbh1u:3423_1: ucyata iti? aprajñātasya jñāpanārtham iti / atha dṛṣṭānte kāraṇāpadeśaḥ kimarthaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3424: dṛṣṭāntaḥ/ sa khalu ``laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa
GSP29nysvbh1u:3425: dṛṣṭānta'' iti/ tatprajñāpanārthaḥ kāraṇāpadeśo nirarthaka iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:3428: pratidṛṣṭāntaṃ bruvatā na viśeṣahetur apadiśyate, --- anena prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭānataḥ sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti/ evaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve nāhetur
GSP29nysvbh1u:3429: dṛṣṭānta ity upapadyate/ sa ca katham ahetur na syāt? yady apratiṣiddhaḥ sādhakaḥ syād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3431: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte apara āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3432: prāgutpatter anutpanne śabde prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇaṃ nāsti, tadabhāvāt nityatvaṃ prāptam, nityasya cotpattir nāsti/ anutpattyā pratyavasthānam anutpattisamaḥ//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3434: NyS_5,1.13: tathābhāvād utpannasya kāraṇopapatter na kāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3435: tathābhāvād utpannasyeti/ utpannaḥ khalv ayaṃ śabda iti bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3436_0: prāgutapatteḥ śabda eva nāsti, utpannasya śabdabhāvāc chabdasya sataḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3436_1: anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate, kāraṇopapatter ayukto 'yaṃ doṣaḥ ``prāgutpatteḥ kāraṇābhāvād''
GSP29nysvbh1u:3436_2: NyS_5,1.14: sāmānyadṛṣṭāntayor aindriyakatve samāne nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayasamaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3437_0: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte hetau saṃśayena pratyavatiṣṭate
GSP29nysvbh1u:3437_1: --- sati prayatnānantarīyakatve asty evāsya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyakatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3437_2: asti ca ghaṭenānityena, ato nityānityasādharmyād anivṛttiḥ saṃśaya iti //14 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3439: NyS_5,1.15: sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyupagamāc ca sāmānysyāpratiṣedhaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3440: viśeṣād vaidharmyād avadhāryamāṇe 'rthe puruṣa iti, na sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ labhate/ evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:3441_1: 'vakāśaṃ na labhate / yadi vai labhate, tataḥ sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyānucchedād atyantaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3442: nityaṃ sādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur iti nābhyupagamyate/ na hi gṛhyamāṇe
GSP29nysvbh1u:3445: ubhayena nityena cānityena ca sādharmyāt pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ pravṛttiḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3446: prakriyā/ anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ekaḥ pakṣaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3447: pravarttayati, dvitīyaś ca nityasādharmyāt pratipakṣaṃ pravarttayati ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3448: nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavad iti/ evaṃ ca sati
GSP29nysvbh1u:3449: prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur anityasādharmyeṇa ucyamāno na prakaraṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3450: ativarttate, prakaraṇānativṛtter nirṇayānativartanam/ samānaṃ caitan nityasādharmyeṇocyamāṇe hetau/ tad idaṃ prakaraṇānativṛttyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:3456: ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddhiṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyāsiddhir uktā
GSP29nysvbh1u:3457: bhavati/ yady ubhayasādharmyam, tatra ekataraḥ pratipakṣa ity evaṃ saty
GSP29nysvbh1u:3458: upapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati/ pratipakṣopapatter anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3459: yadi pratipakṣopapattiḥ pratiṣedho nopapadyate, atha pratiṣedhopapattiḥ pratipakṣo nopapadyate, pratipakṣopapattiḥ pratiṣedhopapattiś ceti
GSP29nysvbh1u:3460: vipratiṣiddham iti/ tattvānavadhāraṇāc ca prakriyāsiddhir viparyaye
GSP29nysvbh1u:3461: prakaraṇāvasānāt, tattvāvadhāraṇe hy avasitaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhavatīti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3463: hetuḥ sādhanam, tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet/ yadi pūrvaṃ sādhanam, asati sādhye kasya sādhanam? atha paścād, asati sādhane kasyedaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3464: sādhyam? atha yugapat sādhyasādane, dvayor vidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam iti hetur ahetunā na viśiṣyate/ ahetunā sādharmyāt pratyavasthānam ahetusamaḥ//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3467_0: na traikālyāsiddhiḥ / kasmāt? hetutaḥ sādhyasiddheḥ / nirvartanīyasya nirvṛttir vijñeyasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3467_1: vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate, so 'yaṃ mahān pratyakṣaviṣaya udāharaṇam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3467_2: yat tu khalūktam asati sādhye kasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3468: sādhanam iti? yat tu nirvatyate yac ca vijñāpyate tasyeti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3470: pūrvaṃ paścād yugapad vā pratiṣedha iti nopapadyate, pratiṣedhānupapatteḥ sthāpanāhetuḥ siddha
GSP29nysvbh1u:3472_0: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad iti sthāpite pakṣe arthāpattyā pratipakṣaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3472_2: śabda iti, arthād āpadyate nityasādharmyān nitya iti, asti cāsya nityena sādharmyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3474: NyS_5,1.22: anuktasyārthāpatteḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvād anaikānatikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3475_0: anupapādya sāmarthyam anuktam arthād āpadyate iti bruvataḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3475_1: anityapakṣasiddhāv arthād āpannaṃ nityapakṣasya hānir iti / anaikānatikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3476: ubhayapakṣasamā ceyam arthāpattiḥ/ yadi nityasādharmyād asparśatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3477: ākāśavac ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ arthād āpannam anityasādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād anitya iti/ na ceyaṃ viparyayamātrād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3478: ekāntenārthāpattiḥ/ na khalu vai ghaṇasya grāvṇaḥ patanam ity arthād āpadyate --- dravāṇām apāṃ patanābhāva iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3481: eko dharmaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ śabdaghaṭayor upapadyata ity aviśeṣe ubhayor anityatve,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3482: sarvasyāviśeṣaḥ prasajyate/ katham? sadbhāvopapatteḥ/ eko dharmaḥ sadbhāvaḥ sarvasyopapadyate, sadbhāvopapatteḥ sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgāt pratyavasthānam aviśeṣasamaḥ//23//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3484: NyS_5,1.24: kvacit taddharmopapatteḥ kvacic cānupapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3485_1: dharmāntaram aviśeṣaḥ, naivaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ dharmāntaram
GSP29nysvbh1u:3486_0: atha matam anityatvam eva dharmānataraṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra
GSP29nysvbh1u:3486_1: syād iti, evaṃ khalu vai kalpyamāne anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sadbhāvopapatter iti pakṣaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3487: udāharaṇaṃ nāsti, anudāharaṇaś ca hetur nāstīti/ pratijñaiekadeśasya codāharaṇatvam anupapannam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3489: na hi sādhyam udāharaṇaṃ bhavati/ sataś ca nityānityabhāvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:3490: anityatvānupapattiḥ/ tasmāt sadbhāvopapatteḥ sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅga iti nirabhidheyam etad vākyam iti/ sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapatter anityatvam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3491: iti bruvatā 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam, tatrānupapannaḥ pratiṣedha iti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3493: yady anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate śabdasyety anityaḥ śabdo nityatvakāraṇam apy upapadyate 'syāsparśatvam iti nityatvam apy upapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3494: ubhayasyānityatvasya nityatvasya ca kāraṇopapattyā pratyavasthānam upapattisamaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3497: ubhayakāraṇopapatter iti bruvatā nānityatvakāraṇopapatter anityatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate, yadi pratiṣidhyate nobhayakāraṇopapattiḥ syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3500: vyāghātāt pratiṣedha iti cet, samāno vyāghātaḥ/ ekasya nityatvānityatvaprasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvatoktaṃ pratiṣedha iti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3501: svapakṣaparapakṣayoḥ samāno vyāghātaḥ, sa ca naikatarasya sādhaka
GSP29nysvbh1u:3509: prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti bruvatā kāraṇata utpattir abhidhīyate, na kāryasya kāraṇaniyamaḥ/ yadi ca kāraṇāntarād apy utpadyamānasya śabdasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3510: tad anityatvam upapadyate, kim atra pratiṣidhyata iti//28//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3511: na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhiḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3513: anupalabdhiḥ naivaṃ śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇenāvaraṇādinānupalabdhiḥ/ gṛhyeta caitad asyāgrahaṇakāraṇam udakādivat, na gṛhyate/ tasmād udakādiviparītaḥ śabdo 'nupalabhyamāna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3514: NyS_5,1.29: tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhau tadviparītopapatter anupalabdhisamaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3515: teṣām āvaraṇādīnām anupalabdhir nopalabhyate/ anupalambhān nāstīty abhāvo
GSP29nysvbh1u:3516_0: 'syāḥ sidhyati / abhāvasiddhau hetvabhāvāt tadviparītam astitvam āvaraṇādīnām avadhāryate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3516_1: tadviparītopapatter yatpratijñātaṃ ``na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:3517: hetur ``āvaraṇādyanupalabdher'' ity āvaraṇādiṣu cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhau ca samayānupalabdhyā pratyavasthito 'nupalabdhisamo bhavati//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3520: āvaraṇādyanupalabdhir nāsti, anupalambhād ity ahetuḥ/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3522: yad asti tad upalabdher viṣayaḥ, upalabdhyā tad astīti pratijñāyate/ yan nāsti tad anupalabdher viṣayaḥ, anupalabhyamānaṃ nāstīti pratijñāyate/ so
GSP29nysvbh1u:3525_0: apratiṣiddhā cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhir hetutvāya kalpate / āvaraṇādīni tu vidyamānatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3525_1: upalabdher viṣayāḥ, teṣām upalabdhyā bhavitavyam / yat tāni nopalabhyante, tad upalabdheḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3525_2: svaviṣayapratipādikāyā abhāvād anupalambhād anupalabdher viṣayo gamyate --- na santy
GSP29nysvbh1u:3526: śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇānīti/ anupalambhāt tv anupalabhiḥ sidhyati, viṣayaḥ sa tasyeti//30//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3528: ahetur iti varttate/ śarīre śarīre jñānavikalpānāṃ bhāvābhāvau
GSP29nysvbh1u:3529: saṃvedanīyau/ asti me saṃśayajñānaṃ nāsti me saṃśayajñānam iti/ evaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3530_1: --- nāsti me śabdasyāvaraṇādyupalabdhir iti nopalabhyante śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇāny
GSP29nysvbh1u:3530_2: āvaraṇādīnīti / tatra yad uktaṃ tad anupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhir iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3533: anityena ghaṭena sādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti bruvato 'sti ghaṭenānityena sarvabhāvānāṃ sādharmyam iti sarvasyānityatvam aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate/ so 'yam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3538_0: pratiṣedhaḥ / tasya pakṣeṇa pratiṣedhyena sādharmyaṃ pratijñādiyogaḥ / tad yady anityasādharmyād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3538_1: anityatvasyāsiddhiḥ, sādharmyād asiddheḥ pratiṣedhasyāpy asiddhiḥ, pratiṣedhyena
GSP29nysvbh1u:3538_2: sādharmyād NyS_5,1.34: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:3539: dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñāyate, sa
GSP29nysvbh1u:3542: --- kenacit samānaḥ, kutaścid viśiṣṭaḥ/ sāmānyāt sādharmyaṃ viśeṣāc ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:3543_0: vaidharmyam / evaṃ sādharmyaviśeṣo hetuḥ, nāviśeṣeṇa sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3543_1: vā / sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ cāśritya bhavān āha --- ``sādharmyāt tulyadharmopapatteḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3544: iti, etad ayuktam iti/ aviśeṣasamapratiṣedhe ca yad uktaṃ tad api
GSP29nysvbh1u:3545: NyS_5,1.35: nityam anityabhāvād anitye nityatvopapatter nityasamaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3546: anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyate/ tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam athānityam? yadi tāvat sarvadā bhavati? dharmasya sadā bhāvād dharmiṇo 'pi
GSP29nysvbh1u:3547: sadā bhāva iti nityaḥ śabda iti/ atha na sarvadā bhavati?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3548: anityatvasyābhāvān nityaḥ śabdaḥ/ evaṃ nityatvena pratyavasthānān
GSP29nysvbh1u:3552: pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvād ity ucyamāne 'nujñātaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3553: śabdasyānityatvam, anityatvopapatteś ca ``nānityaḥ śabda'' iti pratiṣedho nopapadyate/ atha nābhyupagamyate, nityam anityatvasya bhāvād iti hetur na
GSP29nysvbh1u:3556_0: paripraśnānupapattiḥ / yo 'yaṃ paripraśnaḥ --- tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati
GSP29nysvbh1u:3556_1: atha neti, ayam anupapannaḥ / kasmāt? utpannasya yo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad
GSP29nysvbh1u:3558: nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca ekasya dharmiṇo dharmāv iti virudhyete, na
GSP29nysvbh1u:3561: tatra yad uktaṃ --- nityam anityatvasya bhāvān nitya eva, tad avartamānārtham uktam iti//36//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3563: prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti/ yasya prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ tat khalv abhūtvā bhavati, yathā ghaṭādikāryam; anityam iti ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:3565: evam avasthite prayatnakāryānekatvād iti pratiṣedha ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3566_0: prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaś ca dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnām, vyavadhānāpohāc cābhivyaktir vyavahitānām /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3566_1: tat kiṃ prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ śabdasyāho 'bhivyaktir iti viśeṣo nāsti / kāryāviśeṣeṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:3571: tatrānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ vyavadhānam upapadyate, vyavadhānāpohāc ca prayatnānantarabhāvino 'rthasyopalabdhilakṣaṇā 'bhivyaktir bhavatīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3573: na tu śabdasyānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ kiñcid upapadyate, yasya prayatnānantaram apohāc chabdasyopalabhilakṣaṇā 'bhivyaktir bhavatīti, tasmād utpadyate śabdo nābhivyajyate iti//38//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3574: hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam upapadyate anaikātikatvād asādhakaḥ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3577: pratiṣedho 'py anaikāntikaḥ, kiñcit pratiṣedhati kiñcin neti anaikāntikatvād asādhaka iti/ atha vā śabdasyānityatvapakṣe
GSP29nysvbh1u:3578: prayatnānantaram utpādo nābhivyaktir iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ, nityatvapakṣe
GSP29nysvbh1u:3579: 'pi prayatnānantaram abhivyaktir notpāda iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ/ so 'yam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3580: ubhayapakṣasamo viśeṣahetvabhāva ity ubhayam apy anaikātikam iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3582: sarveṣu sādharmyaprabhṛtiṣu pratiṣedhahetuṣu yatra yatrāviśeṣo dṛśyate tatrobhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3584: yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvam āpadyate so 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3587_0: tatrānityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti sādhanavādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3587_1: pakṣaḥ / ``prayatnakāryānekatvāt kāryasama'' iti dūṣaṇavādinaḥ pratiṣedhahetunā dvitīyaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3587_2: pakṣaḥ / sa ca pratiṣedha ity ucyate / tasyāsya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3587_3: pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedha ucyate / tasmin pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3588: NyS_5,1.42: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā
GSP29nysvbh1u:3589_0: pratiṣedhaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya taduddhāram akṛtvānujñāya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:3589_1: tṛtīyapakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvam iti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasañjayato dūṣaṇavādino
GSP29nysvbh1u:3590: NyS_5,1.43: svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3591: sthāpanāpakṣe prayatnakāryānekatvād iti doṣaḥ sthāpanāhetuvādinaḥ svapakṣalakṣaṇo bhavati/ kasmāt? svapakṣasamutthatvāt/ so 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3592_0: svapakṣalakṣaṇaṃ doṣam apekṣamāṇo 'nuddhṛtyānujñāya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:3592_1: upapadyamānaṃ doṣaṃ parapakṣe upasaṃharati / itthaṃ cānaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:3593_0: parapakṣadoṣo 'bhyupagato bhavati / kathaṃ kṛtvā? yaḥ pareṇa prayatnakāryānekatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3593_1: ityādinānaikāntikadoṣa uktaḥ, tam anuddhṛtya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity āha /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3593_2: evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayataḥ parapakṣābhyupagamāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:3595: yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi
GSP29nysvbh1u:3596: samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā prasajyata iti, tathāsyāpi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām
GSP29nysvbh1u:3597: abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayato matānujñā prasajyata iti/ sa khalv ayaṃ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pakṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3599: pratiṣedhahetuvādinaḥ dvitīyacaturthaṣaṣṭhapakṣāḥ/ teṣāṃ sādhvasādhutāyāṃ mīmāṃsyamānāyāṃ caturthaṣaṣṭhayor arthāviśeṣāt punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3602: doṣa'' iti samānadoṣatvam evocyate, nārthaviśeṣaḥ kaścid asti/ samānas tṛṭīyapañcamayoḥ punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ, tṛṭīyapakṣe 'pi ``pratiṣedhe 'pi
GSP29nysvbh1u:3603: samāno doṣa'' iti samānatvam abhyupagamyate/ pañcamapakṣe 'pi
GSP29nysvbh1u:3605: nārthaviśeṣaḥ kaścid ucyata iti/ tatra pañcamaṣaṣṭhapakṣayor arthāviśeṣāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:3606: punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ, tṛtīyacaturthayor matānujñā, prathamadvitīyayor viśeṣahetvabhāva iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3607: kadā ṣaṭpakṣī? yadā ``pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa'' ity evaṃ pravarttate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3608: tadobhayoḥ pakṣayor asiddhiḥ/ yadā tu ``kāryānyatve prayatnāhetutvam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3612: nābhivyaktir'' iti siddhaḥ prathamapakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3614_0: nyāyadarśanam pañcamādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam vipratipattyapratipattyor vikalpān
GSP29nysvbh1u:3614_1: nigrahasthānabahutvam iti saṅkṣepeṇoktam, tad idānīṃ vibhajanīyam / nigrahasthānāni
GSP29nysvbh1u:3614_2: khalu parājayavastūny aparādhādhikaraṇāni prāyeṇa pratijñādyavayavāśrayāṇi tattvavādinam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3617_0: NyS_5,2.1: pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaraṃ pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñāsannyāso hetvantaram
GSP29nysvbh1u:3617_1: arthāntaraṃ nirarthakam avijñātārtham apārthakam aprāptakālaṃ nyūnam adhikaṃ punaruktam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3617_2: ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogo
GSP29nysvbh1u:3620: sādhyadharmapratyanīkena dharmeṇa pratyavasthite pratidraṣṭāntadharmaṃ svadṛṣṭānte 'bhyanujānan pratijñāṃ jahātīti pratjñāhāniḥ/ nidarśanam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3621: ``aindriyakatvād anityaḥ śabdo ghaṭavad'' ity kṛte apara āha -- dṛṣṭam aindriyakatvaṃ sāmānye nitye, kasmān na tathā śabda iti pratyavasthite
GSP29nysvbh1u:3624: yady aindriyakaṃ sāmānyaṃ nityaṃ kāmaṃ ghaṭo nityo 'stv iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3625: sa khalv ayaṃ sādhakasya dṛṣṭāntasya nityatvaṃ prasañjayan nigamanāntam eva pakṣaṃ jahāti, pakṣaṃ jahatpratijñāṃ jahātīty ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3629: pratijñātārtho ``anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ghaṭavad'' ity ukte yo 'sya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3630_0: pratiṣedhaḥ pratidṛṣṭāntena hetuvyabhicāraḥ --- sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ nityam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3631: sarvagatam aindriyakas tv asarvagato ghaṭa iti dharmavikalpāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3633: evaṃ śabdo 'py asarvagato ghaṭavad evānitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3634: tatrānityaḥ śabda iti pūrvā pratijñā, asarvagata iti dvitīyā pratijñā
GSP29nysvbh1u:3635: pratijñāntaram/ tat kathaṃ nigrahasthām iti? na pratijñāyāḥ sādhanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3636: pratijñāntaram, kiṃ tu hetudṛṣṭāntau sādhanaṃ pratijñāyāḥ, tad etad asādhanopādānam anarthakam iti/ ānarthakyān nigrahasthānam iti//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3640: so 'yaṃ pratijñāhetvor virodhaḥ/ katham? yadi guṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3641: rūpādibhyo 'rthāntarasyānupalabdhir nopapadyate/ atha rūpādibhyo 'rthāntarasyānupalabdhiḥ, guṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyam iti nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3643: guṇavyatiriktaṃ ca dravyaṃ rūpādibhyaś cārthāntarasyānupalabdhir iti virudhyate --- vyāhanyate na sambhavatīti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3645: anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ity ukte paro brūyāt sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ na
GSP29nysvbh1u:3647: evaṃ śabdo 'py aindriyako na cānitya iti/ evaṃ pratiṣiddhe pakṣe yadi brūyāt --- ``ka punar āhānityaḥ śabda'' iti, so 'yaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3649: NyS_5,2.6: aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchato hetvantaram ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3650: nidarśanam --- ekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktam iti pratijñā/ kasmād dhetoḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3651: ekaprakṛtīnāṃ vikārāṇāṃ parimāṇāt/ mṛtpūrvakāṇāṃ śarāvādīnāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3652_0: parimāṇam, yāvān prakṛter vyūho bhavati tāvān vikāra iti / dṛṣṭaṃ ca prativikāraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3652_1: parimāṇam / asti cedaṃ parimāṇam prativyaktaṃ tadekaprakṛtīnāṃ vikārāṇāṃ parimāṇāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:3653: asya vyabhicāreṇa pratyavasthānaṃ --- nānāprakṛtīnām ekaprakṛtīnāṃ ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:3654: vikārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇam iti/ evaṃ pratyavasthite āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3656_0: sukhaduḥkhamohasamanvitaṃ hīdaṃ vyaktaṃ parimitaṃ gṛhyate, --- tatra prakṛtyantararūpasamanvayābhāve
GSP29nysvbh1u:3656_1: saty ekaprakṛtitvam iti / tad idam aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣaṃ bruvato hetvantaraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3656_2: bhavati / sati ca hetvantarabhāve pūrvasya hetor asādhakatvān nigrahasthānam /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3657: hetvantaravacane sati yadi hetvarthanidarśano dṛṣṭānta upādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3659: nedaṃ vyaktam ekaprakṛti bhavati, prakṛtyantaropādānāt/ atha nopādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3660: dṛṣṭānte hetvarthasyānidarśitasya sādhakabhāvānupapatter ānarthakyād dhetor anivṛttaṃ nigrahasthānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3663: hetutaḥ sādhyasiddhau prakṛtāyāṃ brūyāt --- nityaḥ śabdo 'sparśatvād iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:3664: hetuḥ/ hetur nāma hinoter dhātos tuni pratyaye kṛdantaṃ padam/ padaṃ ca nāmākhyātopasarganipātāḥ/ abhidheyasya kriyāntarayogād viśiṣyamāṇarūpaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3666: kārakasaṅkhyāviśiṣṭakriyākālayogābhidhāyākhyātam, dhātvarthamātraṃ ca kālābhidhānaviśiṣṭam/ prayogeṣv arthād abhidyamānārūpā nipātāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3668: upasṛjyamānāḥ kriyāvadyotakā upasargā ity evamādi/ tadarthāntaraṃ veditavyam iti//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3670: yathā 'nityaḥ śabdaḥ --- kacaṭatapāḥ, javagaḍadaśatvāt, jhabhañ ghaḍhadhaṣavad iti ----
GSP29nysvbh1u:3671: evamprakāraṃ nirarthakam/ abhidhānābhidheyabhāvānupapattau arthagater abhāvād varṇā eva krameṇa nirdiśyanta iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3672: NyS_5,2.9: pariṣatprativādibhyāṃ trir abhihitam apy avijñātam avijñātārtham ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3673: yad vākyaṃ pariṣadā prativādinā ca trir abhihitam api na vijñāyate śliṣṭaśabdam apratītaprayogam atidrutoccaritam ity evamādinā kāraṇena,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3675: tadavijñātam avijñātārtham asāmarthyasaṃvaraṇāya prayuktam iti nigrahasthānam iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3677: yatrānekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāparyeṇānvayayogo nāstīty
GSP29nysvbh1u:3680: kuṇḍam, ajājinam, palalapiṇḍaḥ, atha raurukam etad, kumāryāḥ pāyaṃ tasyāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3684: tatrāvayavaviparyāsena vacanam aprāaptakālam asambaddhārthaṃ nigrahasthānam iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3686: pratijñādīnām avayavānām anyatamenāpy avayavena hīnaṃ nyūnaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3689: ekena kṛtatvād anyatarasyānarthakyam iti, tad etan niyamābhupagame
GSP29nysvbh1u:3691: NyS_5,2.14: śabdārthayoḥ punar vacanaṃ punaruktam anyatrānuvādāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3692: anyatrānuvādāt śabdapunaruktam arthapunaruktaṃ vā, nityaḥ śabdo nityaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3693: śabda iti śabdapunaruktam/ arthapunaruktam --- anityaḥ śabdo nirodhadharmako dhvanir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3694: anuvāde tv apunaruktaṃ śabdābhyāsād arthaviśeṣopapatteḥ/ yathā hetvapadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punar vacanaṃ nigamanam iti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3696: punaruktam iti prakṛtam/ nidarśanam --- utpattidharmakatvād anityam ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:3697: uktvā arthād āpannasya yo 'bhidhāyakaḥ śabdas tena svaśabdena brūyād anutpattidharmakaṃ nityam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3699: tac ca punarukataṃ veditavyam/ arthasampratyayārthe śabdaprayoge pratītaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3701: NyS_5,2.16: vijñātasya pariṣadā, trir abhihitasyāpy apratyuccāraṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3703: vijñātasya vākyārthasya pariṣadā, prativādinā trir abhihitasya yad apratyauccāraṇaṃ tad ananubhāṣaṇaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3706: vijñātārthasya pariṣadā, prativādinā trir abhihitasya yad avijñātaṃ tad
GSP29nysvbh1u:3707: ajñānaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti/ ayaṃ khalv avijñāya kasya pratiṣedhaṃ brūyād iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3709: parapakṣapratiṣedha uttaram, tad yadā na pratipadyate tadā nigṛhīto
GSP29nysvbh1u:3711: yatra kartavyaṃ vyāsajya kathāṃ vyavacchinatti --- idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3712: vidyate, tasmin avasite paścāt kathayāmīti, vikṣepo nāma nigrahasthānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3713: ekanigrahāvasānāyāṃ kathāyāṃ svayam eva kathāntaraṃ pratipadyata iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3714: NyS_5,2.20: svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3715: yaḥ pareṇa coditaṃ doṣaṃ svapakṣe 'bhyupagamyānuddhṛtya vadati ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3718: sa svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaṃ prasañjayan paramatam anujānātīti matānujñāṃ nāma nigrahasthānam āpadyata iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3720: paryanuyojyo nāma nigrahopapattyā codanīyaḥ, tasyopekṣaṇaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ prāpto 'sīty ananuyogaḥ/ etac ca kasya parājaya ity anuyuktayā pariṣadā
GSP29nysvbh1u:3721: vacanīyam, na khalu nigrahaṃ prāptaḥ svakaupīnaṃ vivṛṇuyād iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3724: paraṃ bruvan niranuyojyānuyojgān nigṛhīto veditavya iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3726: kasyacid arthasya tathābhāvaṃ pratijñāya pratijñātārthaviparyayād aniyamāt kathāṃ prasañjayato 'pasiddhānto veditavyaḥ/ yathā na sad ātmānaṃ jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3727: na sato vināśo, nāsad ātmānaṃ labhate, nāsad utpadyata iti siddhāntam abhyupetya svapakṣaṃ vyavasthāpayati --- ekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktaṃ vikārāṇām
GSP29nysvbh1u:3728_0: anvayadarśanāt / mṛdanvitānāṃ śarāvādīnāṃ dṛṣṭam ekaprakṛtitvam, tathā cāyaṃ vyaktabhedaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3728_1: sukhaduḥkhamohānvito dṛśyate / tasmāt samanvayadarśanāt sukhādibhir ekaprakṛtīdaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3728_2: viśvam iti / evam uktavān anuyujyate --- atha pratṛtir vikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣitavyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3728_3: iti / yasyāvasthitasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāntaraṃ pravartate, sā prakṛtiḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3728_4: yad dharmāntaraṃ pravartate nivartate vā sa vikāra iti / so 'yaṃ pratijñātārthaviparyāsād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3728_5: aniyamāt kathāṃ prasañjayati / pratijñātaṃ khalv anena --- nāsad
GSP29nysvbh1u:3730: na sat tirobhavatīti/ sadasatoś ca tirobhāvāvirbhāvam antareṇa na kasyacit
GSP29nysvbh1u:3731: pravṛttiḥ pravṛttyuparamaś ca bhavati/ mṛdi khalv avasthitāyāṃ bhaviṣyati śarāvādilakṣaṇaṃ dharmāntaram iti pravṛttir bhavati, abhūd iti ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:3732_0: pravṛttyuparamaḥ / tad etad mṛddharmāṇām api na syāt / evaṃ pratyavasthito yadi sataś
GSP29nysvbh1u:3732_1: cātmahānam asataś cātmalābham abhyupaiti, tad asyāpasiddhānato nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3734: hetvābhāsāś ca nigrahasthānāni/ kiṃ punar lakṣaṇāntarayogād hetvābhāsā nigrahasthānatvam āpannāḥ yathā pramāṇāni prameyatvam ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3736: ta ime pramāṇādayaḥ padārthā uddiṣṭā lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāś ceti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3737: yo 'kṣapādam ṛṣiṃ nyāyaḥ pratyabhād vadatāṃ varam/
